T02D2512-3:1b-0: @1b # // de ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2512-3:1b-4: nor bu'i rigs rnams bshad nas /
T02D2512-3:1b-5: [dd] da ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi tshul
T02D2512-3:1b-6: gyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams nas brtsams te
T02D2512-3:1b-7: / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //

T02D2512-3:1b-9: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2512-3:1b-10: dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //

T02D2512-3:1b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa

T02D2512-3:1b-14: 'jig rten gsum po zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir sa'i 'jig rten dang ;
T02D2512-3:1b-16: mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du ming po gsum gyi
T02D2512-3:1b-17: tshul gyis bzhugs shing de'i chos nyid yin pas na
T02D2512-3:2a-0: khams gsum pa zhes bya ba @2a * //
T02D2512-3:2a-1: ni sems can gyi don dang /
T02D2512-3:2a-2: chos nyid kyis 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:2a-3: bdag po zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i chos
T02D2512-3:2a-4: kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba brnyes pas na
T02D2512-3:2a-6: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba dang dngos po thams
T02D2512-3:2a-7: cad kyi ngo bo yin bas na thams cad do
T02D2512-3:2a-8: // lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa gsum po la tshar gcod pa dang /
T02D2512-3:2a-9: phan 'dogs par mdzad pas na gsum gyi ston pa'o //
T02D2512-3:2a-10: cho ga bzhin du sgom gyur cing //
T02D2512-3:2a-11: zhes bya ba ni ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:2a-12: gyi tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi don bya
T02D2512-3:2a-13: ba de sgom zhing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o//
T02D2512-3:2a-14: sems can don phyir cho gas bzhugs //
T02D2512-3:2a-15: zhes bya ba ni ming po gsum gyi bag chags
T02D2512-3:2a-16: dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams la ming
T02D2512-3:2a-17: po gsum rtogs pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir cho
T02D2512-3:2a-18: ga bzhin du bzhugs pa ni sems can gyi don
T02D2512-3:2a-20: ji ltar sgom par mdzad ce na /
T02D2512-3:2a-21: 'dod chags zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:2a-22: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la yod pa'i 'dod chags dang /
T02D2512-3:2a-23: zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams ni rnam pa thams
T02D2512-3:2b-0: @2b cad du gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par
T02D2512-3:2b-1: rtog pa'i ngo bos gnas pas na rnam par gnas
T02D2512-3:2b-2: zhes bya'o // mi mnyam pa'i rten gyur na zhes
T02D2512-3:2b-3: bya ba ni dngos por 'dzin pa la mngon par
T02D2512-3:2b-4: zhen pa nyid kyis mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02D2512-3:2b-5: dug nyid du 'gro zhes bya ba la rgyu ba
T02D2512-3:2b-6: dang mi rgyu ba'i dug dang 'dra bar sems can
T02D2512-3:2b-7: thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i srog 'phrog par
T02D2512-3:2b-9: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa na dug nyid do //
T02D2512-3:2b-10: nye bar 'gro zhes bya ba ni dug gi rang
T02D2512-3:2b-11: bzhin ma yin par yang 'di dag dug gi bya
T02D2512-3:2b-12: ba byed pa'i tha tshig go / bdud rtsi nyid
T02D2512-3:2b-14: zhes bya ba la bdud ni 'chi ba'o //
T02D2512-3:2b-15: de 'di la med pas na 'chi ba med pa ste mya ngan las 'das pa bdud rtsi'o //
T02D2512-3:2b-16: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas ni bdud rtsi nyid yin no //
T02D2512-3:2b-17: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par gyi don to //
T02D2512-3:2b-18: 'gyur ba yin zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-3:2b-20: bdud rtsi nyid kyis bsten 'gyur na //
T02D2512-3:2b-21: zhes bya ba gsungs te mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D2512-3:2b-22: don du rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D2512-3:2b-23: mngon sum du byas pas na bdud rtsi nyid du
T02D2512-3:2b-27: zhe sdang dang gti mug rgyal bar byed ba dang /
T02D2512-3:2b-28: don thams cad grub par byed pa'i tshul du yongs
T02D2512-3:2b-29: su rtog cing dngos po la mngon par zhen pas
T02D2512-3:2b-30: bsten na ni ngan song gsum gyi rgyur gyur pa
T02D2512-3:2b-31: yin la / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par
T02D2512-3:2b-32: bsgoms pas mngon sum du byas nas thar pa chen
T02D2512-3:2b-33: po bskyed par gyur pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:2b-34: 'dod chags tshangs pa 'byin pa'i mchog / ces bya
T02D2512-3:2b-35: ba ni sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la yod
T02D2512-3:2b-36: pa'i 'dod chags ni ting nge 'dzin gyis tshangs pa
T02D2512-3:2b-37: yin zhing 'jig rten thams cad kyi dam pa yin
T02D2512-3:2b-38: pas mchog yin la skye bas na 'byin pa'o //
T02D2512-3:2b-39: de gdul bya rnams la phan gdags bar bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:2b-40: phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' tshangs pa
T02D2512-3:2b-42: zhe sdang drag po zhes bya ba ni sems can
T02D2512-3:2b-43: thams cad kyi rgyud la yod pa'i zhe sdang ni
T02D2512-3:2b-44: ting nge 'dzin gyis na drag po yin no //
T02D2512-3:2b-45: ting nge 'dzin gyis bya ba ni sgom pa'i stobs kyis so //
T02D2512-3:3a-1: khyab 'jug ces bya ba ni sems can thams cad
T02D2512-3:3a-2: kyi rgyud la yod pa'i gti mug ni khyab 'jug
T02D2512-3:3a-3: gi tshul du bskyed pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:3a-5: 'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2512-3:3a-6: zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'dod chags dang zhe
T02D2512-3:3a-7: sdang dang gti mug tshangs pa la sogs pa'i tshul
T02D2512-3:3a-8: du bskyed nas / de la mos pa'i sems can
T02D2512-3:3a-9: rnams mgu bar bya ba'i phyir 'khor ba ji srid
T02D2512-3:3a-10: bar du brtan par mdzad nas de'i rjes la rgyal
T02D2512-3:3a-13: don thams cad grub par byed pa'i tshul gyis 'dod
T02D2512-3:3a-14: chags la sogs 'jig rten gsum po yang dag par
T02D2512-3:3a-15: gyin gyis brlabs shing skyed par mdzad pa yin no
T02D2512-3:3a-17: 'dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:3a-18: gang gi phyir 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti
T02D2512-3:3a-19: mug gi rang bzhin 'jig rten gsum po ni rtag
T02D2512-3:3a-20: par gnas shing rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid du gnas
T02D2512-3:3a-21: pa dang / srid pa gsum ste 'dod pa dang
T02D2512-3:3a-22: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa rnam pa gsum
T02D2512-3:3a-23: pa dang / ste / chos rnam pa gsum gyi
T02D2512-3:3a-24: tshul gyis bsten cing rang bzhin dag pas mngon du
T02D2512-3:3a-25: pa dang / ste / byas nas / mchog gsum ste rgyal bar bya ba dang /
T02D2512-3:3a-27: don thams cad grub par byed pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:3a-28: chos min bsten pas ngan song gsum //
T02D2512-3:3a-29: zhes bya ba ni rgyal bar byed pa dang /
T02D2512-3:3a-31: don thams cad grub par byed pa'i rang bzhin 'dod
T02D2512-3:3a-32: chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dngos por 'dzin
T02D2512-3:3a-33: pa la mngon par zhen pas bsten na dmyal ba
T02D2512-3:3a-35: dud 'gro'i mtshan nyid can gyi ngan song gsum du 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:3a-36: 'dod chags sbrang rtsir byed par bshad //
T02D2512-3:3a-37: ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i
T02D2512-3:3a-38: tshangs pa la ni sbrang rtsir byed pa zhes bya'o
T02D2512-3:3a-39: // zhe sdang rgyal bar byed ces grags //
T02D2512-3:3a-40: zhes bya ba'i stobs bzangs kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i drag po ni rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-3:3a-41: gti mug der ni sgrub byed yin //
T02D2512-3:3a-42: zhes bya ba ni dpyid kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i khyab 'jug gi don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-3:3b-0: kun du gsang ba'i ming yin @3b no ;
T02D2512-3:3b-1: / zhes bya ba ni skye bo thams cad kyi
T02D2512-3:3b-2: thun mong ma yin gyi phyogs bcu thams cad du
T02D2512-3:3b-3: rnal 'byor pa nyid la ming 'di dag grags pa
T02D2512-3:3b-4: yin no // nga ni 'jig rten gcig pu nyid //
T02D2512-3:3b-5: ces bya ba ni sems tsam gyi tshul gyis 'dod
T02D2512-3:3b-6: chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug nyid 'jig rten
T02D2512-3:3b-7: yin no // 'jig rten gsum du rab tu bshad /
T02D2512-3:3b-8: ces bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'i tshul gyis
T02D2512-3:3b-9: ni 'dod chags ni tshang ba zhe sdang ni drag
T02D2512-3:3b-10: po gti mug ni khyab 'jug yin no zhes rab
T02D2512-3:3b-11: tu bshad cing ngas ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis
T02D2512-3:3b-12: bskyed de bshad pa yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:3b-13: rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2512-3:3b-14: yang de ltar rnam par shes pa tsam du ni gcig tu zad la /
T02D2512-3:3b-15: de dbye ba'i tshul gyis ni rnam par gzhag pa ji ltar shes she na /
T02D2512-3:3b-16: nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid //
T02D2512-3:3b-18: gang gi phyir nga ni chos kyi dbyings thog ma
T02D2512-3:3b-19: dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni
T02D2512-3:3b-20: don dam par gcig pu nyid yin zhing byang chub
T02D2512-3:3b-21: kyi mtshan ma ming can gyi sems kyi ngo bo
T02D2512-3:3b-22: yin pas na 'dod pa yin la /
T02D2512-3:3b-23: 'di'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i lha'i
T02D2512-3:3b-24: gzugs can gyi tshangs pa yin pas na 'dod pa'o
T02D2512-3:3b-25: // drag po ni stobs bzangs kyi gzugs can no //
T02D2512-3:3b-26: g-yung drung ni dpyid kyi gzugs can khyab 'jug go //
T02D2512-3:3b-27: de bas na rgyu gcig gi rgyu mthun las byung
T02D2512-3:3b-28: ba nyid kyis na 'jig rten gsum po 'di dag
T02D2512-3:3b-29: gcig pu nyid yin no zhes rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D2512-3:3b-30: pos rab tu bshad cing gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:3b-31: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig yin te /
T02D2512-3:3b-32: de ltar 'jig rten gsum gyi de kho na nyid bshad nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la /
T02D2512-3:3b-33: ming po gsum po 'di'i mchog rdo rje 'chang dngos
T02D2512-3:3b-34: por 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa yang spang
T02D2512-3:3b-35: pas byang chub kyi mtshan can gyi sems rtogs pa
T02D2512-3:3b-37: don de'i phyir rdo rje bzang po zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:3b-38: stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje shin tu rdzogs par
T02D2512-3:3b-39: mdzad pas na rdo rje bzang po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2512-3:3b-40: gzugs ni gsum po 'di dag nyid //
T02D2512-3:3b-41: ces bya ba rgyal bar byed pa dang /
T02D2512-3:3b-43: don thams cad grub par byed pa'i lus gsum po ste de dag skyed par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-3:4a-2: gzugs gsum po 'di dag kho na'o //
T02D2512-3:4a-3: bdag nyid kho na byung ba yin //
T02D2512-3:4a-4: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi rang gi rgyud rgyal bar byed pa dang /
T02D2512-3:4a-6: don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:4a-7: rdo rje 'chang chen por byin gyis brlabs shing phyung
T02D2512-3:4a-8: la skyed par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:4a-9: ci'i phyir gzugs gsum po der bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid byin gyis rlob par mdzad ce na /
T02D2512-3:4a-11: rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smras //
T02D2512-3:4a-13: gang gi phyir sa 'og sa bla mtho ris pa'i
T02D2512-3:4a-14: rang bzhin can gyi ming po gsum la 'khor ba
T02D2512-3:4a-15: thog ma med pa nas rtag par lhag par dad
T02D2512-3:4a-17: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par du bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-3:4a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la lhag par mos pa'i sems la ltos pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:4a-19: tshangs pa sogs kyis 'dul zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-3:4a-20: tshangs pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshangs pa sogs kyis 'dul te /
T02D2512-3:4a-21: drag po dang khyab 'jug la sogs pas 'dul zhing de la mos pa'i sems can gang yin pa'o //
T02D2512-3:4a-22: yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin //
T02D2512-3:4a-23: zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gis 'dul ba'i 'jig
T02D2512-3:4a-24: rten 'di ni yang dag cing phyin ci ma log
T02D2512-3:4a-25: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed
T02D2512-3:4a-26: pa'i snod ma yin zhing skal ba med pa yin
T02D2512-3:4a-27: la de bas na gzugs gsum por bdag nyid byin
T02D2512-3:4a-28: gyis rlob par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:4a-29: de rnams sbyang pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gzugs gsum
T02D2512-3:4a-30: por bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pas sems can
T02D2512-3:4a-31: de rnams kyi dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i
T02D2512-3:4a-32: sems rnam par bsam par mdzad nas sangs rgyas pa
T02D2512-3:4a-33: thob pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D2512-3:4a-34: po rang nyid rgyal bar byed pa dang /
T02D2512-3:4a-36: don thams cad grub par byed pa'i gzugs mdzad par
T02D2512-3:4a-37: byed pa'i rgyu des gzugs gsum nyid kyis tshangs pa
T02D2512-3:4a-38: la sogs pa 'dul ba de rnams kyi sems rnam
T02D2512-3:4a-39: par sbyangs nas bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mdzad ce
T02D2512-3:4a-40: na / phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur //
T02D2512-3:4b-1: tshangs pa la sogs pa de rnams de bzhin nyid
T02D2512-3:4b-2: rtogs pas sa brgyad pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems
T02D2512-3:4b-4: phyis nas sangs rgyas nyid du rtag cing mi 'gyur bas skyed par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:4b-9: de la mos pa'i sems can rnams ming po gsum
T02D2512-3:4b-10: gyi tshul gyis rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i ting nge
T02D2512-3:4b-11: 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas nyid la nges par sbyar ba'i
T02D2512-3:4b-12: phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba gzugs gsum
T02D2512-3:4b-13: par bdag nyid kyis byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa
T02D2512-3:4b-14: yin no // de nas sems can de rnams gzugs gsum por 'dzin par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-3:4b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' las chos thos nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:4b-16: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2512-3:4b-17: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan
T02D2512-3:4b-18: 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos tshangs pa la sogs
T02D2512-3:4b-19: pa'i lha rnams sangs rgyas nyid la rab tu gzhag
T02D2512-3:4b-21: 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog kyang yin la dbang phyug
T02D2512-3:4b-22: chen po yang yin pas na 'jig rten gsum gyi
T02D2512-3:4b-24: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D2512-3:4b-25: der zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor der ro //
T02D2512-3:4b-26: rang gi zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi'o //
T02D2512-3:4b-27: gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni gsang ba ston par byed pa'am //
T02D2512-3:4b-28: gsang ba skyed par byed pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2512-3:4b-29: rang gi rab grub phyir rab phul //
T02D2512-3:4b-30: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid grub par byed pa'i phyir snying po phul ba ste /
T02D2512-3:4b-31: ming po gsum gyi tshul gyis gdul bya rnams sangs
T02D2512-3:4b-32: rgyas kyi byang chub tu grub cing mngon par byang
T02D2512-3:4b-33: chub pa thob par bya ba'i phyir tshangs pa la
T02D2512-3:4b-34: sogs pas rang gi snying po phul lo zhes bya
T02D2512-3:4b-37: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2512-3:4b-38: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-3:4b-39: aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba'i bshad pas
T02D2512-3:4b-40: ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no
T02D2512-3:4b-41: // bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-3:4b-42: gsum pa yang yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:5a-1: 'dzin gsum gsungs nas da ni dam tshig dbang bskur
T02D2512-3:5a-2: ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa
T02D2512-3:5a-3: bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:5a-4: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2512-3:5a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las
T02D2512-3:5a-6: kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa la sogs
T02D2512-3:5a-7: pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:5a-8: zur bzhi pa la zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-3:5a-10: snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid //
T02D2512-3:5a-11: tshangs pa drag po g-yung drug ste //
T02D2512-3:5a-12: ming po gsum po 'di nyid ni //
T02D2512-3:5a-13: nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o //
T02D2512-3:5a-14: zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni gsang ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:5a-15: gal te khyod kyis rtse gsum bcag / snying po snod min la smras pas //
T02D2512-3:5a-16: ji skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni //
T02D2512-3:5a-17: gal te 'di ni ma spyad dam //
T02D2512-3:5a-18: zhes bya ba'i dam tshig byin la slob ma rnams
T02D2512-3:5a-19: la de kho na nyid gsang ba brjod pa 'di
T02D2512-3:5a-20: bya zhing / bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:5a-21: 'jug pa'i glu dang zlos shing rdo rje shugs kyis
T02D2512-3:5a-23: cho ga lhag ma rnams ni sngar ming po gsum
T02D2512-3:5a-24: gyi nang du bshad zin pas de nyid las khong
T02D2512-3:5a-26: 'jig rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud kyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-3:5a-28: // / de ltar 'jig rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud gsungs nas /
T02D2512-3:5a-29: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:5a-30: sring mo bzhi 'byin pa'i rgyud gsungs pa yin no
T02D2512-3:5a-31: // de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2512-3:5a-32: dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-3:5a-33: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ming po
T02D2512-3:5a-34: gsum gyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa nyid yin no
T02D2512-3:5a-35: // kun du chags dang zhe sdang rmongs //
T02D2512-3:5a-36: brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
T02D2512-3:5a-37: zhes bya ba ni ming po gsum gyi rnal 'byor
T02D2512-3:5a-38: ba rnams kyis yang dag par sbyor ba'i sgom pas
T02D2512-3:5a-40: de ltar kun du chags pa dang zhe sdang dang
T02D2512-3:5a-41: gti mug ste ming po gsum gyi rang bzhin 'di
T02D2512-3:5a-42: rnams kyis brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
T02D2512-3:5a-43: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-3:5a-44: gal te gsang zhing ma bsrungs na //
T02D2512-3:5a-45: gang zhig sems can don zhugs dang //
T02D2512-3:5a-46: gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa //
T02D2512-3:5a-47: de rnams khyed kyis gsang bar 'gyur //
T02D2512-3:5b-0: zhes bya ba @5b ni dam tshig go //
T02D2512-3:5b-1: dkyil 'khor 'di'i bshad pa ni sngar bshad zin la 'dir khyad par ni 'di tsam du zad do //
T02D2512-3:5b-2: 'di lta ste hri h'um sh'i bhyo zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i glu yin no //
T02D2512-3:5b-3: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas glu'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2512-3:5b-4: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngar bshad pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:5b-5: 'dod chags la sogs dug gzhig phyir //
T02D2512-3:5b-6: zhes bya ba'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dug bsal ba ni dug gzhig pa ste de'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:5b-7: kun nas bdud rtsi nyid bya'i phyir //
T02D2512-3:5b-8: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu'i gdul bya rnams kun
T02D2512-3:5b-9: nas rang bzhin gyis dag par bsgoms pas thar pa
T02D2512-3:5b-10: mngon sum du byas pa ni bdud rtsi'o //
T02D2512-3:5b-11: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na bdud rtsi nyid de de'i don du'o //
T02D2512-3:5b-12: zhe sdang las byung glu yis ni //
T02D2512-3:5b-14: zhes bya ba ni 'di yang sngar bshad pa'i de nyid las shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:5b-16: 'di lta ste phu phu zhes bya ba 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:5b-17: de ltar glu'i dkyil 'khor gsungs nas da ni //
T02D2512-3:5b-18: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2512-3:5b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bgegs thams cad rnam
T02D2512-3:5b-20: par gzhom pa'i phyir gdon gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa
T02D2512-3:5b-21: yin no // de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni
T02D2512-3:5b-22: snga ma bzhin du log 'dren la sogs pa gdon
T02D2512-3:5b-23: thams cad las byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad de
T02D2512-3:5b-24: yin no // / de rnam par bsal zhing med
T02D2512-3:5b-25: par mdzad pas na sdug bsngal thams cad bsal ba
T02D2512-3:5b-26: yin no // / ste / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02D2512-3:5b-27: sems can kun ni bde ba'i phyir //
T02D2512-3:5b-28: zhes bya ba ni gdon la sogs pa las byung
T02D2512-3:5b-29: ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas sems can thams cad
T02D2512-3:5b-30: bde ba nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:5b-31: ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02D2512-3:5b-32: bde ba kho na'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:5b-33: gdon gyi dkyil 'khor phyung ba yin //
T02D2512-3:5b-34: zhes bya ba ni rims la sogs pas yongs su gang ba'i dkyil 'khor skyed par mdzad pas so //
T02D2512-3:5b-36: 'dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:5b-37: gang gi phyir dmigs pa la spyod pa'i sems can
T02D2512-3:5b-38: thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dug gis
T02D2512-3:5b-39: gso ba ma byas pa'i nyes byas kyis dug nyid
T02D2512-3:6a-1: ba yin zhing sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis //
T02D2512-3:6a-2: gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang //
T02D2512-3:6a-3: dmyal bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2512-3:6a-4: zhes bya ba yang de nyid yin gyis phyi rol gzhan dag ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:6a-5: de bas na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa
T02D2512-3:6a-6: las byung ba'i srin mo la sogs pa'i gdon gyi
T02D2512-3:6a-7: tshul can sdug bsngal thams cad skyed par byed pa'i
T02D2512-3:6a-8: rnam par rtog pa de rnams gzhig par bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:6a-9: phyir / bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon gyi dkyil 'khor phyung ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:6a-10: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gnas skabs te /
T02D2512-3:6a-11: gdug pa skyed par byed pa yi ge hrim ngo //
T02D2512-3:6a-13: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2512-3:6a-14: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te hrim zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:6a-15: bar gyis ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa
T02D2512-3:6a-16: yin no // de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:6a-17: de ltar bsdus pa srin po la sogs pa'i gdon rnams bkug ste /
T02D2512-3:6a-18: rdo rje lcags kyus khro bo la sogs pa dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D2512-3:6a-20: dbang du byas la slob dpon gyis srin po la
T02D2512-3:6a-21: sogs pa'i gdon gzhom par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:6a-22: bris la / srin po la sogs pa'i gdon gzhom
T02D2512-3:6a-23: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di bstan par
T02D2512-3:6a-24: bya ba'i phyir zur bzhi ba zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-3:6a-25: sogs pas gdon gzhom pa'i slob dpon gyi las kyi
T02D2512-3:6a-26: cho ga gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:6a-27: zur bzhi pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-3:6a-28: de nas zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil
T02D2512-3:6a-29: 'khor de'i dbus dang por zhes bya ba las kyi
T02D2512-3:6a-30: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i thog mar dkyil 'khor du
T02D2512-3:6a-36: klu la sogs pa'i rig pa mchog gi rgyud las gsungs pa'i gdon bco brgyad dang /
T02D2512-3:6a-37: sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'i sgras rim pa brgyad po
T02D2512-3:6a-38: skyes bu gcer bu gdong gnag pa skra gyen du
T02D2512-3:6a-39: brdzes pa / sdig pa zhes bya ba yi dags kyi khyad par rnams dang /
T02D2512-3:6a-40: mnar med pa la sogs pa'i dmyal ba brgyad dang /
T02D2512-3:6a-41: nye 'khor ba'i dmyal ba rnams so //
T02D2512-3:6a-42: de rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni yul dang
T02D2512-3:6a-43: grong dang 'jig rten gyi bkong pa'i dbyibs rnams bri
T02D2512-3:6b-0: bar bya'o // de ltar @6b dkyil 'khor de bris
T02D2512-3:6b-1: pa'i rdzes thogs nyid la rdo rje me ltar 'bar
T02D2512-3:6b-2: ba'i rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor chen po byas la
T02D2512-3:6b-3: bar bya'o // / gtsug tor la sogs pa yang rang gi lus la bkod de /
T02D2512-3:6b-4: de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor 'dir slob dpon
T02D2512-3:6b-5: gyi 'jug pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
T02D2512-3:6b-6: bshad cing gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:6b-7: ji ltar 'jug par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-3:6b-8: myur du zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2512-3:6b-9: myur du ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D2512-3:6b-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhugs nas ni //
T02D2512-3:6b-11: khros pas rkang pa g-yon pas mnye //
T02D2512-3:6b-13: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis khro bo'i rdo rje thogs te /
T02D2512-3:6b-14: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur sdigs mdzub byed pa
T02D2512-3:6b-15: la brtson pas dkyil 'khor de rkang pa g-yon pas
T02D2512-3:6b-16: mnye bar bya'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-3:6b-18: gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa log 'dren la sogs
T02D2512-3:6b-19: pa nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe rdo
T02D2512-3:6b-20: rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor chen
T02D2512-3:6b-21: por byas pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs
T02D2512-3:6b-22: pa nas / rdo rje shugs kyi bar du rang gi lus la bkod nas /
T02D2512-3:6b-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul
T02D2512-3:6b-24: gyis bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgoms
T02D2512-3:6b-25: la de'i rjes thogs nyid la bdag nyid rdo rje
T02D2512-3:6b-26: me ltar 'bar ba slar yang bsams te /
T02D2512-3:6b-27: dkyil 'khor 'di ri rab kyi steng du h'um las sprul pa bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:6b-28: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i khro bo la sogs
T02D2512-3:6b-29: pa las kyi phyag rgya bzhis gdon la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:6b-30: cho ga rgyas pas bkug nas bcug ste bcings la
T02D2512-3:6b-31: 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas bcings nas hrim badzra tishtha mandala
T02D2512-3:6b-32: audtha pa la zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor de bar
T02D2512-3:6b-33: snang gi phyogs su bzhag la rdo rje me ltar
T02D2512-3:6b-34: 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-3:6b-35: yi ge h'um gis bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la
T02D2512-3:6b-36: h'um zlos shing yongs su bskor nas thig gdab pa
T02D2512-3:6b-37: dang tshon dgye ba byas te /
T02D2512-3:6b-38: rig pa mchog las gsungs pa'i gdon bco brgyad dang /
T02D2512-3:6b-39: 'phags pa dpung bzangs las bshad pa'i log 'dren rnams dang /
T02D2512-3:6b-40: sngar bshad pa'i rims brgyad dang /
T02D2512-3:6b-41: sdig pa dang dmyal ba rnams yi ge h'im zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:7a-1: sgo dbye ba dang bsdu ba byas la /
T02D2512-3:7a-2: rdo rje lcags kyu'i khro bo la sogs pas de dag dgug pa dang bcing ba byas la /
T02D2512-3:7a-3: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis khro bo'i rdo rje thogs te /
T02D2512-3:7a-4: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sdigs mdzub byed pa la brtson pa dang /
T02D2512-3:7a-5: glu'i tshig zlos shing rab tu dgod pa dang /
T02D2512-3:7a-6: dkyil 'khor der zhugs la khros pa dang /
T02D2512-3:7a-7: rkang pa g-yon pas mnye bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:7a-8: de la glu ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-3:7a-9: sarba aa gha mandala mi dam badzra dha ra aa
T02D2512-3:7a-10: kra ma bi ki ra bi ki ra badzro da
T02D2512-3:7a-11: ya n'a sha ya ha na da ha na pa
T02D2512-3:7a-12: tsa bha smi ku ru kru dha h'um ka ra
T02D2512-3:7a-13: ma de na / de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2512-3:7a-14: rdo rje khu tshur dang rdo rje gtsug tor gyis
T02D2512-3:7a-15: bdag nyid bsrung ba byas la rang gi lha'i sbyor
T02D2512-3:7a-17: sdug bsngal thams cad las 'don pa'i rgyud kyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-3:7a-19: // / de ltar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams bshad nas /
T02D2512-3:7a-20: da ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2512-3:7a-21: lha thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la lhag par mos
T02D2512-3:7a-22: pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:7a-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:7a-24: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig yin te /
T02D2512-3:7a-25: dang po'i sbyor pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-3:7a-26: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal
T02D2512-3:7a-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa
T02D2512-3:7a-28: yin no // kun mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug ste //
T02D2512-3:7a-29: zhes bya ba ni kun gyi mchog kyang yin la
T02D2512-3:7a-30: dam pa'i dbang phyug kyang yin pas na kun mchog
T02D2512-3:7a-31: dbang phyug ste dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:7a-32: de yang thams cad kyi mchog yin pas na kun mchog go //
T02D2512-3:7a-33: de nyid ni dam pa ste phul du byung ba
T02D2512-3:7a-34: yin zhing khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i chos kyi
T02D2512-3:7a-35: rgyal srid la mnga' brnyes pas na dbang phyug go
T02D2512-3:7a-36: // sems can don kun rab sgrub byed //
T02D2512-3:7a-37: ces bya ba ni rigs lnga'i lha rnams kyis 'dul pa'i sems can kun yin te /
T02D2512-3:7a-38: de rnams kyi rab tu sgrub pa ni rigs lnga rtogs par gyur pa ste de'i don du'o //
T02D2512-3:7a-39: dkyil 'khor thams cad gsungs pa yin //
T02D2512-3:7b-0: zhes bya ba ni bcom @7b ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D2512-3:7b-1: gzugs kun gyis zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang
T02D2512-3:7b-2: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams kyi gzugs so
T02D2512-3:7b-3: // dus gang gi tshe zhe na /
T02D2512-3:7b-4: gang tshe gsang ba chen po lnga'o //
T02D2512-3:7b-5: de nyid kyis ni mi 'dul 'gyur zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:7b-6: gsang ba chen po'i de kho na nyid lnga ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2512-3:7b-10: nor bu'i rigs rnams kyis gang gi tshe 'dul bar
T02D2512-3:7b-11: ma gyur pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2512-3:7b-12: pa nyid la 'jog par mi nus pa de'i tshe
T02D2512-3:7b-13: sna tshogs chen po bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul
T02D2512-3:7b-14: ba'i skye bo skal pa dang ldan pa rnams la
T02D2512-3:7b-15: dam pa ste / mchog 'di mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:7b-17: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2512-3:7b-18: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-3:7b-21: zhes bya ba ni bar gyis bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:7b-22: de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba ni gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:7b-23: de ltar bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs nas /
T02D2512-3:7b-24: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D2512-3:7b-25: rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-3:7b-26: ba'i phyir / de nas gang gi phyir zhes bya
T02D2512-3:7b-27: ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho
T02D2512-3:7b-28: ga dang slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2512-3:7b-30: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2512-3:7b-31: las kyi cho ga'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-3:7b-32: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste gang
T02D2512-3:7b-33: gi phyir bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byed
T02D2512-3:7b-34: pa des 'dul pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du
T02D2512-3:7b-35: mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir dkyil 'khor chen po ste
T02D2512-3:7b-36: / bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste mchog tu
T02D2512-3:7b-37: gyur pas rab tu phye ste bshad par bya'o zhes
T02D2512-3:7b-38: / pa'o // kun mchog ni 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D2512-3:7b-39: rten las 'das pa'i tshul yang dag par ston pa
T02D2512-3:7b-40: yin zhes gang du 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams
T02D2512-3:7b-41: rnams las rnam bar rgyal ba yin bas na kun
T02D2512-3:8a-1: dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems can skal ba dang
T02D2512-3:8a-2: ldan pa rnams la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
T02D2512-3:8a-3: 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi gzugs
T02D2512-3:8a-5: de nyid kyis na bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni
T02D2512-3:8a-6: kun mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug yin no zhes bya
T02D2512-3:8a-7: ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris
T02D2512-3:8a-8: nas ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2512-3:8a-9: bris la / de'i dbus su zhes bya ba'i dkyil
T02D2512-3:8a-10: 'khor dbus ma'i lte ba'i phyogs su rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:8a-11: dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po thig btab cing kun du
T02D2512-3:8a-12: bris la ming de skad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:8a-13: de'i lte ba'i phyogs su sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2512-3:8a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gzhag par byas te
T02D2512-3:8a-15: bris la / / 'di ni cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
T02D2512-3:8a-16: ci de 'ba' zhig gam zhe na /
T02D2512-3:8a-17: rdo rje lha mo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:8a-21: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma ni rdo rje lha mo'o //
T02D2512-3:8a-22: sogs pa'i sgra ni dus kyi mchod pa dang /
T02D2512-3:8a-23: rdo rje sgeg mo rnams dang /
T02D2512-3:8a-25: rdo rje lha mo la sogs pas yongs su gang ba'i dkyil 'khor ram /
T02D2512-3:8a-26: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje
T02D2512-3:8a-27: lha mo la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te der ro
T02D2512-3:8a-28: // de yi ngos ni thams cad du //
T02D2512-3:8a-29: zhes bya ba ni re'u cha dbus mar dpal rdo
T02D2512-3:8a-30: rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris pa de'i
T02D2512-3:8a-31: phyogs bzhir de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2512-3:8a-34: nam mkha'i snying po kun mchog lhag pa'i sku rnams
T02D2512-3:8a-35: kyis mtshan pa'i mchog rdo rje dang bcas pa 'khor
T02D2512-3:8a-36: lo la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni rdo
T02D2512-3:8a-37: rje mchog bcas mtshan ma rnams rdo rjes mtshan pa'i
T02D2512-3:8a-38: 'khor lo la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2512-3:8a-39: go // ma zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par
T02D2512-3:8a-40: gzung ba ste rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mtshan nyid do
T02D2512-3:8a-41: go // // sku gzugs la sogs gzhag par bya //
T02D2512-3:8a-42: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:8a-43: rang gi rigs kyi lha'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor
T02D2512-3:8a-44: ba ni rang gi rigs kyis bskor ba zhes bya'o
T02D2512-3:8a-45: // rgyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i //
T02D2512-3:8b-1: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2512-3:8b-2: mdzad kyi sred med kyi bu'i gzugs 'dzin pa phyag
T02D2512-3:8b-3: na 'khor lo bsnams pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:8b-4: khyab bdag rdo rje can rdo rje //
T02D2512-3:8b-5: gtum dbang rdo rje gdung bsnams pa //
T02D2512-3:8b-6: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar
T02D2512-3:8b-7: rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug
T02D2512-3:8b-8: gi gzugs 'dzin pa rdo rje gdung bsnams pa bri
T02D2512-3:8b-9: bar bya'o // rdo rje pad 'byung padma can //
T02D2512-3:8b-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs gzugs ldan //
T02D2512-3:8b-11: zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
T02D2512-3:8b-12: phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang rdo rje
T02D2512-3:8b-13: 'dzin pa ni tshangs pa'i gzugs su bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-3:8b-14: // nam mkha'i snying po 'dod gzugs can //
T02D2512-3:8b-15: rdo rje dang bcas me tog mchog //
T02D2512-3:8b-16: ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam
T02D2512-3:8b-17: mkha'i snying po ni 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa
T02D2512-3:8b-18: la rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gzhu bsnams te bzhugs pa
T02D2512-3:8b-19: bri bar bya'o// gzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me'i mtshams su rdo rje dpal mo /
T02D2512-3:8b-20: bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje dkar mo /
T02D2512-3:8b-21: rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje sgrol ma //
T02D2512-3:8b-22: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su nam mkha'i rdo rje ma bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:8b-23: de nas 'di rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-3:8b-24: phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su //
T02D2512-3:8b-25: zhes bya ba ni lha'i snam bu'o //
T02D2512-3:8b-26: rdo rje mtshan ma rang phyogs gnas //
T02D2512-3:8b-27: zhes bya ba ni drag po la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D2512-3:8b-28: ma rdo rjes mtshan pa'i tri sh'u la la sogs
T02D2512-3:8b-29: pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje mtshan ma
T02D2512-3:8b-30: ste / de shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs su
T02D2512-3:8b-31: gnas pa ni rang gi phyogs su gnas pa bri
T02D2512-3:8b-32: ste / ba yin no // rdo rje'i mtshan ma
T02D2512-3:8b-33: rang gi phyogs su gnas par bri ba de gang
T02D2512-3:8b-35: lha dbang dang ni ma mo nyid //
T02D2512-3:8b-37: lha'i dbang po ni drag po la sogs pa nas chu lha'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2512-3:8b-38: de rnams kyi chung ma ni ma mo'o //
T02D2512-3:8b-39: de nyid ni lha'i dbang po ma mo dang bcas
T02D2512-3:8b-40: pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams yin te de rnams
T02D2512-3:8b-41: dgod par bya'o // tshogs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi //
T02D2512-3:8b-42: rol mo'i che bcu rdung byed la //
T02D2512-3:8b-43: phyi yi dkyil 'khor kha khyer dang //
T02D2512-3:8b-44: sgo dang mtshams su'ang de bri'o //
T02D2512-3:8b-45: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir sgeg mo la sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-3:9a-1: su lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:9a-2: sgo rnams kun du 'jug pa ni //
T02D2512-3:9a-3: rang gi phyag rgyas rab tu 'jug / ces bya
T02D2512-3:9a-4: ba ni sngar bshad pa'i 'jug pa'i cho gas rdo
T02D2512-3:9a-9: nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:9a-10: dang po'i sbyor bas dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2512-3:9a-11: dam pa lnga ru zhes bya ba ni gzhi'i dkyil
T02D2512-3:9a-12: 'khor du dang por dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho
T02D2512-3:9a-14: de nas dbus su gnas gyur nas //
T02D2512-3:9a-15: dgug pa 'di ni bya ba yin //
T02D2512-3:9a-16: zhes bya ba ni de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas
T02D2512-3:9a-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas te ji
T02D2512-3:9a-18: lta ba bzhin du zhugs te /
T02D2512-3:9a-19: de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D2512-3:9a-20: 'dug par bsams pas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas dkyil
T02D2512-3:9a-22: de rjes la 'og nas bshad pa'i dgug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:9a-23: gsang ba'i lcags kyu dril bcas pas //
T02D2512-3:9a-24: 'dir ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa go bar zad do //
T02D2512-3:9a-25: de dag go rims ji bzhin du /
T02D2512-3:9a-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02D2512-3:9a-27: zhes bya ba ni re zhig dang por rdo rje
T02D2512-3:9a-28: sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams rang gi
T02D2512-3:9a-29: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de bzhin nyid
T02D2512-3:9a-34: nor bu'i rigs kyi lha rnams bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2512-3:9a-35: 'di ni 'dir go rims ji bzhin bsgrub par bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
T02D2512-3:9a-36: sgrub pa dag ni thams cad dang //
T02D2512-3:9a-37: dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no ;
T02D2512-3:9a-38: / zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2512-3:9a-42: nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams su lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa gsungs pa dang /
T02D2512-3:9a-43: lha thams cad kyi dngos grub gsungs pa de thams
T02D2512-3:9a-44: cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa sgrub pa
T02D2512-3:9a-47: bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur gnas //
T02D2512-3:9a-48: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:9a-49: bde ba yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas bde ba thams cad de /
T02D2512-3:9a-50: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa lha thams cad
T02D2512-3:9b-0: kyi bde ba @9b gnyis su med pa sems dang
T02D2512-3:9b-1: sems las byung ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2512-3:9b-2: de nyid ni mi 'gyur ba'i gnas te chos kyi
T02D2512-3:9b-3: dbyings thog ma tha ma med pa'i rang bzhin sems
T02D2512-3:9b-4: can gyi khams thams cad dang /
T02D2512-3:9b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bde ba mngon sum du byed pa'i gzhir gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-3:9b-6: bde ba chen po zhes bshad do //
T02D2512-3:9b-7: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:9b-8: rdo rje 'di ni bsgrub la sogs //
T02D2512-3:9b-10: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje'i
T02D2512-3:9b-11: rang bzhin yin pas bde ba chen po de ni
T02D2512-3:9b-13: de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la yang nye bar brtags pas de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2512-3:9b-14: sgrub pa 'di la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed par bsgrubs nas sgrub pa po /
T02D2512-3:9b-15: tshe 'di nyid la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:9b-16: de ltar bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'grub par 'gyur bar bshad do zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2512-3:9b-17: sna tshogs pa yang yin la don dam pa yang yin pas sna tshogs pa'i don te /
T02D2512-3:9b-18: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2512-3:9b-19: des rnam par sbyang ba ni lha tshogs pa la
T02D2512-3:9b-20: mos pa'i sems cad kyi khams rnams rigs lnga po
T02D2512-3:9b-21: rtogs pas 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba'o
T02D2512-3:9b-22: // de'i don gyi cho ga ni lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D2512-3:9b-23: phyag 'tshal ba dang dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:9b-24: de ltar 'gro ba dpag tu med pa ste /
T02D2512-3:9b-25: sems can gyi khams tshad med pa des 'dul zhing
T02D2512-3:9b-26: lam rtogs pa la gzhag pa ni 'gro ba dpag
T02D2512-3:9b-27: tu med pa kun btul ba ste /
T02D2512-3:9b-28: de nyid ni mtha' med pa yang yin la sna
T02D2512-3:9b-29: tshogs pa yang yin pas na mtha' med pa'i sna
T02D2512-3:9b-30: tshogs pa ste / mnyam pa med pa ni mtshungs pa med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:9b-32: phul du gyur pa ni mchog gu gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-3:9b-33: ji ltar na phul du byung ba yin zhen /
T02D2512-3:9b-34: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad 'dzin pas na /
T02D2512-3:9b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2512-3:10a-0: de byed pa yang yin la bde ba'i mchog kyang yin pas na de byed pa'i @10a * //
T02D2512-3:10a-2: rgyal ba thams cad de de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-3:10a-3: cad kyis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs
T02D2512-3:10a-4: shing brtan par mdzad pas na srid pa ba'i bde
T02D2512-3:10a-6: gdul bya rnams kyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las
T02D2512-3:10a-7: 'das pa'i bde ba skyed par byed pa nyid yin
T02D2512-3:10a-8: pa'i phyir ro // yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-3:10a-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas rdo rje dbyings
T02D2512-3:10a-10: kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor ji lta
T02D2512-3:10a-11: ba bzhin du byas la 'di las bshad pa'i byin
T02D2512-3:10a-13: dbang bskur ba dang dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul
T02D2512-3:10a-14: zhugs kyang blangs nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la
T02D2512-3:10a-15: sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag
T02D2512-3:10a-16: nyid yang dag par mchod la rnam par sgeg pa'i
T02D2512-3:10a-17: dga' ba'i rdo rje dang phyag bzhis kyang phyag byas
T02D2512-3:10a-18: la de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig
T02D2512-3:10a-19: bzung nas h'um zhes lan gsum bzlas la /
T02D2512-3:10a-20: dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa byas nas rang gi snying ga'i zla bar yid kyis zhugs la /
T02D2512-3:10a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings te h'um aa h'um hr'im tram zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-3:10a-22: der bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul la lha thams cad
T02D2512-3:10a-23: kyi rang rang gi gnas su rang rang gi snying
T02D2512-3:10a-24: pos lha thams cad rang rang gi gzugs su bkod
T02D2512-3:10a-25: la / aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:10a-26: la sogs pa'i snying po gsum bzlas la snga ma
T02D2512-3:10a-27: bzhin du don gsum bsgoms te /
T02D2512-3:10a-28: bdag ni rang nyid bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor yin no
T02D2512-3:10a-29: zhes nga rgyal bskyed la bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2512-3:10a-31: dus ji srid kyis bdag nyid bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:10a-32: gyi ngo bo nyid du mngon sum ltar mthong bar
T02D2512-3:10a-33: gyur pa de srid kyi bar du nyin re'i sbyor
T02D2512-3:10a-35: de nas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du sngar bshad
T02D2512-3:10a-36: pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas
T02D2512-3:10a-37: brtsams te bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:10a-38: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2512-3:10a-39: dbus su snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad
T02D2512-3:10a-41: slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D2512-3:10a-42: lha lhag par gnas par byas nas nyi ma 'char
T02D2512-3:10b-0: @10b ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o
T02D2512-3:10b-1: // de la re zhig dang por rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:10b-2: dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya'o
T02D2512-3:10b-3: // // de la dkyil 'khor dbus kyi re'u cha
T02D2512-3:10b-4: la yang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa
T02D2512-3:10b-5: 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i gnas su rnam par snang
T02D2512-3:10b-7: ki li ki la'i gnas su rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-3:10b-8: rdo rje dran ma'i gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-3:10b-9: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i gnas su 'phags
T02D2512-3:10b-10: pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab par
T02D2512-3:10b-11: bya'o // de nas tshon sna lnga'i phye mas rten
T02D2512-3:10b-12: dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad bris nas bcom
T02D2512-3:10b-13: ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D2512-3:10b-14: rang gi dkyil 'khor du dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:10b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog nag po khyab 'jug gi gzugs can /
T02D2512-3:10b-16: phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas pa gnyis na rdo rje 'khor lo dang dbyug ba bsnams pa /
T02D2512-3:10b-17: g-yon gnyis na gcig gis mdud bsnams pa /
T02D2512-3:10b-18: gnyis pas gdan la snyems pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa
T02D2512-3:10b-19: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas shar phyogs su gzigs te
T02D2512-3:10b-20: bzhugs par bya'o // aom badzra ga dha yan tshinda
T02D2512-3:10b-21: aa pra ti ha ta badzra tsa kre na ho
T02D2512-3:10b-22: bha ga b'an badzra ta th'a ga ta dza: h'um
T02D2512-3:10b-23: bam ho: badzra dha ra stam /
T02D2512-3:10b-24: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa'i snying pos rang gi gnas su dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:10b-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba gtum pa'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pa /
T02D2512-3:10b-27: spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa /
T02D2512-3:10b-28: g-yas rdo rje rtse gsum dang rdo rje 'bar ba bsnams pa /
T02D2512-3:10b-29: g-yon gyi gcig gis thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D2512-3:10b-30: gnyis pas ral gri bsnams pa snying po 'dis dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:10b-31: h'um badzra kro dha ma h'a yo gi n'i /
T02D2512-3:10b-32: ga ne shva ra ma h'a badzra sh'u lo gra
T02D2512-3:10b-33: bra ne ho bha ga b'an badzra tsindha shva r'a
T02D2512-3:10b-34: ya ha ha ha ha ho //
T02D2512-3:10b-35: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:10b-36: rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa yang thig bdun gyi nang du bya'o //
T02D2512-3:11a-0: de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs @11a * //
T02D2512-3:11a-2: sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa phyag g-yas pa gnyis na phreng ba dang dbyug pa bsnams pa /
T02D2512-3:11a-3: g-yon gnyis na spyi blugs dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D2512-3:11a-4: rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su snying po 'dis dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:11a-6: padmod bha ga b'a na badzra aa ba lo ki
T02D2512-3:11a-7: te shva r'a ya ma h'a brahma siddha aom bhur
T02D2512-3:11a-8: bhu ba sva: ri na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2512-3:11a-9: padma'i ting nge 'dzin bzang po la sogs pa snga ma kho na ltar bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:11a-10: de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02D2512-3:11a-11: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po rang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:11a-12: gyi dbus na 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin
T02D2512-3:11a-13: pa sku mdog dmar po phyag mtshan rdo rje me
T02D2512-3:11a-14: tog dang bcas pa snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-3:11a-15: // he badzra ku su me aa su dha sarba
T02D2512-3:11a-16: karma na me sa d'a ya hi bha ga b'an
T02D2512-3:11a-17: badzra a'a k'a sha garbha ba da da tr'am /
T02D2512-3:11a-18: dbang bskur pa'i rin po che la sogs pa gzhan dag ni de bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:11a-19: yang gzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me'i mtshams su bcom ldan
T02D2512-3:11a-20: 'das yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2512-3:11a-21: phyin pa dpal mo'i gzugs 'dzin pa /
T02D2512-3:11a-22: sku mdog gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba phyag g-yas
T02D2512-3:11a-23: na 'khor lo g-yon pa na padma bsnams pa snying
T02D2512-3:11a-25: na mo ye na sa tye na bha ga wa
T02D2512-3:11a-26: ti pra dzny'a p'a ra mi ta spu ta tshindha
T02D2512-3:11a-28: te na sa tye na ba ba ka na aom dh'i shr'i shuddhi bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2512-3:11a-29: de nas bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2512-3:11a-30: ma au ma'i gzugs 'dzin ma gser gyi mdog can
T02D2512-3:11a-31: phyag g-yas na rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams pa /
T02D2512-3:11a-32: g-yon na mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'i snying po 'dis bris bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:11a-33: aom badzra goo r'i ma hi ba dhe tree lo
T02D2512-3:11a-34: kya badzr'a ya shva ri badzra kro dha aagni sa
T02D2512-3:11a-35: ma ye badzra dha rin ma stu te /
T02D2512-3:11a-38: le li la lo badzra k'a ma ka ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2512-3:11a-39: rlung gi mtshams su sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yon gyis padma bsnams pa /
T02D2512-3:11a-40: phyag g-yas kyis mchog stsol ba /
T02D2512-3:11a-42: na mo ye na satye na ma bha ga wa
T02D2512-3:11a-43: ti buddha bo dhi ra nutta ra badzra dharma pra
T02D2512-3:11a-44: yo ge na te na sa tye na si ddha
T02D2512-3:11b-0: mam aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re @11b
T02D2512-3:11b-1: sv'a h'a / de nas dbang ldan gyi mtshams su
T02D2512-3:11b-2: nam mkha' rdo rje ma dga' ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa
T02D2512-3:11b-3: sv'a h'a / / sku mdog dmar po rdo rje
T02D2512-3:11b-4: dang bcas pas mtshon cha bsnams pa snying po 'dis
T02D2512-3:11b-5: sv'a h'a / / bri par bya'o // aom karma
T02D2512-3:11b-6: badzra ni si da si bi shuddha si sv'a bh'a
T02D2512-3:11b-7: sv'a h'a / / bri par bya'o // ba ta
T02D2512-3:11b-8: / ga gnod bha ba yo ge na siddha mam
T02D2512-3:11b-11: ga ga na bi shuddhi sarba aa bhi pr'a ya pa ri p'u ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2512-3:11b-12: de bzhin du gzhi'i dkyil 'khor phyi'i mtshams bzhir sgeg
T02D2512-3:11b-13: mo la sogs pa yang dag par bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-3:11b-14: // phyi dang nang gi sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:11b-15: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu la 'dod pa'i lha dang /
T02D2512-3:11b-17: bde byed la sogs pa chung ma dang bcas pa
T02D2512-3:11b-18: dum bu dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:11b-19: las bshad pa'i tshul du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:11b-20: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer la rdo
T02D2512-3:11b-21: rje tshogs kyi dbang phyug ma pi wang len pa
T02D2512-3:11b-23: gling bu len pa la brtson pa bcu /
T02D2512-3:11b-26: rnga bo che brdung ba bcu /
T02D2512-3:11b-27: rdza rnga brdung ba'i sbyor bas gnas pa bcu /
T02D2512-3:11b-28: glu ring len pas gnas pa bcu /
T02D2512-3:11b-29: munydza len pas gnas pa bcu /
T02D2512-3:11b-30: ti mi la len pa bcu ste /
T02D2512-3:11b-31: rdo rje tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcu h'um zhes bya bas gnas pa bcu bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:11b-32: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du sgo phye la
T02D2512-3:11b-33: bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod
T02D2512-3:11b-34: la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02D2512-3:11b-35: gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma rdo rje dri la bu
T02D2512-3:11b-36: dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad bkug
T02D2512-3:11b-37: ste / snying po 'dis dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:11b-38: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satye ta siddha h'um
T02D2512-3:11b-39: sarba ta th'a ga ta na sa m'a karsha ya
T02D2512-3:11b-40: dza:/ sarba badzra ku la aa dhi pam da ma yi ta pra be sha ya h'um /
T02D2512-3:11b-42: pra be sha ya sa ma ya ba ra bandha na:/
T02D2512-3:11b-43: sarba ratna aa dhi bam ma ni ro dzam ba shi ku ru ho h'um aa h'um hr'i tr'am /
T02D2512-3:11b-44: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba
T02D2512-3:11b-45: la sogs pa byas la rdo rje khu tshur gyis
T02D2512-3:11b-47: rdo rje go chas srung ba thams cad yang dag
T02D2512-3:11b-48: bar bsrungs la bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i
T02D2512-3:12a-2: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo
T02D2512-3:12a-3: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas chu lha'i bar
T02D2512-3:12a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rang rang
T02D2512-3:12a-6: gi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa ltar bsgrub par bya'o
T02D2512-3:12a-7: // 'dod pa'i lha dang tshangs pa la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:12a-8: ni h'um dri shya sa ma ya stvam sa ma
T02D2512-3:12a-9: ya ho dham dza: h'um bam ho: zhes lan gsum
T02D2512-3:12a-10: zlos shing dang po'i rdo rjes bcings la tshogs kyi
T02D2512-3:12a-11: dbang phyug gi bar du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:12a-12: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa chos dang las dang /
T02D2512-3:12a-13: phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:12a-14: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni
T02D2512-3:12a-15: rang gi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang
T02D2512-3:12a-16: bskur ro // rdo rje sred med kyi bu la
T02D2512-3:12a-17: sogs pa bzhi ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag
T02D2512-3:12a-19: de nas slob dpon gyi cho ga thams cad snga ma bzhin du rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:12a-20: rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa las khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-3:12a-21: ji ltar bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-3:12a-22: dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho gas bsdus pa'i dkyil
T02D2512-3:12a-23: 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa zlos shing 'jug
T02D2512-3:12a-24: par bya'o // de'i rjes la rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:12a-25: la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du rang gi cho gas
T02D2512-3:12a-26: par bya'o // so // slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02D2512-3:12a-27: de nas slob ma bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad
T02D2512-3:12a-28: pa'i klu'i mchod pa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du bcug la
T02D2512-3:12a-29: / de'i 'og tu rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2512-3:12a-30: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:12a-31: du gzhug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad
T02D2512-3:12a-32: / par bya'o // slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs so //
T02D2512-3:12a-33: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par rdzogs so /
T02D2512-3:12a-35: // / rtog pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rtog pa thams cad de /
T02D2512-3:12a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bcu po bshad ma thag pa nyid do //
T02D2512-3:12a-37: de nyid ni rgyud phyi ma yin la de bas
T02D2512-3:12a-38: na rtsa ba'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs pa yin no
T02D2512-3:12a-39: // de ltar rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma dang /
T02D2512-3:12a-40: rtsa ba'i rgyud bshad nas da ni de las kyi
T02D2512-3:12b-0: sgrib pa'i dbang gis rnal 'byor @12b pas ma grub
T02D2512-3:12b-1: na / gsang ba'i le'u'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i dngos
T02D2512-3:12b-2: grub thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i khyad par gyi
T02D2512-3:12b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:12b-5: sangs rgyas kun ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D2512-3:12b-6: kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang
T02D2512-3:12b-8: de rnams kyi gsang ba yang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas gsang ba che ste /
T02D2512-3:12b-9: skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i
T02D2512-3:12b-10: lha mo bzhi dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pa'i bcom
T02D2512-3:12b-12: dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ni de nyid dam
T02D2512-3:12b-13: tshig kyang yin la mchog kyang yin pas na dam
T02D2512-3:12b-14: tshig mchog go // de'i sgrub pa ni dpal dgyes pa chen po'i gnas te der bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:12b-16: rgyal po mchog ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2512-3:12b-17: slar yang gnas kyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:12b-18: phyir bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-3:12b-19: pa gsungs te / bde ba chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:12b-20: de'i gzhal yas khang pa ni bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang pa'o //
T02D2512-3:12b-21: dngos grub kun gyi ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams te /
T02D2512-3:12b-22: de dag gis mngon par 'du byas pa ni rdzogs pa'am /
T02D2512-3:12b-23: de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
T02D2512-3:12b-24: rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2512-3:12b-25: la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dus te
T02D2512-3:12b-26: byon pa ni / de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po'i rin chen rgyal po'o //
T02D2512-3:12b-27: sogs pa'i sgras ni gzungs dang /
T02D2512-3:12b-30: byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:12b-31: de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2512-3:12b-32: rin chen rgyal po la sogs pa de rnams kyis brgyan pa de yin no //
T02D2512-3:12b-33: bde ba chen po chags pa che ;
T02D2512-3:12b-34: / zhes bya ba la bde ba chen po yang
T02D2512-3:12b-35: yin la chags pa chen po yang yin pas na
T02D2512-3:12b-36: / bde ba chen po chags pa che ste /
T02D2512-3:12b-37: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:12b-38: dngos grub kun la rjes chags phyir //
T02D2512-3:12b-39: bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che //
T02D2512-3:13a-2: dpal rdor sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02D2512-3:13a-3: zhes 'og nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:13a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' de'i glu ni 'og nas 'chad
T02D2512-3:13a-5: par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can yi ge h'um gi
T02D2512-3:13a-7: de dag gi rjes su chags pa ni rjes su
T02D2512-3:13a-8: sgrub pa bde ba chen po chags pa chen po'i
T02D2512-3:13a-9: glu dang rol mo rjes su chags pa gang la
T02D2512-3:13a-10: yod pa de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
T02D2512-3:13a-11: bla med dga' ba chen po yi //
T02D2512-3:13a-12: mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod //
T02D2512-3:13a-13: ces bya ba la bla na med pa'i dga' ba
T02D2512-3:13a-14: chen po'i yid bde bas 'dod chags rdo rje ma
T02D2512-3:13a-15: la sogs pa'i mchod pa bcu gnyis dang /
T02D2512-3:13a-16: phyi'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad
T02D2512-3:13a-17: kyis rab tu mchod pa gang yin pa der ro
T02D2512-3:13a-18: // dga' ba chen po zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-3:13a-19: chen po ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi
T02D2512-3:13a-20: thugs dang sems can gyi don la chags pas ni
T02D2512-3:13a-21: dga' ba chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:13a-22: de'i dpal gyi gnas ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma
T02D2512-3:13a-23: la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal
T02D2512-3:13a-24: yas khang pa'o // de lta bu'i gnas kyi mchog de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:13a-25: rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog / ces bya ba ni ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du'o //
T02D2512-3:13a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02D2512-3:13a-29: rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog / kun du bzang po 'khor ba dang //
T02D2512-3:13a-30: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2512-3:13a-32: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / ces bya
T02D2512-3:13a-33: ba la dngos grub kyang yin la chen po yang
T02D2512-3:13a-34: yin pas dngos grub chen po ste /
T02D2512-3:13a-35: de nyid thams cad kyi mchog yin pas na /
T02D2512-3:13a-36: dngos grub kun gyi mchog ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bo //
T02D2512-3:13a-37: des rdo rje snyems pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-3:13a-38: phyag rgya chen po dang lha mo rdo rje snyems
T02D2512-3:13a-39: ma'i bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub chen
T02D2512-3:13a-40: po'i thugs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen po'o
T02D2512-3:13a-41: // de nyid rigs kyi lha mo thams cad byang chub sems las byung ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:13a-42: de rnams kyi yang bdag po yin no zhes bya
T02D2512-3:13b-0: ba bdag po'i sgra gnyis pas bstan pa @13b yin
T02D2512-3:13b-1: no // de ltar na thams cad ces bya ba
T02D2512-3:13b-2: nas bdag po'i bdag ces bya ba'i bar du bshad
T02D2512-3:13b-3: pas ting nge 'dzin dang po bstan pa yin no
T02D2512-3:13b-5: pa'i lha thams cad kyi mchog yin pas na kun
T02D2512-3:13b-6: no // // mchog go // kun mchog kyang yin
T02D2512-3:13b-7: la chags pa chen po yang de nyid yin pas
T02D2512-3:13b-8: kun mchog chags pa chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:13b-9: de'i dngos grub ni gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:13b-10: des gdul bya de ma lus shing lus ba med pa'i khams gsum gyi bdag po nyid do //
T02D2512-3:13b-11: de'i rjes su sgrub pa ni rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-3:13b-12: glu dang rol mo zhes bya ba'i yi ge h'um gi glu gsungs pa dang /
T02D2512-3:13b-13: pi wang la sogs pa'i rol mo ston par byed pa'i h'um ste de nyid rol mo'o //
T02D2512-3:13b-14: de nyid ni don dam par dbus dang mtha' med pa'i thog mtha' med pa ste /
T02D2512-3:13b-15: sngar gsungs pa yin yang sbyor ba'i khyad par gyis slar yang gsungs pa yin no//
T02D2512-3:13b-16: de gang yin zhe na h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D2512-3:13b-17: de thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-3:13b-19: chags pa'i rdo rje ma dang /
T02D2512-3:13b-22: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi de
T02D2512-3:13b-23: bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i ye shes rnams ni
T02D2512-3:13b-25: de rnams dang rgyu mthun pa'i dang po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje thams cad do //
T02D2512-3:13b-26: de 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin pas te /
T02D2512-3:13b-27: rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa de yin no //
T02D2512-3:13b-28: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02D2512-3:13b-29: rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa kho na'o zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-3:13b-30: gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che //
T02D2512-3:13b-31: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2512-3:13b-32: de so sor rtog pa dang /
T02D2512-3:13b-34: yongs su mi spang ba dang /
T02D2512-3:13b-35: thob pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ye shes rnams so //
T02D2512-3:13b-36: de las byung ba'i dga' ba chen po dpal rdo
T02D2512-3:13b-37: rje don yod pa'i chags pa'i dam tshig gis 'dod
T02D2512-3:13b-38: pa'i rdo rje mal sogs pa lha mo bzhi pa'o
T02D2512-3:13b-39: // rdo rje mda' la sogs pa nye bar mtshon
T02D2512-3:13b-40: pa rnams ni gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid
T02D2512-3:13b-41: chen po'i phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D2512-3:13b-42: de dag rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa'i sku gsung
T02D2512-3:13b-43: thugs kyi rdo rje rnams las byung ba yin no
T02D2512-3:14a-2: / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las //
T02D2512-3:14a-3: de nyid phyag rgya byung ba yin //
T02D2512-3:14a-4: zhes 'og nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:14a-5: rtag pa yang yin la chags pa yang de nyid yin pas rtag tu chags pas te /
T02D2512-3:14a-6: de ltar byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis rtag tu bzhugs
T02D2512-3:14a-7: pa kun mchog so sor rtog pa'i lha mo'i gzugs
T02D2512-3:14a-8: can gyi rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:14a-9: dngos grub kyang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas na dngos grub chen po ste /
T02D2512-3:14a-10: byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems dang
T02D2512-3:14a-11: sems las byung ba mngon du bya ba'i dngos grub
T02D2512-3:14a-12: thams cad kyi bde ba dam pa'i gzugs can gyi
T02D2512-3:14a-14: rnam rgyal ni lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi
T02D2512-3:14a-15: rang bzhin dag pa'i so sor rtogs nas spang ba'am
T02D2512-3:14a-16: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas 'chi bdag
T02D2512-3:14a-17: gi bdud las rnam par rgyal ba ste /
T02D2512-3:14a-18: kun mchog rnam par rgyal ba mthong ba'i lha mo'i gzugs can sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:14a-19: dbang phyug ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag po nyid de /
T02D2512-3:14a-20: thams cad kyi dbang phyug mchod pa chen po'i lha mo'i gzugs can bcom ldan 'das yin no //
T02D2512-3:14a-22: dngos grub chen po dang rnam par rgyal ba dang dbang phyug ni /
T02D2512-3:14a-23: rtag tu chags dang dngos grub che //
T02D2512-3:14a-24: rnam rgyal dbang phyug che rnams so //
T02D2512-3:14a-25: de rnams kyi lhag pa'i lha ni lhag pa'i lha'o //
T02D2512-3:14a-26: de dag gang yin zhe na bzhi po rnams so //
T02D2512-3:14a-27: phyag rgya dam pa zhes bya ba ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02D2512-3:14a-28: phyag rgya dam pa bzhi po de dag ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D2512-3:14a-29: sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2512-3:14a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D2512-3:14a-31: des byin gyis brlabs pa ni brtan par bya ba ste /
T02D2512-3:14a-32: de'i don du rig pa'i lha mo sku gzugs can
T02D2512-3:14a-33: yin pas na sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku
T02D2512-3:14a-34: gzugs yin no // 'dis ni 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-3:14a-35: 'di rnams dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i yan lag yin no zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-3:14a-36: kun mchog so sor rtog pa dang //
T02D2512-3:14a-37: zhes bya ba la thams cad kyi mchog ni kun mchog ste /
T02D2512-3:14a-38: thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi dbyings
T02D2512-3:14a-39: byang chub chen po'i thugs kyi rang bzhin can rdo
T02D2512-3:14b-1: de'i so sor rtog pa ni de'i rang bzhin mngon
T02D2512-3:14b-2: du byed pa'i gzugs can chos bdag med pa bsgom
T02D2512-3:14b-3: pa'i rang bzhin can 'dod chags rdo rje ma'o zhes

T02D2512-3:20b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra //
T02D2512-3:20b-9: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:20b-10: rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2512-3:20b-11: rgyal po zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2512-3:20b-12: rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang rigs thams cad
T02D2512-3:20b-14: rdo rje can gyis byin brlab 'gyur //
T02D2512-3:20b-15: zhes bya ba la rdo rje can ni rdo rje
T02D2512-3:20b-16: sems dpa' ste des de ma thag tu byin gyis
T02D2512-3:20b-20: chos dang dam tshig thob ma thag tu sku gsung
T02D2512-3:20b-21: thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyi rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:20b-23: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs nas brtan par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:20b-24: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-3:20b-25: der bdag byin gyis brlab pa ni 'das ma thag
T02D2512-3:20b-26: tu bshad pa'i rdo rje slob dpon ran gnyid rdo
T02D2512-3:20b-27: rje sems dpa' nyid du bya'o //
T02D2512-3:20b-28: sgrub pa gcig bu zhes bya ba ni slob ma
T02D2512-3:20b-29: gzhan du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang
T02D2512-3:20b-30: bral ba'o // de nyid kyi cho ga ni cho ga'i tshig go //
T02D2512-3:20b-31: mchog tu grub pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
T02D2512-3:20b-32: dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:20b-33: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa ste /
T02D2512-3:20b-34: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du bdag la byin gyis brlab
T02D2512-3:20b-35: pa'i cho ga gcig pu'i skabs la'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:20b-36: tha tshig go // 'dir zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du'o /
T02D2512-3:20b-37: gang gis bsgrub par bya ba ni sgrub pas te
T02D2512-3:20b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du bdag la byin gyis
T02D2512-3:20b-39: brlab pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de bshad
T02D2512-3:20b-40: par bya ste brjod par bya'o//
T02D2512-3:21a-0: @21a * // dngos grub shin tu rtag pa yang //
T02D2512-3:21a-1: zhes bya ba la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang
T02D2512-3:21a-2: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub thog ma dang tha
T02D2512-3:21a-3: ma med pa bshad par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:21a-4: sgrub pa de khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
T02D2512-3:21a-5: gang gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag
T02D2512-3:21a-6: la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:21a-7: gyi sgrub pa gang gis srid pas te skye ba
T02D2512-3:21a-8: 'di nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i
T02D2512-3:21a-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2512-3:21a-10: dngos grub shin tu rtag pa thob par 'gyur te
T02D2512-3:21a-11: / de ltar gyur pa'i sgrub pa de bshad par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:21a-12: slar yang sgrub pa de nyid khyad par du bstan
T02D2512-3:21a-13: par bya ba'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-3:21a-15: sgrub pa gang gis dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa po /
T02D2512-3:21a-16: mchog ni bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa po rnams myur ba kho nar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:21a-17: sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni //
T02D2512-3:21a-18: zhes bya ba ni mtshams med pa lnga dang dam
T02D2512-3:21a-19: pa'i chos spong bar byed pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D2512-3:21a-20: so // kyang gi sgras ni gang zhig bsod nams
T02D2512-3:21a-21: dang ldan zhing sdig pa chen po byed pa ma
T02D2512-3:21a-22: yin pa de rnams ni shin tu yang 'grub par
T02D2512-3:21a-24: ni'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D2512-3:21a-26: zhes bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu dang /
T02D2512-3:21a-27: dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
T02D2512-3:21a-29: rtog pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
T02D2512-3:21a-30: rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa'i sgrub pa ji lta
T02D2512-3:21a-31: ba bzhin du bshad pa des gal te grub par
T02D2512-3:21a-32: ma gyur na de'i tshe ma grub pa'o //
T02D2512-3:21a-33: kyang gi sgra ni sgrub pa ste shin tu grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:21a-35: sngar bshad pa'i sgrub pas ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
T02D2512-3:21a-36: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pas ni rdo rje
T02D2512-3:21a-37: sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya
T02D2512-3:21a-38: ba bstan to // ji ltar sgrub par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-3:21a-39: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin //
T02D2512-3:21b-0: zhes bya ba la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems @21b dpas gsungs pa bzhin du'o //
T02D2512-3:21b-3: dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas //
T02D2512-3:21b-4: de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin //
T02D2512-3:21b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-3:21b-6: ma grub pa rnams kyang 'dis grub pa yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:21b-7: da ni sgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:21b-8: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
T02D2512-3:21b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:21b-10: 'dir dang po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje ste /
T02D2512-3:21b-11: dang po'i rdo rje dang ldan pa'i dril bu ni dril bu'o //
T02D2512-3:21b-12: 'di gnyis 'dzin pas na rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba'o //
T02D2512-3:21b-13: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gnas bsrungs
T02D2512-3:21b-14: pa nas brtsams te lha gshegs su gsol ba la
T02D2512-3:21b-15: thug gi bar gyi dus su'o //
T02D2512-3:21b-16: gzhan du ni rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgyas mtshan
T02D2512-3:21b-17: pa 'dzin cing de yis mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin
T02D2512-3:21b-18: pa'i rtag tu'o // dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D2512-3:21b-19: zhes bya ba la rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-3:21b-20: po la sogs pa sgrub pa ni rang la rag
T02D2512-3:21b-21: las par bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:21b-22: byed par 'gyur ba gang dag gis bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-3:21b-23: thams cad dgug pa bya zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-3:21b-24: pa la thams cad dgug pa ni thams cad 'gugs
T02D2512-3:21b-25: pas te / 'dod pa'i lha'i rang bzhin can gyi
T02D2512-3:21b-26: ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la gzhug pa'o
T02D2512-3:21b-28: mchod pa che zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags rdo
T02D2512-3:21b-29: rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyi
T02D2512-3:21b-30: mchod pa ste mchod pa chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:21b-33: dam tshig rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2512-3:21b-34: sogs pa'i sgras ni sgrub pa chen po dang /
T02D2512-3:21b-41: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs dang /
T02D2512-3:21b-42: phyag bya ba rnams gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:21b-45: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa ni thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02D2512-3:21b-47: bdag byin gyis brlab pa rnams so //
T02D2512-3:22a-1: gang la yod pa de ni //
T02D2512-3:22a-2: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che //
T02D2512-3:22a-3: bdag byin brlab sogs sgrub pa rnams so //
T02D2512-3:22a-4: de dag gis mchog gi sgrub pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:22a-5: da ni thams cad dgug pa bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:22a-6: phyir de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2512-3:22a-7: te / de la zhes bya ba ni dgar ba'o //
T02D2512-3:22a-8: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni dri ba'o //
T02D2512-3:22a-9: mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-3:22a-10: de'i dngos grub thams cad ni ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa ste spyan drang ba'o //
T02D2512-3:22a-11: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyu'o /
T02D2512-3:22a-12: de ji ltar shes par bya zhes kha bskang ngo //
T02D2512-3:22a-13: rang gi lhag pa'i lha ni 'dod pa'i lha ste /
T02D2512-3:22a-14: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag nyid can
T02D2512-3:22a-15: gyi lhag par mos ba ni ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2512-3:22a-16: du sbyor ba ste rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2512-3:22a-17: to // thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni dril bu dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyu ste /
T02D2512-3:22a-18: thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya de rang gi lha'i
T02D2512-3:22a-19: rnal 'byor gyi spyi bor skeg pa'i gar bya zhing
T02D2512-3:22a-20: spyan drang ba'i glu brjod nas ye shes sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:22a-21: bkug la rang gi lus la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:22a-22: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa'o //
T02D2512-3:22a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos
T02D2512-3:22a-24: grub kyi don du dgug pa ni spyan drangs pa
T02D2512-3:22a-25: ste / de'i don du mchog tu gsang ba ni
T02D2512-3:22a-26: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ston par byed pas
T02D2512-3:22a-28: mi phyed pa'i glu'i mchod pa 'di yin te /
T02D2512-3:22a-29: dza: mchog dang po zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-3:22a-30: ji srid bar du dga' ba khyod bdag mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D2512-3:22a-31: de la dza: zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje
T02D2512-3:22a-32: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i kun mchog so sor rtog
T02D2512-3:22a-33: pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi lam bstan pa yin no
T02D2512-3:22a-34: // mchog ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:22a-35: dang po zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po
T02D2512-3:22a-36: la sogs pa nas sngon du yang da ltar byung
T02D2512-3:22a-37: ba'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:22a-38: lam de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid
T02D2512-3:22a-39: kyi rdo rje 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'chang ngo
T02D2512-3:22a-40: // gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pas
T02D2512-3:22b-0: @22b bskyod par mi nus pa'i phyir rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:22b-1: // dpa'o // mchog dang po'i rdo rje 'chang yang
T02D2512-3:22b-2: de yin la rdo rje sems dpa' yang de nyid
T02D2512-3:22b-3: yin pas na mchog dang po'i rdo rje 'chang gi
T02D2512-3:22b-5: bde ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
T02D2512-3:22b-6: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D2512-3:22b-7: thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa rab tu rtogs
T02D2512-3:22b-8: par mdzod cig ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-3:22b-9: rje sems dpa' la bod pa'o //
T02D2512-3:22b-10: 'dir sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang bstan pa yin te /
T02D2512-3:22b-11: 'dir 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' yin no //
T02D2512-3:22b-12: h'um zhes bya ba'i 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang
T02D2512-3:22b-13: bzhin gyi sku mchog so sor rtog pa'i mtshan can
T02D2512-3:22b-14: gyi lam gyi yul du byas pa'i zag pa med
T02D2512-3:22b-15: pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba'i ngo bor rtogs
T02D2512-3:22b-16: pa'o // de nyid mchog ste phul du byung ba'i
T02D2512-3:22b-17: rdo rje ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:22b-18: can gyi las mngon du bya ba'i rang bzhin no
T02D2512-3:22b-19: pa'o // // de khyad par ji lta bu dang
T02D2512-3:22b-20: ldan pa yin zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir mchog
T02D2512-3:22b-21: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gsungs te
T02D2512-3:22b-22: pa'o // // / mchog kyang yin la mi 'gyur
T02D2512-3:22b-23: ba yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu mi
T02D2512-3:22b-24: 'gyur ba ste thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o//
T02D2512-3:22b-25: de zag pa med pa'i srid pa rab tu bsgrub
T02D2512-3:22b-26: pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D2512-3:22b-27: grub pa'o // zag pa med pa'i srid pa rab
T02D2512-3:22b-28: tu bsgrub pa de'i don du zag pa med pa'i
T02D2512-3:22b-29: bde ba'i rang bzhin can gyi dam tshig dang po
T02D2512-3:22b-30: ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste de'i
T02D2512-3:22b-31: grub pa'o // las so // de'i phyir gsol ba
T02D2512-3:22b-32: btab pa ni bdag la sgrubs shig ces bya ba
T02D2512-3:22b-33: grub pa'o // las so // ste / k'i li
T02D2512-3:22b-34: k'i la'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang bstan to
T02D2512-3:22b-35: grub pa'o // las so // ste / // bam
T02D2512-3:22b-36: zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las
T02D2512-3:22b-37: 'das pa srid pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i
T02D2512-3:22b-38: sems can la ltos pa'i rang bzhin gyi dmigs pa
T02D2512-3:22b-39: med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i bcing bas 'ching bar
T02D2512-3:22b-40: mdzod cig / padma'i rgyal po skye zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:22b-41: grub pa'o // las so // ste / // dang
T02D2512-3:22b-42: sbyar ro // de nyid khyad par du bstan par
T02D2512-3:22b-43: bya ba'i phyir mchog tu bdag ces bya ba la
T02D2512-3:23a-0: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyis chos kyi dbyings @23a * //
T02D2512-3:23a-1: ni mchog tu bdag ste de'i sku ni de las
T02D2512-3:23a-2: byung ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste de 'dzin
T02D2512-3:23a-3: par byed pas na mchog tu bdag gi sku 'dzin
T02D2512-3:23a-4: pa'o // thams cad rnal 'byor ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos te /
T02D2512-3:23a-5: de rnam par rgyal ba ni rang bzhin gyis dag
T02D2512-3:23a-6: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs pa la sogs
T02D2512-3:23a-7: pa'i bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02D2512-3:23a-8: de bsgreng ba ni rdo rje chu srin gyi rgyal
T02D2512-3:23a-9: mtshan gyis nye bar mtshan pa'i rdo rje dran pa'i
T02D2512-3:23a-10: rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'o //
T02D2512-3:23a-11: mchog tu bdag gi sku 'dzin pa yang de yin
T02D2512-3:23a-12: la rnal 'byor thams cad rnam par bsgrang ba yang
T02D2512-3:23a-13: de nyid yin pas mchog tu bdag gi sku 'dzin
T02D2512-3:23a-14: pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad rnam par rgyal ba'i bsgreng
T02D2512-3:23a-15: ba'o // de nyid kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i
T02D2512-3:23a-16: bag chags dang bral bas rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i
T02D2512-3:23a-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bos rab tu mchog gis
T02D2512-3:23a-18: dag pa ni rab mchog gis dag pa ste /
T02D2512-3:23a-19: des bde ba gang la yod pa de ni bde ba dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2512-3:23a-21: khyod ni padma'i rgyal po ste //
T02D2512-3:23a-22: gyur cig ces bya ba ni sgrub par gyur cig ces bod pa'o //
T02D2512-3:23a-23: padma bzhin du 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dri ma rnams kyis mgos pas mdzes pa ste /
T02D2512-3:23a-24: 'dis ni rdo rje dran pa ma'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang bstan to //
T02D2512-3:23a-25: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:23a-26: can gyi bsnyems pas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i
T02D2512-3:23a-27: ngo bo dang sangs rgyas sbrul pa'i mchod pa'i rang
T02D2512-3:23a-28: bzhin can gyi las dbang du mdzad pas yi ge
T02D2512-3:23a-29: ho: yin no // de nyid khyad par du bstan
T02D2512-3:23a-30: par bya ba'i phyir rab mchog ces bya ba la
T02D2512-3:23a-32: rab mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02D2512-3:23a-33: rab mchog las kyang phul du byung bas na mchog gi mchog go //
T02D2512-3:23a-34: dngos grub kyang de yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas dngos grub thams cad de //
T02D2512-3:23a-35: sems can gyi don byed pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod
T02D2512-3:23a-36: pa sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:23a-37: can no // des mchog kyang yin la dbang phyug
T02D2512-3:23a-38: kyang yin pas na dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang
T02D2512-3:23a-39: can no // phyug go // dngos grub thams cad
T02D2512-3:23a-40: kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i rang bzhin can nam mkha'i
T02D2512-3:23b-0: snying po kye bdag @23b la gyur cig ces bya
T02D2512-3:23b-2: nam mkha' ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nam
T02D2512-3:23b-3: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bya ba nan tan grub pa'i
T02D2512-3:23b-4: ye shes te de nyid snying po ste /
T02D2512-3:23b-5: skye ba'i gnas gang la yod pa de ni nam mkha'i snying po ste /
T02D2512-3:23b-6: sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ngo//
T02D2512-3:23b-7: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma re re nyid du bdag la grub gyur cig ba'o //
T02D2512-3:23b-8: de yang ji ltar zha na /
T02D2512-3:23b-9: dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i gzugs
T02D2512-3:23b-10: kyis bdag la grub par gyur cig ces bya ba
T02D2512-3:23b-11: slob dpon gyis bod pa yin te /
T02D2512-3:23b-12: 'dis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang bstan to //
T02D2512-3:23b-13: 'dor bsdus na 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin dza: zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-3:23b-14: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-3:23b-15: rdo rje dran pa ma'i rang bzhin bam zhes bya ba dang /
