T02D2512-3:26b-18: rdo rje cher bstod pa zhes bya ba la ji
T02D2512-3:26b-19: lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dngos po'i rdo rje
T02D2512-3:26b-20: cher bstod pa ni rdo rje cher bstod pa'o //
T02D2512-3:26b-21: lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo dbus ma'i kha tv'am
T02D2512-3:26b-22: ga rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul 'dzin pa
T02D2512-3:26b-23: ni rdo rje cher bstod pa ste /
T02D2512-3:26b-24: rdo rje cher bstod pa des sgrubs shig pa ni
T02D2512-3:26b-25: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
T02D2512-3:26b-26: grub kyis rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po kye bdag
T02D2512-3:26b-27: la sgrubs shig ces bya ba la bod pa dang
T02D2512-3:26b-28: bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la sgrub pa pos gsol
T02D2512-3:26b-30: de ltar dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:26b-31: da ni de nyid kyi phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:26b-32: dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:26b-33: dpal mchog dang po ni ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2512-3:26b-34: bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ste
T02D2512-3:26b-36: aom nam mkha' skye med mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D2512-3:26b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu sgrub pa pos
T02D2512-3:26b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi yang dag par gyur pa'i yon
T02D2512-3:26b-39: tan brjod cing / don dam par de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2512-3:26b-40: chos dang dam tshig gi don la lhag par mos
T02D2512-3:26b-41: pas glu blangs na de ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya
T02D2512-3:27a-0: @27a * // ba bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:27a-1: de ni dngos grub kun mchog 'gyur //
T02D2512-3:27a-3: de zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'o //
T02D2512-3:27a-4: ni zhes bya ba ni sgra nges par gzung ba la bya ste /
T02D2512-3:27a-5: de nyid kho nar gyur pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:27a-6: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi dngos grub kun gyi mchog ste /
T02D2512-3:27a-7: de'i dbang phyug chen po'i sku thams cad ston par byed pas sems can gyi don to //
T02D2512-3:27a-8: dbang phyug chen po de dang ldan zhing dbang phyug
T02D2512-3:27a-9: chen po nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:27a-10: rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so//
T02D2512-3:27a-11: mchog kyang yin la de kho na nyid kyang de nyid yin pas na mchog gi de nyid de /
T02D2512-3:27a-12: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams so //
T02D2512-3:27a-13: de nyid gsang ba'i mchog ni 'jig rten thams cad dang thun mong ba ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:27a-14: de'i glu chen po ni dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa'o //
T02D2512-3:27a-15: mchog tu grub pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D2512-3:27a-16: de ston par byed pa nyid kyi phyir 'di yang mchog tu grub pa'o //
T02D2512-3:27a-17: mchog tu grub pa yang mngon du byed pa'i rgyu
T02D2512-3:27a-18: nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog gi glu 'di yang mchog
T02D2512-3:27a-19: tu grub pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:27a-20: dngos grub cho ga 'di yis ni /
T02D2512-3:27a-21: zhes bya ba la dngos grub kyi don gyi cho
T02D2512-3:27a-22: ga ni dngos grub kyi cho ga ste glu'i mchod
T02D2512-3:27a-23: pa'o // mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga 'dis
T02D2512-3:27a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su rnal
T02D2512-3:27a-25: 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid can ni dngos grub chen
T02D2512-3:27a-26: po kun gyi mchog ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos
T02D2512-3:27a-27: pa'o // grub ste / des dbang phyug chen po
T02D2512-3:27a-28: ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang
T02D2512-3:27a-29: bral bas khams gsum thams cad du gzugs thams cad
T02D2512-3:27a-30: ston pas sems can byed pa'o //
T02D2512-3:27a-31: yul der rdo rje sems dpa' dang yang dag par
T02D2512-3:27a-32: 'dus pa'i sgrub pa pos bsgrub par bya ba yin
T02D2512-3:27a-33: no // de bzhin du dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa 'dis /
T02D2512-3:27a-34: kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang //
T02D2512-3:27a-35: zhes bya ba la cho 'phrul brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rnam pa can dang /
T02D2512-3:27a-36: so sor ston pa'i rmad du byung ba rnams ni
T02D2512-3:27a-37: ngo mtshar bar gyur pa rnams sgrub pa po'i rdo
T02D2512-3:27a-38: rje slob dpon gyi rang gi lha dpal rdo rje
T02D2512-3:27b-0: @27b sems dpa' las mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:27b-1: rtog pa kun zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa sna tshogs chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:27b-2: dngos grub ni gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po'i dngos grub bo //
T02D2512-3:27b-3: de'i dbang phyug ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02D2512-3:27b-4: de las byung ba'i bde ba ni /
T02D2512-3:27b-5: rtog pa kun gyi sna tshogs che //
T02D2512-3:27b-6: dngos grub dbang phyug bde ba rnams //
T02D2512-3:27b-7: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung bas te /
T02D2512-3:27b-8: dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa nyid kyis rtog
T02D2512-3:27b-9: pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dngos grub kyi
T02D2512-3:27b-10: bde ba rnams dpal rdo rje sems dpas legs par
T02D2512-3:27b-11: byin gyis brlabs pas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rtag
T02D2512-3:27b-13: de ltar bdag la byin gyis brlab pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:27b-14: da ni rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:27b-15: can sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:27b-16: phyir / de la ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:27b-17: thams cad kyang yin la bdag la byin gyis brlab
T02D2512-3:27b-18: pa yang de nyid yin pas na thams cad bdag
T02D2512-3:27b-19: la byin gyis brlab pa ste /
T02D2512-3:27b-20: rang gi rigs kyi lha thams cad sgrub pa po'i lus la dgod pa'o //
T02D2512-3:27b-21: de'i don du lha rnams kyi sgrub pa chen po
T02D2512-3:27b-22: ni rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis
T02D2512-3:27b-23: rang la rag las par bya ba de ni thams
T02D2512-3:27b-24: cad bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i lha'i sgrub pa
T02D2512-3:27b-25: chen po'o // de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-3:27b-26: rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du //
T02D2512-3:27b-27: zhes bya ba la bdag nyid kyi rang gi lha ni 'dod pa'i lha'o //
T02D2512-3:27b-28: rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:27b-29: de nas rdo rje dbab pa bskyed nas rang gi
T02D2512-3:27b-30: snying gar rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgyas dgrol bar
T02D2512-3:27b-31: byas la / dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te /
T02D2512-3:27b-32: phyag rgya thams cad gdeg par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:27b-33: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa rnams dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:27b-34: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D2512-3:27b-35: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje la yi
T02D2512-3:27b-36: ge h'um yid kyis bris la /
T02D2512-3:27b-37: de nyid yid kyis brjod cing chos thams cad rang
T02D2512-3:27b-38: bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang nam mkha' deng mnyam
T02D2512-3:28a-1: nas nam mkha'i phyogs su rang gi sems yi ge
T02D2512-3:28a-2: h'um gi rnam par bsams la dbyangs bcu drug dang
T02D2512-3:28a-3: bcas pa'i yi ge h'um gis rang gi sems zla
T02D2512-3:28a-4: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o
T02D2512-3:28a-5: // de'i steng du ka la sogs pa'i yi ge
T02D2512-3:28a-6: dang bcas pa'i yi ge h'um las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2512-3:28a-7: 'khor gnyis pa de nyid yi ge h'um dang bcas
T02D2512-3:28a-9: rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um yid kyis bri ste /
T02D2512-3:28a-10: gsang ba lnga'i de kho na chen po dang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-3:28a-11: rdo rje las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
T02D2512-3:28a-12: rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:28a-13: rnams spros te / de dag gis sems can gyi
T02D2512-3:28a-14: khams thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rtogs pas rdo
T02D2512-3:28a-15: rje 'chang chen po nyid du byas la de rnams
T02D2512-3:28a-16: rdo rje la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:28a-17: de nas sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la /
T02D2512-3:28a-18: ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa ham zhes bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:28a-19: de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la slar yang
T02D2512-3:28a-20: sa ma ya aa ham zhes bya ba bzla bar
T02D2512-3:28a-21: bya'o // de nas slar dang po'i rdo rjes snying ga dang /
T02D2512-3:28a-24: spyi po rnams su sa ma ya satva aa dhi
T02D2512-3:28a-25: tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab par
T02D2512-3:28a-26: bya'o // de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:28a-27: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa'i rang
T02D2512-3:28a-28: gi lha'i sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin yin no
T02D2512-3:28a-29: // gzhan la ni rang gi cho gas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2512-3:28a-30: 'dis rang gi lha'i sku'i gsang bsgom pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku mdog dang /
T02D2512-3:28a-32: gzugs dang ldan pa'i rang gi lha'i sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:28a-33: lha yang yin la kun yang de nyid yin pas
T02D2512-3:28a-34: na lha kun te rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2512-3:28a-35: pa'o // de rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi sku ni sku'i gsang ba rnams so //
T02D2512-3:28a-36: rang gi lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin pa dang /
T02D2512-3:28a-37: lha kun gyi bdag nyid kyi sku rnams ni rang
T02D2512-3:28a-38: gi lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin pa'i lha kun gyi
T02D2512-3:28a-39: bdag nyid kyi sku rnams te /
T02D2512-3:28a-40: de dag gis rang gi lha'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid
T02D2512-3:28b-0: can gyi rnal 'byor ba de rang gi lha'i @28b
T02D2512-3:28b-1: dkyil 'khor du bsgrub par bya ba yin te gzhan
T02D2512-3:28b-2: gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:28b-4: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor tsam byas la nam mkha'
T02D2512-3:28b-5: dang mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor bas nam mkha' dang
T02D2512-3:28b-6: mnyam pa'i rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la zhugs
T02D2512-3:28b-7: te / yi ge h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas /
T02D2512-3:28b-8: aa nu ra ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:28b-9: brjod cings la rab tu bzhag par byas nas dpal
T02D2512-3:28b-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor snying gar
T02D2512-3:28b-11: rdzogs par bya'o // de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:28b-12: bcings nas der zhugs la dngos grub kyi rdo rje
T02D2512-3:28b-13: brtul zhugs blang ba'i bar du rang gi cho ga
T02D2512-3:28b-15: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2512-3:28b-16: po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i gnas rnams
T02D2512-3:28b-17: su gsang ba'i lcags kyu mas dpal mchog dang po
T02D2512-3:28b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu brjod cing /
T02D2512-3:28b-19: rang gi lus la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2512-3:28b-20: pa bcug la dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis
T02D2512-3:28b-21: bsgrub par bya'o // de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
T02D2512-3:28b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi lus dang
T02D2512-3:28b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku la snga
T02D2512-3:28b-24: ma bzhin du bcug ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:28b-26: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
T02D2512-3:28b-27: dang po'i rdo rje de bzhin du bdag la byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2512-3:28b-28: brtan par byed pa'i snying pos brtan par byas la
T02D2512-3:28b-29: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur te
T02D2512-3:28b-30: rdo rje dang / bdag po dang /
T02D2512-3:28b-31: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-3:28b-32: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02D2512-3:28b-33: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i
T02D2512-3:28b-34: phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid yang dag par
T02D2512-3:28b-35: mchod la / sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje ma'i
T02D2512-3:28b-36: phyag bzhis phyag btsal bar byas nas de kho na
T02D2512-3:28b-37: mchod la / nyid dang / chos dang dam tshig rnams la yi ge h'um lan gsum brjod de /
T02D2512-3:28b-38: dam tshig gsum gyi mchod pa byas la rdo rje'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D2512-3:29a-0: thams cad mnyam pa'i bdag nyid rnam par @29a * //
T02D2512-3:29a-2: ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi snying gar gnas
T02D2512-3:29a-3: pa'i rdo rje la yi ge h'um yid kyis bris
T02D2512-3:29a-4: nas rab tu dga' ba'i ngag gis brjod cing bsgom
T02D2512-3:29a-6: de dag thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02D2512-3:29a-8: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2512-3:29a-9: sgrub pa chen po rnams bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:29a-11: be sha khi la la mkhas pa'i rjes su sgrub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:29a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:29a-13: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa'o //
T02D2512-3:29a-14: gsang ba dam pa'i mchog gi dpal dam tshig gsum
T02D2512-3:29a-15: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
T02D2512-3:29a-16: thugs kyi rdo rje brtan par byed pa'i gsang ba'i
T02D2512-3:29a-17: dkyil 'khor der mchog gi dngos grub thams cad kyi
T02D2512-3:29a-18: dbang phyug ni khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid
T02D2512-3:29a-19: thob pa'o // de nyid bdag po nyid dngos grub
T02D2512-3:29a-20: thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs pa'i gang gi dang
T02D2512-3:29a-21: por yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2512-3:29a-22: dngos grub kyang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid
T02D2512-3:29a-23: yin pas na dngos grub thams cad de phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:29a-24: chen po dang / dam tshig dang chos dang las
T02D2512-3:29a-25: kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub rnams so
T02D2512-3:29a-26: chen po dang / // las rnams kyi tshogs ni
T02D2512-3:29a-27: las kyi tshogs te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'brel
T02D2512-3:29a-28: ba'i 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i las rgya'i rgyun
T02D2512-3:29a-29: chen po dang / // no // mi 'gyur ba
T02D2512-3:29a-30: yang yin la mchog kyang de nyid yin pas na
T02D2512-3:29a-32: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:29a-33: de nyid kyi phyir dam pa ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02D2512-3:29a-34: 'di la gong na med pas bla na med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:29a-35: dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la dga' ba ni yid bde ba'o //
T02D2512-3:29a-36: rab tu dga' ba ni dga' ba'o //
T02D2512-3:29a-37: bde ba thams cad ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i'o //
T02D2512-3:29a-40: mchog gi dbye bas phye ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:29a-41: yid bde ba yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:29a-42: bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba las khyad par ci yod ce na /
T02D2512-3:29a-45: mchog gi dbye ba rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2512-3:29a-46: de ni bla na med pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di'i khyad par yin no //
T02D2512-3:29b-0: mchog gi dngos grub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po @29b la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D2512-3:29b-1: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs dang /
T02D2512-3:29b-2: mi 'gyur ba mchog gi dam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang /
T02D2512-3:29b-3: yid bde ba dang mchog gi dngos grub rnams ni
T02D2512-3:29b-4: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bdag po nyid
T02D2512-3:29b-5: la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi
T02D2512-3:29b-6: tshogs kyis mi 'gyur ba mchog gi dam pa bla
T02D2512-3:29b-7: na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba
T02D2512-3:29b-8: dang / bde ba thams cad dang /
T02D2512-3:29b-9: yid bde ba mchog gi dngos grub rnams so //
T02D2512-3:29b-10: de dag gi cho ga rgyas pa ni rdo rjes
T02D2512-3:29b-11: su chags pa la sogs pa'i glu dang rol mo'i
T02D2512-3:29b-12: cho ga rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D2512-3:29b-13: de nyid rjes su sgrub pa ni phyi nas bsgrubs
T02D2512-3:29b-14: pas na rjes su bsgrub pa ste thams cad dgug
T02D2512-3:29b-15: pa dang / mchod pa chen po dang /
T02D2512-3:29b-16: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2512-3:29b-17: sgrub pa chen po las phyis bya pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:29b-18: de nyid mchog gi dngos grub kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir mchog tu grub pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:29b-19: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen
T02D2512-3:29b-20: po byas la rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor cho ga
T02D2512-3:29b-21: bzhin du mdun du bzhag la de nyid bsgom pa
T02D2512-3:29b-22: ni 'di rang gi lha'i sbyor ba ji lta ba

T02D2512-3:32b-34: thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang
T02D2512-3:32b-35: gi gnas su rtag tu zhugs pa grub par 'gyur
T02D2512-3:32b-36: ba de'i phyir ji skad du bshad pa'i khang pa
T02D2512-3:32b-37: sum brtsegs su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2512-3:32b-38: rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya ste gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:32b-39: rab tu de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba padma'i ra ba che //
T02D2512-3:32b-40: mchog tu gsang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:33a-0: sgrub pa de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par @33a * //
T02D2512-3:33a-1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i
T02D2512-3:33a-2: phyir bla na med pa'i dngos grub ste de nyi
T02D2512-3:33a-3: bde ba'o // gang zhig rjes su brten pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-3:33a-4: rab tu dga' ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:33a-5: de nyid 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spong ba'i phyir
T02D2512-3:33a-6: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rtags su gyur pas na
T02D2512-3:33a-7: rgyal mtshan te / de bsgreng ba ni de'i sku
T02D2512-3:33a-8: gang la yod pa de ni rab tu dga' ba'i
T02D2512-3:33a-9: rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
T02D2512-3:33a-10: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo bzhi yang dag
T02D2512-3:33a-11: par 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor las byung ba'i bde ba
T02D2512-3:33a-12: ni dngos grub mchog gi bde ba chen po ste
T02D2512-3:33a-13: / de'i dngos po ni bde ba chen po de nyid do //
T02D2512-3:33a-14: dngos grub mchog gi bde ba chen po de nyid
T02D2512-3:33a-15: rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyis nyams su myong ba
T02D2512-3:33a-16: yin no // 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te ji
T02D2512-3:33a-17: lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs
T02D2512-3:33a-18: su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2512-3:33a-19: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas lha mo
T02D2512-3:33a-20: bzhi dang kun nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor gyis mdun
T02D2512-3:33a-21: du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol la /
T02D2512-3:33a-22: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su de'i rnal 'byor gyis
T02D2512-3:33a-23: de'i rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid gang gis bsgom
T02D2512-3:33a-24: pa de ni de'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro
T02D2512-3:33a-25: // dga' ba chen po yang yin la rdo rje
T02D2512-3:33a-26: dang yod pa yang de nyid yin pas na dga'
T02D2512-3:33a-27: ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa ste /
T02D2512-3:33a-28: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:33a-29: de'i dga' ba gang yin pa des dam tshig can ni rigs la skyed pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D2512-3:33a-30: rnal 'byor yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pa rnal 'byor thams cad de /
T02D2512-3:33a-31: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor ni rnal 'byor thams cad do //
T02D2512-3:33a-32: de rnams kyi dbang phyug ni gtso bos te de skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:33a-33: dga' ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dga'
T02D2512-3:33a-34: ba'i dam tshig thams cad kyang de yin la rnal
T02D2512-3:33a-35: 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug kyang de yin pas
T02D2512-3:33a-37: rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig dang /
T02D2512-3:33b-0: rnal 'byor @33b thams cad kyi dbang phyug go //
T02D2512-3:33b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-3:33b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal ni lha
T02D2512-3:33b-4: mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa lha mo
T02D2512-3:33b-5: thams cad kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i rdo
T02D2512-3:33b-7: de nyid kyi rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:33b-8: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:33b-9: da ni slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:33b-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:33b-11: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02D2512-3:33b-12: 'dir yang don 'di bshad pa yin te /
T02D2512-3:33b-13: gal te slob ma gzhug pa'i don du rnal 'byor bas dkyil 'khor brtags pa yin la /
T02D2512-3:33b-14: dngos grub kyi don du ni ma yin na /
T02D2512-3:33b-15: de'i tsho chog pa 'dis rnal 'byor pas slob ma gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:33b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen
T02D2512-3:33b-17: po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
T02D2512-3:33b-19: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di byang chub chen po'i sems
T02D2512-3:33b-20: kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir dam tshig chen po
T02D2512-3:33b-22: de ltar slob ma rnams gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ste /
T02D2512-3:33b-23: de rgyas pa ni byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rgyun te /
T02D2512-3:33b-24: de bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:33b-25: de la dang po kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:33b-26: rigs lnga'i mtshan ma rnams ni 'dod pa kun te
T02D2512-3:33b-27: 'dod pa de rnams la byang chub kyi mtshan can
T02D2512-3:33b-28: gyi rdo rje grub pa yin te /
T02D2512-3:33b-29: dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D2512-3:33b-30: rigs kyi slob ma thams cad kyi snying ga'i zla
T02D2512-3:33b-31: ba'i rnam par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:33b-32: don to // rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//
T02D2512-3:33b-33: zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2512-3:33b-36: rin po che'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:33b-38: ba dan gsum mchog sbyor ba yis //
T02D2512-3:33b-39: sgeg bcas mtha' ma la sogs bkrol //
T02D2512-3:33b-40: glog 'gyur mchog tu bskor ba ni /
T02D2512-3:34a-0: @34a * // rdo rje gar zhes de bshad do //
T02D2512-3:34a-1: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi lus la bskor ba'i
T02D2512-3:34a-2: gar phyogs bzhir phyag bya ba'i thal mo de gang
T02D2512-3:34a-3: la yod pa de ni gar gyi thal mo rnams
T02D2512-3:34a-4: so // de gan gang du bya zhe na /
T02D2512-3:34a-6: gar gyi thal mo sbyar ba de dag rang gi
T02D2512-3:34a-7: spyi bor bcing ba'i rdo rje gar las byung ba'i
T02D2512-3:34a-8: phyag bya ba'i thal mo rnams so zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:34a-9: tha tshig go // gos kyis gdong ni g-yogs pa rnams //
T02D2512-3:34a-10: zhes bya ba la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i ras kyis gdong g-yogs pa ste /
T02D2512-3:34a-11: de ltar gyur pa de rnams dpal rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:34a-12: dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i dngos grub 'dod pa
T02D2512-3:34a-13: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'dod pas te /
T02D2512-3:34a-14: slob ma de rnams thams cad rang gi cho gas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:34a-15: gang gis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:34a-16: dngos grub gang 'dod pa ni 'dir ci 'dod pa
T02D2512-3:34a-17: ste / de lta bu'i 'dod pa'i dngos grub slob ma'i tshogs la bsam zhing /
T02D2512-3:34a-18: slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams me tog dor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:34a-19: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis //
T02D2512-3:34a-20: dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin //
T02D2512-3:34a-21: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas nyid ni rin po che ste sangs rgyas rin chen no //
T02D2512-3:34a-22: de dag gis dbang bskur ba ni sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2512-3:34a-23: sangs rgyas lnga'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-3:34a-24: cod pan la sogs pa'i dbang bskur bas sangs rgyas
T02D2512-3:34a-25: rin chen dbang bskur bas te de dang bcas pa'i
T02D2512-3:34a-28: dam tshig sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ston par
T02D2512-3:34a-29: byed pa rnams thog mtha' med pa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:34a-30: la sogs pa 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dam
T02D2512-3:34a-31: tshig gsum gyi bshad pa'i gzhung gis de dag sbyin
T02D2512-3:34a-32: par bya'o // de ltar dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:34a-33: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-3:34a-34: 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te //
T02D2512-3:34a-35: khyod dam tshig las 'das pa'i rgyus dmyal ba khyod la sreg par byed do //
T02D2512-3:34a-36: de yang zangs 'bar zhing zhu ba'i chur 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:34a-37: dam tshig bsrungs na zhes bya ba la dam tshig
T02D2512-3:34a-38: dang mi shes pa rnams la rdo rje la sogs
T02D2512-3:34a-39: pa ma bstan pas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
T02D2512-3:34b-0: dngos @34b grub rdzogs pa'i phyir dngos grub rdo rje'i
T02D2512-3:34b-1: bdud rtsi'i chu ni thar pa chen po'i bdud rtsi'i
T02D2512-3:34b-2: chu ste / dam tshig bsrungs na khyod la 'grub pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:34b-3: dam tshig de gang zhig las 'das pas bdag la skyon cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-3:34b-4: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha
T02D2512-3:34b-5: thams cad kyi rdo rje phyag mtshan rnams ni rdo
T02D2512-3:34b-6: rje'o // rigs thams cad kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa ni dril bu'o //
T02D2512-3:34b-7: chos dang las dang dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po rnams te /
T02D2512-3:34b-8: khyad par du lha thams cad kyi sku'i gsang ba ni phyag rgyar brjod pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:34b-9: dam tshig de gang zhig las 'das pas bdag la skyon cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-3:34b-10: phyag rgya la sogs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di
T02D2512-3:34b-11: dag gal te dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la
T02D2512-3:34b-13: dad pa med pas gzhan bzhad gad byed ces bya ba la /
T02D2512-3:34b-14: rdo rje la sogs pa 'dis ci zhig bya //
T02D2512-3:34b-15: sgom pa kho na gtso bor 'gyur ba yin te /
T02D2512-3:34b-16: lag pa rnam par 'gyur ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2512-3:34b-17: ma yin no zhes skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang du
T02D2512-3:34b-18: gnas nas smod pa gang yin pa 'di ni dam
T02D2512-3:34b-19: tshig las 'das pa'o zhes bya bas mna' bsgag go
T02D2512-3:34b-20: // de ltar dbang bskur ba'i chus chu blud la dam tshig rab tu bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:34b-21: phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa nas dngos
T02D2512-3:34b-22: grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar du sbyin
T02D2512-3:34b-23: par bya'o zhes bya bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-3:34b-24: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de yang go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:34b-25: de ltar dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byin nas de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2512-3:34b-26: chos dang dam tshig rnams sbyin par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-3:34b-27: ba ni cho ga 'dir rab tu bstan par bya
T02D2512-3:34b-28: ba'i phyir de la 'di zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-3:34b-29: pa gsungs te / de la zhes bya ba ni de dag nye bar dgod pa la'o //
T02D2512-3:34b-30: 'di zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu 'og
T02D2512-3:34b-31: nas 'chad par 'gyur ba thugs la bzhag par mdzad
T02D2512-3:34b-33: mchog ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:34b-34: gsang bar gyur pas na gsang bas te dmigs pa
T02D2512-3:34b-35: med pa'i thugs rje chen po las byung ngo zhes
T02D2512-3:34b-37: mchog kyang yin la gsang ba yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang ba'o //
T02D2512-3:34b-38: de nyid kyi phyir dam pa ste phul du byung ba'o //
T02D2512-3:35a-1: tshig gsum ni sbyin pa zhes bya ba la lha
T02D2512-3:35a-2: mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo
T02D2512-3:35a-3: rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni
T02D2512-3:35a-5: de sbyin pa ni thog mtha' med pa zhes bya
T02D2512-3:35a-6: ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i tshig gis slob ma'i
T02D2512-3:35a-8: thog ma ni dang po skye ba'o //
T02D2512-3:35a-9: tha ma ni bar mchod pa'i 'jig pa'o //
T02D2512-3:35a-10: thog ma dang tha ma de dag gang la med
T02D2512-3:35a-11: pa de ni thog ma dan tha ma med pa'o
T02D2512-3:35a-13: sems dpa' zhes bya ba la de bzhin nyid dang
T02D2512-3:35a-14: ro gcig pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams
T02D2512-3:35a-16: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pas mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:35a-17: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:35a-18: rdo rje ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2512-3:35a-19: de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:35a-20: rdo rje la sems dpas na rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:35a-21: de nyid dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:35a-22: nyid kyi sems can gyi don chen po la chags
T02D2512-3:35a-23: pas na dga' ba chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:35a-25: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
T02D2512-3:35a-26: smon lam grub pa mi 'gag chos nyid can //
T02D2512-3:35a-27: 'gro ba'i don ni yang dag sgrub byed mchog / thugs rje'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par mdzes //
T02D2512-3:35a-29: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyi don gyi thabs kyi rang bzhin can du bstan to //
T02D2512-3:35a-30: dga' ba chen po'i don nyid bstan pa'i phyir kun du bzang po zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:35a-31: kun nas bzang po'i dge ba gang las byung ba de ni kun du bzang po'o //
T02D2512-3:35a-32: thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pas na kun bdag nyid do //
T02D2512-3:35a-33: rigs lnga'i lha rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
T02D2512-3:35a-34: ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D2512-3:35a-36: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2512-3:35a-37: bcom ldan 'das ma dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rig pa'i lha mo ni rdo rje bsnyems ma ste /
T02D2512-3:35a-38: de'i bdag po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:35a-39: bdag ces bya ba ni bdag po'o//
T02D2512-3:35b-1: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:35b-2: dpa' ni phyag rgya chen po bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid
T02D2512-3:35b-3: yin pas bdag po zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-3:35b-4: mchod dan po'i skyes bu bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-3:35b-5: rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar btags pa byas nas
T02D2512-3:35b-6: chos kyi dbyings nyid mchog dang po'i skyes bu bcom
T02D2512-3:35b-7: ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du bstan
T02D2512-3:35b-8: to // rdo rje zhes bya ba la dang po'i
T02D2512-3:35b-9: rdo rje brjod do zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro
T02D2512-3:35b-10: to // // gang gis brjod par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-3:35b-11: mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:35b-12: la gang zhig thog mtha' med pa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:35b-13: nas brtsams te ; ji srid mchog dang po'i skyes
T02D2512-3:35b-14: bu bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis
T02D2512-3:35b-15: bstan pa 'di ni mchog gi de kho na nyid
T02D2512-3:35b-16: nas brtsams te ; de / des slob ma rnams la rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:35b-18: gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid bshad nas zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2512-3:35b-20: rdo rje k'i li k'i la dang /
T02D2512-3:35b-22: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin can
T02D2512-3:35b-23: gyi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po
T02D2512-3:35b-24: 'di 'og nas 'chad bar 'gyur ba'i tshig gis slob
T02D2512-3:35b-25: ma rnams la yang dag par bstan la /
T02D2512-3:35b-26: de nas mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:35b-27: de ltar mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje byin nas /
T02D2512-3:35b-28: chos kyi dril bu slob ma rnams dkrol du gzhug
T02D2512-3:35b-29: go zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan
T02D2512-3:35b-31: 'di de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:35b-32: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i thog ma dang tha
T02D2512-3:35b-33: ma med pa gang yin pa de ni 'di ste
T02D2512-3:35b-34: mchog dang po'i skyes bu bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2512-3:35b-35: mchog gi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:35b-36: srid pa'i bdag po zhes bya ba ni khams gsum
T02D2512-3:35b-37: ma lus pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid thob pa'i phyir
T02D2512-3:35b-38: ro // thams cad kyi mchog kyang yin la dbang
T02D2512-3:35b-39: phyug dam pa yang de nyid yin pas na thams
T02D2512-3:35b-40: cad kyi mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'o //
T02D2512-3:35b-41: nyan thos pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2512-3:35b-42: sems dpa' thams cad las phul du byung bas na
T02D2512-3:35b-43: / thams cad las phul du byung ba thams cad kyi mchog go //
T02D2512-3:36a-0: khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i bdag po nyid @36a * //
T02D2512-3:36a-1: thob pas dbang phyug dam pa'o //

T02D2512-3:48a-1: pa yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na rtogs pa thams cad de /

T02D2512-3:48b-0: lnga'i lha rnams kyi dkyil @48b 'khor gang dang gang

T02D2512-3:48b-10: phun sum tshogs pa ni dngos grub thams cad bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'o //

T02D2512-3:48b-19: rigs thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i lha rnams ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /

T02D2512-3:48b-22: du brjod pa ni mngon par phyogs par blangs nas

T02D2512-3:49a-6: rang gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu brjod cing

T02D2512-3:49a-14: pa'i slob dpon gyi bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:49a-15: thams cad rjes su chags pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sgom pa ste /

T02D2512-3:49a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' las gzhan pa yin nam zhe na //

T02D2512-3:49a-26: bzhin can gyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi

T02D2512-3:49a-28: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //

T02D2512-3:49b-0: sgrub shig ces bya ba ni 'das @49b ma thag

T02D2512-3:49b-6: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas /

T02D2512-3:49b-8: brtan zhing mtho ba zhes bya bas rdo rje dran ma'i rang bzhin can bstan to //
T02D2512-3:49b-9: so sor rtog pas myur du sgrubs shig ces bya
T02D2512-3:49b-10: ba dang phyag 'tshal bas rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang
T02D2512-3:49b-11: phyug ma'i rang bzhin bstan to //

T02D2512-3:49b-27: rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pa //

T02D2512-3:49b-38: don yod grub pa rnams la de'i rigs kyang bstan pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:49b-39: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi glu bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:49b-40: rdo rje rigs la 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:49b-41: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te rdo rje'i gzhu ni gzhu'o //

T02D2512-3:58a-39: 'dod chags rdo rje ma sogs kyi //

T02D2512-3:58b-0: / g-yas @58b pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dang po'i rdo rje blangs te /

T02D2512-3:70a-5: pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid
T02D2512-3:70a-7: phyag bzhi dang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar
T02D2512-3:70a-8: ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag btsal
T02D2512-3:70a-9: ba byas nas / dang po sbyor ba dang /
T02D2512-3:70a-10: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:70a-12: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod par byas la rdo
T02D2512-3:70a-13: rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2512-3:70a-14: po las gsungs pa'i lcags kyus 'khor dang bcas pa'i
T02D2512-3:70a-15: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
T02D2512-3:70a-16: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par byas la /
T02D2512-3:70a-17: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te mchod pa'i
T02D2512-3:70a-18: phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod cing
T02D2512-3:70a-19: phyag 'tshal te / de ltar nyin re bzhin du
T02D2512-3:70a-20: bsgom par byas na ji srid dkyil 'khor mthong bar
T02D2512-3:70a-21: phyag 'tshal te / 'gyur ro // yi ge hi'am /
T02D2512-3:70a-23: rdo rje dril bu sogs mnyam bcas //
T02D2512-3:70a-24: rnam dben rol mo brdungs pa yis //
T02D2512-3:70a-25: yi ge hi yi glu rol mo //
T02D2512-3:70a-27: zhes bya ba 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2512-3:70a-28: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas
T02D2512-3:70a-29: par byas la nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo
T02D2512-3:70a-30: rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i
T02D2512-3:70a-32: de nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad rdo rje rtse
T02D2512-3:70a-33: gsum pa'i thig zlum po 'bar ba dang bcas pa
T02D2512-3:70a-34: dang / ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:70a-35: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bris la /
T02D2512-3:70a-36: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su lha
T02D2512-3:70a-37: mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas
T02D2512-3:70a-38: h'um hi zhes bya ba brjod cing /
T02D2512-3:70a-39: bcom ldan 'das ras ris la bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:70a-40: dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po bzhi pos lha mo bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:70a-41: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi dang sgo
T02D2512-3:70a-42: bzhi la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i
T02D2512-3:70a-43: dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshogs khro bo
T02D2512-3:70a-44: sgeg mo la sogs pa dang khro bo rdo rje
T02D2512-3:70b-0: lcags kyu ma @70b la sogs pa bzhi bri bar
T02D2512-3:70b-1: bya'o // de la rdo rje ma me ltar 'bar
T02D2512-3:70b-2: ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:70b-3: dang sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil
T02D2512-3:70b-4: 'khor gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa thams cad
T02D2512-3:70b-5: bya'o // dang / rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:70b-6: cho ga dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:70b-8: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-3:70b-9: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor
T02D2512-3:70b-10: bas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i sku'i
T02D2512-3:70b-11: gsang ba gang yin pa de gnas pa ni rdo
T02D2512-3:70b-13: de'i cho ga ni bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-3:70b-14: sgrub pa'i rtog pa bstan pa'o /
T02D2512-3:70b-15: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel pa shes rab
T02D2512-3:70b-16: kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'byung ba zhes bya
T02D2512-3:70b-17: ba las rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i
T02D2512-3:70b-18: gsang ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bshad pa
T02D2512-3:70b-20: / de ltar rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar
T02D2512-3:70b-21: ba'i gsang ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho
T02D2512-3:70b-22: bstan nas / da ni rdo rje nyi ma me
T02D2512-3:70b-23: ltar 'bar ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi
T02D2512-3:70b-24: cho ga gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:70b-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:70b-26: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa rjod par byed pa ste /
T02D2512-3:70b-27: dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid du'o //
T02D2512-3:70b-28: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal
T02D2512-3:70b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las
T02D2512-3:70b-31: yi ge h'um gis dkyil 'khor sprul te /
T02D2512-3:70b-32: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi snying po rnams kyis lha thams cad dgod par bya ste /
T02D2512-3:70b-33: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:70b-34: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsum pa shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:70b-35: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:70b-36: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob nas
T02D2512-3:70b-37: bzlas pa dang bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes
T02D2512-3:70b-38: bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya
T02D2512-3:70b-39: ba'i phyir shin tu phra ba la sogs pas slob
T02D2512-3:70b-40: dpon gyi las la sogs pa'i cho ga dang /
T02D2512-3:70b-41: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:70b-42: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor phra ba las kyang shin tu phra ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:70b-43: de bshad pa ni bstan par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:70b-44: 'dir shin tu khro ba sgeg pa ston par byed pas na shin tu gsang ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:71a-0: rdo rje ni rdo rje nyi ma me @71a * //
T02D2512-3:71a-2: de'i gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma
T02D2512-3:71a-3: rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha' thams cad khyab
T02D2512-3:71a-4: pa'i phyir chen po de nyid yin no //
T02D2512-3:71a-5: ji bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-3:71a-6: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2512-3:71a-7: po las gsungs pa'i cho gas grong khyer sum brtsegs
T02D2512-3:71a-8: dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pas yang dag par
T02D2512-3:71a-9: brgyan la / rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi slob
T02D2512-3:71a-10: dpon rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang
T02D2512-3:71a-11: ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor
T02D2512-3:71a-13: de'i rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan ma thob nas gsang
T02D2512-3:71a-14: ba'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs pas
T02D2512-3:71a-15: yang dag par bris la rdo rje chen po 'dod
T02D2512-3:71a-16: pa'i me 'bar ba la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i lha
T02D2512-3:71a-17: mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2512-3:71a-18: de'i rigs dang rgyan dang ldan pa'i bu mo bzhi dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2512-3:71a-19: rang nyid rdo rje drag po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2512-3:71a-20: de'i dbyibs dang rgyan dang ldan pas gar las byung
T02D2512-3:71a-21: ba'i me tog dang bcas pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal
T02D2512-3:71a-22: mo rang gi spyi bor bcings la /
T02D2512-3:71a-23: h'um rdo rje gzhu dang mda' bcas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2512-3:71a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i glu brjod
T02D2512-3:71a-25: cing lha mo bzhi'i phreng ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i
T02D2512-3:71a-26: slob dpon gyis rang gi lha'i me tog gi phreng
T02D2512-3:71a-27: ba blangs te / 'jug pa'i glu dang /
T02D2512-3:71a-28: rang gi lha'i snying po rjod par byed pa'i bu
T02D2512-3:71a-29: mo de rnams dang bcas par dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2512-3:71a-30: par bya'o // de nas g-yon pa'i kha ni gyen du bstod //
T02D2512-3:71a-31: rdo rje drag po bzhad pa chen po'i sgra sgrogs
T02D2512-3:71a-32: mchog gi ming can gyi phyag rgyas ha ha ha
T02D2512-3:71a-33: ha / aom badzra ru lu ru lu lam zhes
T02D2512-3:71a-34: brjod cing dga' ba chen po'i dbugs kyi rlung gis
T02D2512-3:71a-35: ru lu ni drug dang ldan par bar ma dag
T02D2512-3:71a-36: gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:71a-37: 'di ni 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:71a-38: de ltar bu mo de rnams dang lhan cig tu
T02D2512-3:71a-39: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas me tog dor
T02D2512-3:71a-40: ba'i sngags kyis me tog gi tshogs gtor bar bya'o
T02D2512-3:71a-41: // de nas ji lta ba bzhin du phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blangs te /
T02D2512-3:71b-0: gdong g-yogs dkrol te dkyil 'khor mthong nas 'jug @71b pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bar byas nas /
T02D2512-3:71b-1: chu'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D2512-3:71b-2: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:71b-3: dang po re zhig thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D2512-3:71b-4: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod phan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D2512-3:71b-5: de nas thod pa'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2512-3:71b-6: lnga dang lhan cig pa'i gsang ba'am brdungs pa la
T02D2512-3:71b-7: sogs pa'i rang bzhin can rdo rje rin po che
T02D2512-3:71b-8: dang cod pan gyi sngags dag gis yongs su bzlas
T02D2512-3:71b-9: pa'i phyi'i cod pan gyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2512-3:71b-10: // de la gtsugs tor dang mdun dang logs gnyis dang /
T02D2512-3:71b-11: rgyab tu rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i thod
T02D2512-3:71b-12: pa rnams te de rnams kyi steng du de bzhin
T02D2512-3:71b-13: gshegs pa rnams cod pan du bya'o //
T02D2512-3:71b-14: de ltar thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur gyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-3:71b-15: cho ga thams cad rdzogs par byas nas bdag nyid
T02D2512-3:71b-16: dang bu mo rnams la dam tshig gsum sbyin par
T02D2512-3:71b-17: bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:71b-18: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur gyis //
T02D2512-3:71b-19: dam tshig 'di ni gsal par sbyin //
T02D2512-3:71b-22: da ni rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:71b-23: de la 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:71b-24: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du byas pa'i sor mo'i
T02D2512-3:71b-25: rtse mo thams cad phan tshun du yang dag par
T02D2512-3:71b-26: sbyar ba byas la mthe bong gnyis rtse mo yang
T02D2512-3:71b-27: dag par sbyar ba'i rtse mo byas te /
T02D2512-3:71b-28: des sor mo'i rtse mo rnams dgab par byas te /
T02D2512-3:71b-29: 'di rdo rje padmas te dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:71b-30: de nas h'um aa bhi shinytsa mam zhes bya ba brjod cing gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-3:71b-32: rna ba gnyis kyi steng dang /
T02D2512-3:71b-33: spyi bo'i rgyab tu dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:71b-34: 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-3:71b-35: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur ba 'dis sgrub pa po
T02D2512-3:71b-36: dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2512-3:71b-37: sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02D2512-3:71b-38: de de dag gis byin gyis brlab pa dang zhes bya ba sbyar ro //
T02D2512-3:71b-39: sgrub pa po de la ji ltar byin gyis brlab pa mdzad ce na /
T02D2512-3:72a-0: ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams thal bar rab tu @72a * //
T02D2512-3:72a-1: 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir thal bar rab tu rlog pa'o //
T02D2512-3:72a-2: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum
T02D2512-3:72a-3: las rnam par rgyal bas na thams cad las rnam
T02D2512-3:72a-4: par rgyal ba'o // khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo
T02D2512-3:72a-5: rje chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya bar
T02D2512-3:72a-6: yang byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:72a-7: de nyid kyis rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:72a-8: bud med rnams kyang 'bebs gyur na //
T02D2512-3:72a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-3:72a-10: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i bu mo rnams gang yin pa de dag kyang 'bebs na /
T02D2512-3:72a-11: bdag nyid mnga' 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rang gi
T02D2512-3:72a-12: lha mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D2512-3:72a-14: ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-3:72a-15: de kho na nyid dang chos dang /
T02D2512-3:72a-16: dam tshig blangs la rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:72a-17: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2512-3:72a-19: rdo rje 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su yang dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:72a-20: 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te ji ltar
T02D2512-3:72a-21: slob dpon gyis rang nyid rdo rje nyi ma me
T02D2512-3:72a-22: ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje drag po'i gzugs su byin
T02D2512-3:72a-23: gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-3:72a-26: dam tshig blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
T02D2512-3:72a-27: khams gsum ma lus pa'i stobs chen po'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:72a-28: de bzhin du bu mo rnams kyang rang gi lha'i
T02D2512-3:72a-29: rnal 'byor gyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur byas nas
T02D2512-3:72a-33: rdo rje 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:72a-34: da ni bu mo dang bcas pa'i slob dpon la
T02D2512-3:72a-35: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs
T02D2512-3:72a-36: pa 'bebs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de la
T02D2512-3:72a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:72a-38: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dgar ba la'o //
T02D2512-3:72a-39: thog ma kho nar zhes bya ba ni shin tu dang po kho na'o //
T02D2512-3:72a-40: re zhig gi sgra ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
T02D2512-3:72a-41: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po ni nyi ma dang 'dra bas na nyi ma'o //
T02D2512-3:72a-42: gdug pa dang drag po rnams thal bar rab tu
T02D2512-3:72a-43: 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir thal bar rab tu
T02D2512-3:72b-0: rlog go // rdo rje nyi ma @72b me ltar
T02D2512-3:72b-1: 'bar ba chen po yang yin la thal bar rab
T02D2512-3:72b-2: tu rlog pa yang de nyid yin pas na /
T02D2512-3:72b-3: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po
T02D2512-3:72b-4: thal bar rab tu rlog pas te de'i ming dang
T02D2512-3:72b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bo thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D2512-3:72b-7: mchog dang po ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:72b-8: yang dag par 'bebs pa'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'i rgyud la rab tu zhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:72b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen
T02D2512-3:72b-10: po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
T02D2512-3:72b-12: des thabs kyi ngo bor bskyed pa'i zhe sdang gi
T02D2512-3:72b-13: khro bo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis nye
T02D2512-3:72b-14: bar mtshon la / mi phyed pa'i khon du 'dzin
T02D2512-3:72b-15: pa'i khro bo'i me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje ni
T02D2512-3:72b-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar
T02D2512-3:72b-17: ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan
T02D2512-3:72b-18: dang bcas pas bzhugs pa ni rdo rje kha tv'am
T02D2512-3:72b-19: ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2512-3:72b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen
T02D2512-3:72b-21: po'i thabs kyi khon du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me
T02D2512-3:72b-22: 'bar ba'i rdo rje yang de nyid yin la rdo
T02D2512-3:72b-23: rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa yang
T02D2512-3:72b-24: de nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-3:72b-25: cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis kho na
T02D2512-3:72b-26: du 'dzin pa'i khro bo me 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i
T02D2512-3:72b-27: kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2512-3:72b-28: nges par sbyor ba ni gtso bo nyid du nges par sbyor ba'o //
T02D2512-3:72b-29: ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu ni ba dan
T02D2512-3:72b-30: gyi dril bu ste de 'dzin par mdzad pas na
T02D2512-3:72b-31: ba dan gyi dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2512-3:72b-32: rdo rje snyems ma ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-3:72b-33: de'i bdag po ni rdo rje snyems ma'i bdag po'o //
T02D2512-3:72b-34: 'bebs pa'i khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pas
T02D2512-3:72b-35: 'bebs pa ni shin tu khro bo'i 'bebs pa ste
T02D2512-3:72b-37: de lta bu'i phyag rgya gang dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02D2512-3:72b-38: sgeg pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-3:72b-39: sgeg pa dang khro bo ston par byed pa'i smin

T02D2512-3:75b-31: de'i tshe bud med rnams gzhug ste /
T02D2512-3:75b-32: rdo rje 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:75b-33: lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par byas la
T02D2512-3:75b-36: dam tshig gi mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig gsum
T02D2512-3:75b-37: byin gyis brlabs nas rang gi logs gnyis su sngon
T02D2512-3:75b-38: du bsnyen pa byas pa yang dag par gzhag par
T02D2512-3:75b-39: bya'o // skyes ba rnams kyang sngon du bsnyen pa
T02D2512-3:75b-40: byas pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i
T02D2512-3:75b-42: dam tshig gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de rnams
T02D2512-3:75b-43: lha mo bzhi'i phreng ba'i dbus su bkod pa de'i
T02D2512-3:75b-44: rnal 'byor sgrub pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug
T02D2512-3:76a-0: par bya'o // rdo rje chen po'i @76a * //
T02D2512-3:76a-1: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i dam tshig dang sngom pa dag kyang len du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:76a-2: bu mo dang khye'u ni byis pa'i blo'i rang bzhin can rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
T02D2512-3:76a-3: tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon rang nyid kyis yang drag par bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:76a-4: dus gzhan du de rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du sgrub pa la nges par sbyar par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:76a-5: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi chog rgyas par
T02D2512-3:76a-6: bstan nas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2512-3:76a-7: ga rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:76a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:76a-9: byang chub sems ni bla na med par bskyed nas zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:76a-10: mi phyed pa zhes bya ba ni srog chags dang
T02D2512-3:76a-11: srog chags ma thams cad kyis dbye bar mi nus
T02D2512-3:76a-13: dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon
T02D2512-3:76a-14: du byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas so sor
T02D2512-3:76a-15: rtogs pa'o // 'dod chags la sogs ba'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /
T02D2512-3:76a-16: phyi rol gyi lha chen po la sogs pa ni gdug pa rnams te /
T02D2512-3:76a-17: de dag gnod pas na gdug pa thams cad gnod
T02D2512-3:76a-18: ba ste de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems so
T02D2512-3:76a-19: // sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-3:76a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-3:76a-21: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs
T02D2512-3:76a-22: rgyas kun te de'i rang bzhin yin pas na sangs
T02D2512-3:76a-24: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bar ba'i rdo rje
T02D2512-3:76a-25: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems ni smos
T02D2512-3:76a-26: pa byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D2512-3:76a-27: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa ste de nyid yin no //
T02D2512-3:76a-28: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su gdul bya rnams
T02D2512-3:76a-29: kyis yongs su brtag pa de nyid mtshon cha ste
T02D2512-3:76a-30: / de rgyal pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bde
T02D2512-3:76a-31: ba chen po'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:76a-32: don du kun du bzang po'i lag tu phyin pa
T02D2512-3:76a-33: / yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa ni bka' ste /
T02D2512-3:76a-34: de'i dngos grub ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub bo //
T02D2512-3:76a-35: de'i don du mtshon cha de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de'i lag tu phyin pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:76a-36: rdo rjes nye bar mtshan pa'i phyag gang la mnga'
T02D2512-3:76a-37: ba de ni phyag na rdo rje ste byang chub
T02D2512-3:76b-0: sems dpa' kun du bzang @76b po'o //
T02D2512-3:76b-1: de ltar sgeg pa dang khro bo'i gzugs can rdo
T02D2512-3:76b-2: rjes rdo rje 'chang ba bstan nas da ni thun
T02D2512-3:76b-3: mong ma yin pa'i khro bo'i rdo rje bstan par
T02D2512-3:76b-4: bya ba'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:76b-5: rtag tu chags pa las byung ba'i khro bo ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:76b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2512-3:76b-8: dang dril bu 'chang ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
T02D2512-3:76b-10: ci'i phyir zhi na gdul bya'i phyir zhes bya ba ni drag po la sogs pa gdug pa dang /
T02D2512-3:76b-11: drag po rnams ni khro bos gdul bar 'gyur bas te /
T02D2512-3:76b-12: de'i phyir khro bos gdul ba'i rgyu de'i phyir rdo rje sems dba' nyid khro bor 'gyur te /
T02D2512-3:76b-13: nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:76b-14: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-3:76b-15: rdo rje ltar 'bar ba ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-3:76b-16: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba la ste /
T02D2512-3:76b-17: khro bo rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba nyid de gzhan ni ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:76b-18: rdo rje ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems te /
T02D2512-3:76b-19: de'i 'bar ba ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad la
T02D2512-3:76b-20: rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
T02D2512-3:76b-21: sngon po 'bar ba'i ngo bo sems dpa'i ste 'od
T02D2512-3:76b-23: de nyid rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ste /
T02D2512-3:76b-24: kun nas nyon mongs pa can bsregs nas /
T02D2512-3:76b-25: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:76b-26: mdzad pas na nyi ma dang mtshungs pas nyi ma'o
T02D2512-3:76b-27: // de nyid kyi phyir rab tu 'jigs pa las
T02D2512-3:76b-28: kyang 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog tu 'jigs pa ni
T02D2512-3:76b-29: // nga yin no // de ltar bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:76b-30: kyis de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje gzung ba
T02D2512-3:76b-31: // nga yin no // bstan nas / da ni lha mo rnams kyi gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2512-3:76b-32: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-3:76b-33: de las byung ba ni skyes pas te de'i 'od
T02D2512-3:76b-34: kyi 'khor lo las byung ba'o zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2512-3:76b-35: to // grib ma zhes bya ba ni de dang
T02D2512-3:76b-36: rjes su mthun zhing mtshungs pas te de dag de
T02D2512-3:76b-37: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul pa ni skyed par
T02D2512-3:76b-38: to // mdzad pa'o // las de lta bu dang ldan pa zhe na /
T02D2512-3:76b-39: ma lus bdud sogs gdug pa yi //
T02D2512-3:76b-40: khrag gsol bar ni nus pa'o //
T02D2512-3:76b-41: zhes bya ba la lus pa med pa'i bdud la
T02D2512-3:77a-0: sogs pa'i gdug pa rnams kyi khrag gsol pa'i @77a
T02D2512-3:77a-2: shin tu nyal du bcug pa ni shin tu gsod pa'o //
T02D2512-3:77a-3: des dag pa ni dag par gyur pas te rjes
T02D2512-3:77a-4: su brtse bas ni ma yin no zhes bstan to
T02D2512-3:77a-5: // mi'i khrag sngags kyi stobs kyis dgug pa 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni khrag chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:77a-7: slar yang 'di'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-3:77a-8: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2512-3:77a-9: lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bu mo
T02D2512-3:77a-10: rnams dang lhan cig tu lha mo bzhi dang yang
T02D2512-3:77a-11: dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis nye bar 'dug
T02D2512-3:77a-12: la dkyil 'khor thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2512-3:77a-13: yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
T02D2512-3:77a-14: ji srid mtshan ma thog par 'gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:77a-15: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D2512-3:77a-16: lha lhag par gnas par byas la /
T02D2512-3:77a-17: nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su dkyil 'khor la thig
T02D2512-3:77a-18: btab nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du bris la
T02D2512-3:77a-19: de'i phyed kyi tshad kyis nang du rlung gi dkyil
T02D2512-3:77a-20: 'khor zla pa phyed pa'i dbyibs can de'i steng du
T02D2512-3:77a-21: 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar
T02D2512-3:77a-22: mdzes pa ste / lcags kyi phye mas 'bar bar bris la /
T02D2512-3:77a-23: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar padma'i ras ris kyis bkab pa'i gdan la /
T02D2512-3:77a-24: lha mo bzhi yang dag par 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2512-3:77a-25: gyis rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bu
T02D2512-3:77a-26: mo bzhi dang lhan cig tu slob dpon gyis 'dug
T02D2512-3:77a-27: par bya'o // phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi po
T02D2512-3:77a-28: la khro bo'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2512-3:77a-30: sgo bzhi po la khro mo rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi'am /
T02D2512-3:77a-31: de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:77a-32: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas tshogs yod na tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtags te /
T02D2512-3:77a-33: go cha thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:77a-35: slob la gzhug pa'i dus su rang gi slob dpon
T02D2512-3:77a-36: nam de'i yon tan dang ldan pa gzhan dbus su
T02D2512-3:77a-37: dgod par bya'o // gang la tshogs med na de'i
T02D2512-3:77a-38: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su lha mo bzhi
T02D2512-3:77b-0: phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das @77b
T02D2512-3:77b-1: snying po 'dis ras ris la bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:77b-3: rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa me ltar 'bar ba'i snying po ni hni zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-3:77b-4: gnyis pa ni h'um zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:77b-5: gsum pa ni aom badzra ru lu lu lam hni zhes bya ba'o /
T02D2512-3:77b-6: bzhi pa ni shne zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:77b-7: khro bo'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams
T02D2512-3:77b-8: ni sngar bshad pa'i snying po rnams kyis dgod par
T02D2512-3:77b-9: bya'o // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phyi la bsdu par byas nas mtshan brgyas bstod nas /
T02D2512-3:77b-10: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:77b-11: chen po las gsungs pa'i spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:77b-12: dang sngags dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas
T02D2512-3:77b-13: pa dkyil 'khor du bcug ste bgegs bskrad pa la
T02D2512-3:77b-15: yi ge h'um gis mchod yon phul te /
T02D2512-3:77b-16: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:77b-17: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po
T02D2512-3:77b-18: rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la
T02D2512-3:77b-19: rgyas btab ste thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2512-3:77b-20: phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog gi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-3:77b-21: mchod yon bu la ba sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad kyis mchod pa bya'o //
T02D2512-3:77b-22: de la re zhig padma'i snod du khrag chen dang
T02D2512-3:77b-23: ga bur dang tsandan dmar po yi ge h'um gis
T02D2512-3:77b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs
T02D2512-3:77b-26: su gzung ba'i rdo rje me tog gi yal ga
T02D2512-3:77b-27: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du bzhag ste /
T02D2512-3:77b-28: bum pa dang bum pa gang ba rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:77b-29: de nas mchod ba thams cad bya'o //
T02D2512-3:77b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor gyis rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan zhing /
T02D2512-3:77b-31: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2512-3:77b-32: sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i bu mo bzhi dang
T02D2512-3:77b-33: lhan cig tu phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro bas gar
T02D2512-3:77b-34: las byung ba'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo me tog
T02D2512-3:77b-35: dang bcas pa spyi bor bcings te /
T02D2512-3:77b-36: de bzhin du me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02D2512-3:77b-37: rdo rje shugs kyis rdo rje mda' gzhu can khyod
T02D2512-3:77b-38: la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'jug
T02D2512-3:77b-39: pa'i glu brjod cing 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78a-0: bu mo bzhi pos kyang rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis @78a * //
T02D2512-3:78a-1: kyis 'ching zhing me tog phreng ba blangs te 'jug pa'i glu dang /
T02D2512-3:78a-2: rang gi lha'i snying po bzla zhing 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78a-3: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi
T02D2512-3:78a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi chog dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul
T02D2512-3:78a-5: zhugs kyi mthar sa thams cad rjes su sbyangs nas
T02D2512-3:78a-6: / me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-3:78a-7: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i
T02D2512-3:78a-8: mchod pa bcu gnyis bu mo bzhi dang bcas pa'i
T02D2512-3:78a-9: bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas de kho na
T02D2512-3:78a-13: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas blangs te /
T02D2512-3:78a-14: tshigs su bcad pa lnga bos rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2512-3:78a-17: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78a-18: bu mo bzhi yang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas blangs te /
T02D2512-3:78a-19: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su lha mo bzhi dang yang
T02D2512-3:78a-20: dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis zla ba tshes
T02D2512-3:78a-21: pa'i dkyil 'khor dang lhan cig tu bdag nyid la
T02D2512-3:78a-22: gzhug par bya'o // de nas thams cad dgug dang mchod pa dang /
T02D2512-3:78a-23: bdag byin gyis brlab pa sogs bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas pa rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D2512-3:78a-24: nyin re'i sbyor bas yi ge h'um gi bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78a-25: bu mo rnams kyis kyang rang gi lha mo rnams kyi ba bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78a-26: de nas khrag chen ga bur bcas /
T02D2512-3:78a-27: tsandan dmar po dang bcas pa rdo rje 'bar ba
T02D2512-3:78a-28: dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i
T02D2512-3:78a-29: padma'i snod na gnas par sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D2512-3:78a-30: srin lag dang mthe bong gi rtse mos blangs te bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78a-31: bu mo de rnams kyis rang gi lha'i snying pos bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78a-32: de nas thams cad mkha' spyod du 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:78a-33: rnal 'byor ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug dang /
T02D2512-3:78a-34: bu mo rnams ni rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa'i
T02D2512-3:78a-35: me la sogs pa'i gzugs can gyi rnal 'byor ma
T02D2512-3:78a-37: de nas 'bar ba'i sbyor ba 'di yin te /
T02D2512-3:78a-38: padma'i 'dab ma'i dbus su yi ge ha las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-3:78a-39: de'i steng du thig le dang bcas pa'i yi ge
T02D2512-3:78a-40: ram las me'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du me stag
T02D2512-3:78a-41: 'phro zhing 'bar ba'i yi ge h'um rnams bar bsams
T02D2512-3:78b-0: @78b la ; rdzas de des rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa rnams par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78b-1: gang zhig la rab tu 'bar ba'i nus pa med de bza' bar mi bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78b-2: 'o na kyang rjes su bsgrub pa dang /
T02D2512-3:78b-3: so sor rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs
T02D2512-3:78b-4: dang bcas pas mtshan ma ma lus par bsgrub par
T02D2512-3:78b-5: bya'o // de nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su
T02D2512-3:78b-6: phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin 'dun par
T02D2512-3:78b-7: 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:78b-8: gal te slob ma rnams gzhug par 'dod na /
T02D2512-3:78b-9: de'i tshe bu mo rnams med par 'jug pa gnyis pas 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2512-3:78b-10: cho ga thams cad kyang rjes su spyad la rdo
T02D2512-3:78b-11: rje bzung ste ba zhin du nyi ma me lngar
T02D2512-3:78b-12: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i chogs phyag bzhi
T02D2512-3:78b-14: de nas byang chub chen por sems bskyed du gzhug go //
T02D2512-3:78b-15: de nas de rnams rdo rje nyi ma me ltar
T02D2512-3:78b-16: 'bar ba'i gzugs su byas la yang dag par mchod
T02D2512-3:78b-17: de / gar las byung ba'i me tog dang bcas
T02D2512-3:78b-18: pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo 'ching du gzhug par
T02D2512-3:78b-19: de / bya'o // de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug nas gzhug ste /
T02D2512-3:78b-20: thams cad byas la rdo rje la sogs pa gsum po de rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78b-21: rtag tu 'dod chags las byung khrod //
T02D2512-3:78b-22: rdo rje sems pa'i gdul bya'i phyir //
T02D2512-3:78b-23: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar //
T02D2512-3:78b-25: zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid 'dis gsang ba
T02D2512-3:78b-26: lnga'i bshad pa byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya
T02D2512-3:78b-27: ba ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i
T02D2512-3:78b-29: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams ni //
T02D2512-3:78b-31: grib ma 'di dag bdud la sogs //
T02D2512-3:78b-32: gdug pa ma lus khrag za nus //
T02D2512-3:78b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul //
T02D2512-3:78b-34: zhes pa'i de kho na nyid 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:78b-35: rdo rje kha tv'am ga nges par sbyor ba'i ba

T02D2512-3:79a-0: nges @79a * // pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /
T02D2512-3:79a-1: thams cad lhung bar byed pa dang /

T02D2512-3:79a-5: de la dam tshig gi ni 'di yin te /

T02D2512-3:79a-7: tsandan dmar pos sbyar byas te //
T02D2512-3:79a-8: tshogs kyi nang du rab zhugs nas //
T02D2512-3:79a-9: rdo rje dang bcas rdor 'dzin nyid //
T02D2512-3:79a-10: srin lag mthe bo'i rtse mo yis //
T02D2512-3:79a-11: nam mkha' thams cad mchog sbyor ldan //
T02D2512-3:79a-12: zla ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na //
T02D2512-3:79a-13: rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2512-3:79a-14: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //
T02D2512-3:79a-15: ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du //
T02D2512-3:79a-16: nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis //
T02D2512-3:79a-17: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //
T02D2512-3:79a-18: zhes bya ba 'di tshogs kyi 'khor lor shes bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:79a-19: sngon du bsnyen pa'i dus su ni //
T02D2512-3:79a-20: nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis //
T02D2512-3:79a-21: thams cad nam mkha' zhes brjod cing //
T02D2512-3:79a-22: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas btab pa yi //
T02D2512-3:79a-23: 'jig rten gsum yang bza' bar bya //

T02D2512-3:79a-27: gnyer can spyan dmar ser gyis shin tu 'jigs par
T02D2512-3:79a-28: byed pa // phyag g-yas pas 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gsor ba la brtson pa /

T02D2512-3:79a-32: g-yon par mchod phyir thogs kyi tshul du rdo rje

T02D2512-3:79b-25: 'bar ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bstan nas

T02D2512-3:79b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D2512-3:79b-41: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog kyang

T02D2512-3:79b-43: na mchog tu gsang bas te ras ris kyi dkyil
T02D2512-3:79b-44: 'khor ro // sems can gdul bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-3:79b-45: de'i chog ga ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub
T02D2512-3:80a-0: 'khor ro // pa @80a * // bstan pa yin pa'o //

T02D2512-3:80a-4: rgyal pos te don yod zhags pa'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:80a-5: don to // de yang mchog stsol bri bar bya'o //

T02D2512-3:80a-13: phyag rgya gang yin pa de la de skad ces

T02D2512-3:80a-16: gyis 'gyu ba dang de yin pas yongs su bskor

T02D2512-3:91a-1: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang

T02D2512-3:91a-17: srog chags dang srog chags ma yin pa rnams kyis

T02D2512-3:91b-24: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs

T02D2512-3:97a-1: rnal 'byor sems las byung ba zhes bya ba la /
