T02D2512-3:99b-5: gzhon nu ming can gyi phyir sgrub par byed pa
T02D2512-3:99b-7: rdo rje slob dpon dang slob ma mchog de rnams
T02D2512-3:99b-8: la thams cad rnal 'byor gyi cho ga sbyar bar
T02D2512-3:99b-9: bya'o // ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sku
T02D2512-3:99b-10: gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rdo rje dang dril bu
T02D2512-3:99b-11: dang dam tshig gi ming dang ldan pa rnams ni
T02D2512-3:99b-13: dad pas de'i rjes su 'brang ba ni sngon du
T02D2512-3:99b-14: byed pa'i lhag par mos pas na de nyid dad
T02D2512-3:99b-16: de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba de rnams
T02D2512-3:99b-17: la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i thams cad
T02D2512-3:99b-18: rnal 'byor gyi cho ga sbyar bar bya ba ni
T02D2512-3:99b-19: bsgom par bya ba'i phyir bstan par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:99b-20: gzhan rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming dang ldan
T02D2512-3:99b-21: pa mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i slob ma rnams
T02D2512-3:99b-22: la de kho na nyid la dad pa'i stobs dang
T02D2512-3:99b-23: thos pa'i stobs shes nas rim gyis sbyin par bya
T02D2512-3:99b-24: ste cig car du ni ma yin no zhes bya
T02D2512-3:99b-25: ba'o // thams cad rnal 'byor gyi cho ga 'di de ltar sbyar na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-3:99b-26: 'di la sgrub min cung zad med //
T02D2512-3:99b-27: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-3:99b-28: gang gi phyir thams cad rnal 'byor gyi cho ga
T02D2512-3:99b-29: 'dis rab tu sbyar na bsgrub par bya ba ma
T02D2512-3:99b-30: yin te / de'i phyir tshul nyid kyis 'di rab
T02D2512-3:99b-31: tu sbyor bar bya ba yin te gzhan du dam
T02D2512-3:99b-32: tshig nyams pas dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ba yin
T02D2512-3:99b-34: dngos grub las zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:99b-35: de ltar rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas da
T02D2512-3:99b-36: ni phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya
T02D2512-3:99b-38: rtog pa thams cad don yod pa //
T02D2512-3:99b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te dpal rdo
T02D2512-3:99b-40: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs kyi lha thams
T02D2512-3:99b-41: cad ni rtog pa thams cad de /
T02D2512-3:99b-42: de rnams kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2512-3:99b-43: de khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin
T02D2512-3:99b-44: zhe na zhes bya ba ni de'i khyad par bstan
T02D2512-3:99b-46: don yod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2512-3:99b-47: te don yod pa ni 'bras bu med pa ma
T02D2512-3:99b-48: yin no // de nyid kyis na thogs pa med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:100a-2: dngos grub ma yin pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i nyon mongs
T02D2512-3:100a-3: pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad la
T02D2512-3:100a-4: glags ster ba dang bral bas na mkhas pa'o //
T02D2512-3:100a-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis mthong bar dka' bas na phra ba'o //
T02D2512-3:100a-6: nam mkha' thams cad khyab pas na rgya che ba'o//
T02D2512-3:100a-7: rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du tha mal ma'i shes
T02D2512-3:100a-8: pas rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir na zab pa'o
T02D2512-3:100a-9: // rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsam par mi nus pas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02D2512-3:100a-10: nam mkha' thams cad du rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sku
T02D2512-3:100a-11: gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis thams cad
T02D2512-3:100a-12: du 'gro bas na shin tu tshad med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:100a-13: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos
T02D2512-3:100a-14: grub thams cad dang bar ma dang tha ma'i dngos
T02D2512-3:100a-15: grub thams cad khyad par du sgrub par byed pas
T02D2512-3:100a-16: na ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi
T02D2512-3:100a-17: dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rab
T02D2512-3:100a-19: don yod pa yang de yin la thogs pa med cing mchog tu mkhas pa dang /
T02D2512-3:100a-23: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02D2512-3:100a-24: shin tu tshad med pa dang ma lus shing lus
T02D2512-3:100a-25: pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:100a-26: dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa
T02D2512-3:100a-27: yang de nyid yin pas na don yod cing thogs
T02D2512-3:100a-28: pa med pa la sogs pa de yin no //
T02D2512-3:100a-29: skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir thog ma dang
T02D2512-3:100a-30: tha ma med pa'i rigs thams cad rdzogs par byed
T02D2512-3:100a-31: pa'i rgyu yin pas na mchog tu grub pa'o //
T02D2512-3:100a-32: de lta bur gyur pa'i phyag rgya chen po la
T02D2512-3:100a-33: sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyi rgyu ni rgyun te
T02D2512-3:100a-34: bshad par bya ba ni bstan par bya ba yin
T02D2512-3:100a-35: no zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:100a-36: dpas gsungs so // de khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02D2512-3:100a-37: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:100a-38: yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas
T02D2512-3:100a-39: na phyag rgya thams cad de lha thams cad kyi
T02D2512-3:100a-40: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams
T02D2512-3:100a-41: so // de dag mkhyen pa'i nges pa ste /
T02D2512-3:100a-42: des rdo rje ltar brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'i
T02D2512-3:100a-43: sems de thugs gang la mnga' ba de la de
T02D2512-3:100a-45: rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:100b-0: g-yon pa'i padma zhes bya ba la @100b sogs pa
T02D2512-3:100b-1: la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas snga
T02D2512-3:100b-2: ma bzhin du dam tshig sems dpa' byin gyis brlab
T02D2512-3:100b-3: pa la sogs pa mthar thug pa can gyi rang
T02D2512-3:100b-4: gi cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2512-3:100b-5: rkang pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i phyed stan gyi tshul
T02D2512-3:100b-6: du bzhag nas de'i steng du rkang pa g-yas pa
T02D2512-3:100b-7: gyen du kha blta bar byas la padma'i phyogs su
T02D2512-3:100b-9: de ltar rkang pa g-yon pa la de dgod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:100b-10: ji ltar bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa
T02D2512-3:100b-11: dang bral ba'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni
T02D2512-3:100b-13: de bzhin du ci bde bar ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:100b-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i byang chub chen po'i thugs kyi
T02D2512-3:100b-15: rang bzhin ston par byed pa'i skyil krung ni sems
T02D2512-3:100b-17: de bcing ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam
T02D2512-3:100b-18: par rtog pa dang bral ba'i byang chub chen po'i
T02D2512-3:100b-19: thugs kyi rang bzhin mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D2512-3:100b-21: gang zhig pang ba g-yon pa la rnam par bzhag
T02D2512-3:100b-22: pa'i zhabs kyi padma gang yin pa de nyid thar
T02D2512-3:100b-23: pa'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub chen po'i thugs su
T02D2512-3:100b-24: rnam par bsam par bya ba yin no zhes bya
T02D2512-3:100b-25: ba'o // byang chub chen po'i sems ston par byed
T02D2512-3:100b-26: pa'i skyil mo krung 'dis kyang rnal 'byor pa'i bdud
T02D2512-3:100b-27: bzhi bcom pa yang bstan pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:100b-29: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcings nas //
T02D2512-3:100b-30: bdud kun rab tu 'joms par byed //
T02D2512-3:100b-32: rang nyid lus ni drang por 'dzin //
T02D2512-3:100b-33: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:100b-34: rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsnyems par byas nas /
T02D2512-3:100b-35: lag pa g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje steng du gsor zhing gsor te /
T02D2512-3:100b-36: gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid sngon du byed
T02D2512-3:100b-37: pa ston par byed pa'i rdo rje gsor ba 'dis
T02D2512-3:100b-38: bdud bzhi po thams cad las rgyal bas rang gi
T02D2512-3:100b-39: snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje 'dzin cing
T02D2512-3:100b-40: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa
T02D2512-3:100b-41: ni kun mchog grub pa ste /
T02D2512-3:100b-42: de'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i gsang ba'i
T02D2512-3:100b-43: nga rgyal mngon du byed pa ni sku'i rdo rje
T02D2512-3:100b-44: dang / de'i snying po'i zla ba ni gsung gi rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-3:100b-45: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba la dang
T02D2512-3:100b-46: po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom pa ni thugs
T02D2512-3:100b-47: kyi rdo rje ste byed par gyur pa de dag
T02D2512-3:100b-48: gis sgrub pa po rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du
T02D2512-3:101a-1: yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po yin no //
T02D2512-3:101a-2: 'di'i 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:101a-3: 'di yis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02D2512-3:101a-4: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:101a-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-3:101a-6: po 'di bcings pas sgom par byed cing sgrub pa
T02D2512-3:101a-7: po rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:101a-8: dpa'i rigs kyi dngos grub dang /
T02D2512-3:101a-9: sangs rgyas nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub dang /
T02D2512-3:101a-10: byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje rigs la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub dang /
T02D2512-3:101a-11: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rigs thams cad
T02D2512-3:101a-12: kyi dngos grub dbang du byed pa ni dngos grub
T02D2512-3:101a-13: kun gyi dbang phyug nyid do //
T02D2512-3:101a-14: 'di dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:101a-15: chen po 'dis sgrub pa po la tshe 'di nyid
T02D2512-3:101a-17: thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni chos kyi dbyings te
T02D2512-3:101a-18: de bstan pa ni mi phyed pa'i bsam pa ste
T02D2512-3:101a-19: 'gyur ba med pa'i rgyu las byung ba nyid kyi
T02D2512-3:101a-20: mi phyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dang dril
T02D2512-3:101a-21: bu 'dzin pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-3:101a-22: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang //
T02D2512-3:101a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:101a-24: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad
T02D2512-3:101a-25: kyi dngos grub ni dngos grub kun te de dag
T02D2512-3:101a-26: gi chags pa chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:101a-27: ste dngos grub thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa'i
T02D2512-3:101a-29: bcom ldan 'das ni chags chen po //
T02D2512-3:101a-30: dngos grub kun gyi rjes chags phyir //
T02D2512-3:101a-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02D2512-3:101a-33: ces bya ba 'og nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:101a-35: dngos grub thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i dpal rdo
T02D2512-3:101a-36: rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni dngos grub
T02D2512-3:101a-37: kun gyi chags pa chen po zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:101a-38: chags pa chen po des bde ba ni rdo rje
T02D2512-3:101a-39: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mngon du byed
T02D2512-3:101a-40: pa'o // bde ba las byung ba'i longs spyod rdzogs
T02D2512-3:101a-41: pa'i sku'i rang bzhin can phun sum tshogs pa ni
T02D2512-3:101a-43: de yi dbang phyug chen po ni de las byung
T02D2512-3:101a-44: ba'i sprul pa'i skus skad cig ma re re nyid
T02D2512-3:101b-0: du phyi ma'i mthar @101b thug pa'i bar gyi 'khor
T02D2512-3:101b-1: ba'i sems can 'dul ba la brtson pa'o //
T02D2512-3:101b-2: de la chags pa chen po zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2512-3:101b-3: 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo
T02D2512-3:101b-5: bde ba zhes bya bas k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D2512-3:101b-6: phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya bas rdo rje dran ma'i rang bzhin can no//
T02D2512-3:101b-7: dbang phyug chen po zhes bya bas rdo rje 'dod
T02D2512-3:101b-8: ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin can du bstan to
T02D2512-3:101b-9: // de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi dbang phyug
T02D2512-3:101b-10: chen po'i rnal 'byor pa de nyid phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-3:101b-11: por gyur te phyag rgya chen po gang dag yod
T02D2512-3:101b-12: pa de ni phyag rgya chen po can te /
T02D2512-3:101b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' gzhan lta bu ni rdo rje
T02D2512-3:101b-14: sems dpa' dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhing 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2512-3:101b-15: ro // lha la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-3:101b-16: bya ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2512-3:101b-17: ro // dang / padma dang rdo rje'i rigs kyi
T02D2512-3:101b-18: dngos grub rnams ni lha la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D2512-3:101b-20: de dag thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' la
T02D2512-3:101b-21: sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya las gsungs pa'i bde
T02D2512-3:101b-22: ba gang yin pa'i las thams cad kyi bde ba
T02D2512-3:101b-23: de rnams kyang dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:101b-24: chen po'i mdzes pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rgyus khyad
T02D2512-3:101b-25: par du rab tu 'jug pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D2512-3:101b-26: ro // de las sgrub min yod pa min//
T02D2512-3:101b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:101b-28: de ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po phan yon dang bcas pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:101b-29: da ni lha dgug pa'i phyag rgya bstan par bya
T02D2512-3:101b-30: ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:101b-31: gsungs te / de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa la'o //
T02D2512-3:101b-32: thog ma dang tha ma med pa yang de yin
T02D2512-3:101b-33: la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:101b-34: chen po thams cad kyang de yin pas na thog
T02D2512-3:101b-35: ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:101b-36: la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po thams cad de
T02D2512-3:101b-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad
T02D2512-3:101b-38: do // de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:101b-39: dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:101b-40: chos ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:101b-41: las ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:101b-42: dkyil 'khor thams cad dang dam tshig dang chos dang
T02D2512-3:101b-43: las de dag gi don yod pa ni 'bras bu
T02D2512-3:102a-7: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa thams cad sgrub pa dang /
T02D2512-3:102a-8: sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'chang nyid mchog tu
T02D2512-3:102a-9: sgrub pa thams cad la dam tshig chen po'i phyag
T02D2512-3:102a-10: rgya ste byang chub chen po'i sems ston par byed
T02D2512-3:102a-11: pa'i phyag rgya'o // de ming ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02D2512-3:102a-12: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig
T02D2512-3:102a-13: go zhes bya ba la bde ba chen po'i rdo
T02D2512-3:102a-14: rje ni dang po'i rdo rje ste /
T02D2512-3:102a-15: de'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ni skye bo thams cad la rab tu ma grub pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2512-3:102a-16: de nyid kyi ming gang la yod pa de ni
T02D2512-3:102a-17: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig
T02D2512-3:102a-18: ces bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:102a-19: de bcings pa 'di yin zhes bya ba la de
T02D2512-3:102a-20: bcings pa ni mtshan nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:102a-21: don to // sor mo thams cad yang dag sbyor
T02D2512-3:102a-22: ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi kha sbyor gyi thal
T02D2512-3:102a-23: mo bcings te sor mo dang phan tshun du bcing
T02D2512-3:102a-24: don to // bar bya'o // 'dis cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-3:102a-25: rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-3:102a-26: zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sbyar ba de
T02D2512-3:102a-27: las rdo rje thal mo zhes bya ba bcom ldan
T02D2512-3:102a-28: 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:102a-29: rdo rje thal mo de nyid kyi //
T02D2512-3:102a-30: kun mchog nang du bcings pa yis //
T02D2512-3:102a-31: rdo rje bsdams pa yang dag bshad //
T02D2512-3:102a-33: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa 'di'i nang gi bu ga'o //
T02D2512-3:102a-34: bu ga de gang yin zhe na mdzub mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-3:102a-35: mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis skye gnas byas la /
T02D2512-3:102a-36: g-yas pa'i mthe bong rtse mo skye gnas de la bcug nas btsir bar bya ste /
T02D2512-3:102a-37: 'di ni mda' lnga bsdus pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-3:102a-38: gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po'i mda' lnga bsdus ba ston par byed pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:102a-39: mda' lnga bsdus pa 'di bcings nas sor mo dbus
T02D2512-3:102a-40: ma gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar ba
T02D2512-3:102a-41: byas nas rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du bzhag nas
T02D2512-3:102a-42: / mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo dang /
T02D2512-3:102a-43: mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo zur du sbyar bar
T02D2512-3:102a-44: bya ste dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dang po'i rdo
T02D2512-3:102a-46: dang po'i rdo rje 'di nyid bcings te nang na

T02D2512-3:108a-6: de nas yi ge hr'i:las mdun du sna tshogs pa /
T02D2512-3:108a-7: de'i steng du yi ge h'um aa zhes brjod pas
T02D2512-3:108a-8: dang po'i rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um rnam
T02D2512-3:108a-9: par bsams la / badzra ham zhes bya ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:108a-10: de nas h'um badzra satva ham zhes bya ba brjod
T02D2512-3:108a-11: cing rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid
T02D2512-3:108a-13: rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i las bya
T02D2512-3:108a-14: phyag rgya bzhi pos bcom ldan 'das de nyid bkug
T02D2512-3:108a-15: cing bcug ste bcing la dbang du byas nas /
T02D2512-3:108a-16: dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dri shya zhes bya bas blta bar byas la /
T02D2512-3:108a-17: dril bu dang bcas pa'i gsang ba lcags kyu ma
T02D2512-3:108a-18: dang yi ge h'um gis rang gi lus la bcug
T02D2512-3:108a-19: ste slar yang dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas sa
T02D2512-3:108a-20: ma ya ham zhes bya ba brjod cing 'od kyi
T02D2512-3:108a-22: sa ma ya ham stvam aa ham dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02D2512-3:108a-23: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod cing bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:108a-24: dang lhan cig tu bdag nyid du gyur par bsam
T02D2512-3:108a-25: pa'o // slar yang gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings
T02D2512-3:108a-26: nas aa nu bag ya mi h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:108a-27: lan gsum du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:108a-28: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
T02D2512-3:108a-30: zhes brjod cing yid kyis legs pa'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas thams cad bcug ste /
T02D2512-3:108a-31: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:108a-32: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po
T02D2512-3:108a-33: rnams kyis de dag la rgyas btab nas snga ma
T02D2512-3:108a-34: bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjes bdag nyid kyi gnas
T02D2512-3:108a-36: yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la sangs rgyas
T02D2512-3:108a-37: lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang
T02D2512-3:108a-38: bskur te / rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming
T02D2512-3:108a-39: gi dbang bskur ba blangs la dngos grub kyi rdo
T02D2512-3:108a-40: rje brtul zhugs gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:108a-41: de nas thams cad rjes su chags pa zhes bya
T02D2512-3:108a-42: ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i glu brjod cing rdo
T02D2512-3:108a-43: rje'i gar byas te rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:108a-44: bcings nas de'i snying po brjod cing me tog dbul
T02D2512-3:108a-45: ba'i tshul byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing
T02D2512-3:108a-46: bar bya'o // de nas yi ge h'um brjod cing
T02D2512-3:108b-0: rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi @108b phyag rgya bcings
T02D2512-3:108b-1: nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i snying po brjod cing
T02D2512-3:108b-2: bar bya'o // / rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:108b-3: de nas de bzhin du gar las byung ba'i dga' ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-3:108b-4: de'i snying pos spos 'bul ba'i tshul byas la snga
T02D2512-3:108b-5: ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag
T02D2512-3:108b-7: de nas de bzhin du k'i li k'i la'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:108b-8: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la slar yang de
T02D2512-3:108b-9: bzhin du gar byas la spyan gyi las kyi phyag
T02D2512-3:108b-11: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-3:108b-12: de nas rdo rje dran ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:108b-13: slar yang de bzhin du gar byas la dpal chen mo'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:108b-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-3:108b-15: de nas rdo rje chags pa'i dbang phyug ma'i las
T02D2512-3:108b-16: kyi phyag rgya de bzhin du bcing bar bya'o 'di
T02D2512-3:108b-17: ni gsang pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D2512-3:108b-18: de nas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la sgeg
T02D2512-3:108b-19: mo dang dga' ba'i rdo rje mas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:108b-20: la phyag byas la de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2512-3:108b-21: chos dang las dang dam tshig rnams blangs te /
T02D2512-3:108b-22: dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa byas nas /
T02D2512-3:108b-23: rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i rdo rje la yi ge h'um rnam par bsams te /
T02D2512-3:108b-24: de bzhin du bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar gyur
T02D2512-3:108b-25: cig / smon lam byas la aa nu ra ga
T02D2512-3:108b-26: ya mi zhes bya ba bzlas pa'i don du yi
T02D2512-3:108b-27: ge h'um gi glu'i bzlas pa bya ba yin no
T02D2512-3:108b-28: // de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa byas
T02D2512-3:108b-29: nas da ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs
T02D2512-3:108b-30: pa'i sgrub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas
T02D2512-3:108b-31: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:108b-32: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-3:108b-33: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i sku'i gsang
T02D2512-3:108b-34: ba byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-3:108b-35: po ste de dag gi sku'i gsang ba'i tshul gyis
T02D2512-3:108b-37: sku zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:108b-38: 'di dag gi sgrub pa thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:108b-39: khyad par ni 'di yin te 'dod chags rdo rje
T02D2512-3:108b-40: ma la sogs pa'i snying po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:108b-41: dang bcas pa'i dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par bsams
T02D2512-3:108b-42: la rnal 'byor gyi rdo rje de nyid de rnams
T02D2512-3:108b-43: kyi snying po las rang gi phyag mtshan rnam par
T02D2512-3:109a-1: gyi nga rgyal bskyed la phyag mtshan de nyid sems
T02D2512-3:109a-2: dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:109a-3: dpa' ste / rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'dod chags
T02D2512-3:109a-4: rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i snying po brjod cing
T02D2512-3:109a-5: bdag nyid 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:109a-6: rang bzhin du mos par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:109a-7: de nas chog thams cad rjes su spyad nas 'dod
T02D2512-3:109a-8: chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-3:109a-9: po bcings la / ji lta ba bzhin du 'dod
T02D2512-3:109a-10: chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i sku mdun du
T02D2512-3:109a-11: po bcings la / bskyed la / rdo rje lcags
T02D2512-3:109a-12: kyu ma la sogs pas 'dod chags rdo rje ma
T02D2512-3:109a-13: la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams bkug cing bcug la
T02D2512-3:109a-14: bcings te dbang du byas nas /
T02D2512-3:109a-15: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams blta bar byas la /
T02D2512-3:109a-16: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i snying po
T02D2512-3:109a-17: dang gsang ba'i lcags kyu mas rang gi lus la
T02D2512-3:109a-18: bcug la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par
T02D2512-3:109a-19: bya'o // de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid dang sgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:109a-20: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan
T02D2512-3:109a-21: nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya
T02D2512-3:109a-22: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:109a-23: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-3:109a-24: dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D2512-3:109a-25: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bshad pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-3:109a-26: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang po'i rdo rje ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ste /
T02D2512-3:109a-27: de nyid kyi dam tshig 'dzin pa gang yin pa de bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:109a-28: rdo rje mda' la sogs pa ni 'di las byung ba'o //
T02D2512-3:109a-29: bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' 'di las
T02D2512-3:109a-30: 'dod chags rdo rje sems dpa' ma la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:109a-31: bzhi po dam tshig 'dzin ba'i phyag rgya rnams 'byung
T02D2512-3:109a-32: ngo // 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02D2512-3:109a-33: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar
T02D2512-3:109a-34: bar byas nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo ci
T02D2512-3:109a-35: nus par mda'i tshul du phyi rol du drang bar
T02D2512-3:109a-36: bya ste 'di ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rdo
T02D2512-3:109a-37: rje mda' zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:109a-38: yin no // dang po'i rdo rje bcings la rdo
T02D2512-3:109a-39: rje bsdams pa'i tshul gyis mthe bong gnyis gzung bar
T02D2512-3:109a-40: bya ste 'di ni k'i li k'i la ma'o //
T02D2512-3:109a-41: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te mthe bong gnyis bslang
T02D2512-3:109a-42: ste ma 'byor bar byas la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo
T02D2512-3:109b-0: lcags kyu'i rnam pa g-yon pa'i dbus ma'i @109b tshigs
T02D2512-3:109b-1: gsum par btsugs la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo de bzhin
T02D2512-3:109b-2: du g-yas pa'i dbus ma'i tshigs gsum par btsugs te
T02D2512-3:109b-3: srin lag gnyis yang dag par sbyar ba'i rtse mo
T02D2512-3:109b-4: dang / mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar nas
T02D2512-3:109b-5: rtse mo 'dis byas pa 'di ni rdo rje dran
T02D2512-3:109b-6: dang / ma'o // dang po'i rdo rje bcings la
T02D2512-3:109b-7: brla g-yas pa dang g-yon pa la gzung bar bya
T02D2512-3:109b-8: ste 'di ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i
T02D2512-3:109b-10: rdo rje thal mo bskor ba rang gi snying ga'i
T02D2512-3:109b-11: phyogs su bcings la lhag par dad pa'i khyad par
T02D2512-3:109b-12: gyis sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis bltas zhing
T02D2512-3:109b-13: spyi bos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas spyi
T02D2512-3:109b-14: bor gzung bar bya ste de nas de las phab
T02D2512-3:109b-15: nas me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis gyen du gtor
T02D2512-3:109b-16: bar bya ste 'di ni rab tu dga' ba ma'i'o
T02D2512-3:109b-17: // de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo bskor ba
T02D2512-3:109b-18: bcings la spyi bor bzhag nas phab ste spos 'bul
T02D2512-3:109b-19: ba'i tshul gyis 'og tu dor bar byas te 'di
T02D2512-3:109b-20: // ni dga' ma'i'o // de bzhin du rdo rje
T02D2512-3:109b-21: thal mos skor ba bcings la spyi bor bzhag nas
T02D2512-3:109b-22: phab ste mar me 'bul ba'i tshul du mthe bong
T02D2512-3:109b-23: sbyar ba bskor nas gzung bar bya ste spyan gyi'o
T02D2512-3:109b-24: // ni dga' ma'i'o // // de bzhin du thams
T02D2512-3:109b-25: cad byas la rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag
T02D2512-3:109b-26: nas phab ste rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang
T02D2512-3:109b-27: ste dri byug pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste
T02D2512-3:109b-29: rdo rje thal mo bcings te des lhag par dad
T02D2512-3:109b-30: pa'i khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul bstan par
T02D2512-3:109b-32: rdo rje thal mo bcings te dgod pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2512-3:109b-33: khar yongs su bskor la spyi bor gzung bar bya
T02D2512-3:109b-35: rdo rje thal mo bcings te g-yon pa'i mdzub mo
T02D2512-3:109b-36: pi wang gi tshul du gzung bar byas la g-yas
T02D2512-3:109b-37: pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas rdo rje pi wang brdung
T02D2512-3:109b-38: ba'i rdo rje glu ma'i snying po'i glus mngon par
T02D2512-3:109b-39: bstod cing rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya bcing bar bya
T02D2512-3:109b-40: ste 'di ni rdo rje glu ma'i'o //
T02D2512-3:109b-41: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis gar byas la spyi
T02D2512-3:109b-42: bor rdo rje thal mo bcing bar byas te 'di
T02D2512-3:109b-44: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la bcings pa
T02D2512-3:109b-45: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ste bkug la lcags kyu'u
T02D2512-3:109b-46: rnam par gzung bar bya ste 'di ni rdo rje
T02D2512-3:109b-47: lcags kyu ma'i'o // rdo rje bsnams pa nang du
T02D2512-3:110a-0: bcings la mthe bong gnyis phan tshun du @110a *
T02D2512-3:110a-1: lcags kyu ma'i'o // // mdud pa byas la 'di ni rdo rje zhags ba mi'o //
T02D2512-3:110a-2: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la mdzub mo
T02D2512-3:110a-3: dang mthe bong dag gis lcags kyi lu gu rgyud
T02D2512-3:110a-4: bcing bar bya ste 'di ni rdo rje lcags sprog
T02D2512-3:110a-5: ma'i'o // rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02D2512-3:110a-6: rang gi mthe'u chud dang srin lag gi nang du mthe bong gnyis gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2512-3:110a-7: 'di ni rdo rje dril bu ma'i'o //
T02D2512-3:110a-8: gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:110a-9: gzhan rnams thams cad ji bzhin bshad //
T02D2512-3:110a-10: ces bya ba la shin tu dga' ma la sogs
T02D2512-3:110a-11: pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya rnams kho na rab tu
T02D2512-3:110a-12: dga' ma la sogs pa rdo rje dril bu ma'i
T02D2512-3:110a-13: mthar thug pa'i bar gyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi
T02D2512-3:110a-14: phyag rgya rnams rab tu sbyor ba'i khyad par gyis
T02D2512-3:110a-16: de la sbyor ba'i khyad par ni 'di yin te
T02D2512-3:110a-17: gang zhig nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i rang
T02D2512-3:110a-18: gi lha'i snying po bzlas pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-3:110a-20: aa nu ra ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:110a-21: nas ji srid du aa nu ra ga ya mi
T02D2512-3:110a-22: badzra ghandhe ho:/ zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rang gi
T02D2512-3:110a-23: lha'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2512-3:110a-24: nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pas rang gi lha'i
T02D2512-3:110a-26: dam tshig rdo rje 'bebs pa la //
T02D2512-3:110a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje dril
T02D2512-3:110a-28: bu ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni dam tshig
T02D2512-3:110a-29: rdor je 'babs pa ste de bcings nas mdzub mo
T02D2512-3:110a-30: gnyis kyi rtse mo rang gi mthe bong gnyis kyi
T02D2512-3:110a-31: steng du yang dag par sbyar zhing gzung bar bya
T02D2512-3:110a-32: ba 'di ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:110a-33: ste rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur
T02D2512-3:110a-34: pa yin no // de nas kyi ska ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02D2512-3:110a-35: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2512-3:110a-36: gyi rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2512-3:110a-37: / de ma thag pa nyid du gnyis su byas
T02D2512-3:110a-38: te phyag mtshan med pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
T02D2512-3:110a-39: kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas
T02D2512-3:110a-40: rdo rje dril bu ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi
T02D2512-3:110a-41: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:110a-42: rnams bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2512-3:110a-43: / de dag ji ltar bcing bar bya zhe na
T02D2512-3:110a-44: / / 'di lta ste zhes bya ba sogs pa la /
T02D2512-3:110a-45: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsnyems par byas
T02D2512-3:110a-46: nas g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bskor ba byas
T02D2512-3:110a-47: la rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su bstod pa'i tshul
T02D2512-3:110b-0: 'di ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma zhes bya ba 'dod chags rdo rje @110b ma'i'o //
T02D2512-3:110b-1: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi rdo rje gnyis te nges bstod pa'i tshul ni gyen du bstod pa'o //
T02D2512-3:110b-2: de bstod par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje gnyi bstod pa'i tshul can te /
T02D2512-3:110b-3: rdo rje k'i li k'i la zhes bya ba rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:110b-4: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te rang gi snying gar
T02D2512-3:110b-5: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:110b-6: la 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis 'khyud de bstod pa la
T02D2512-3:110b-7: sogs pa rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gzung bar bya'o
T02D2512-3:110b-8: zhes bya ba'o // rdo rje khu tshug gnyis kyis
T02D2512-3:110b-9: rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du bya ste rdo rje

T02D2512-3:110b-11: tshur gnyis kyis bsnyems pa gnyis bya ste rdo rje
T02D2512-3:110b-13: mtshams rnams su rdo rje gar bshad pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-3:110b-14: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi bzhi po la
T02D2512-3:110b-15: rab tu dga' ma la sogs pa'i rdo rje gar
T02D2512-3:110b-16: las byung ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya nyid ni las
T02D2512-3:110b-17: kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2512-3:110b-19: bya ba la sgeg mo dang bzhad ma dang glu
T02D2512-3:110b-20: len ma dang gar ma rnams kyi gar las byung

T02D2512-3:143b-31: bya ba'i phyir / snying po'i ngag ces bya ba
T02D2512-3:143b-32: la sogs pa gsungs te rang gi lha'i bzla bar
T02D2512-3:143b-33: bya ba'i snying po ni snying po'i ngag go /
T02D2512-3:143b-34: snying po'i ngag rang gi lha'i snying po de glu'i
T02D2512-3:143b-35: bstan bcos las bshad pa'i grong khyer ba'i chags pa'i
T02D2512-3:143b-37: aom sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi
T02D2512-3:143b-38: shi nyts'a mi bhur bhu wa sva: zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:143b-39: la sogs pa'i bzlas pa bya zhing phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-3:143b-40: po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rin po che kye
T02D2512-3:143b-41: bdag la stsol cig / ces bya ba'i tshig gis
T02D2512-3:143b-42: rnal 'byor pas gsol ba gdab cing phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-3:143b-43: po la sogs pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes
T02D2512-3:143b-44: bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D2512-3:143b-45: las la sbyor ba ni de bzhin du'o zhes bya
T02D2512-3:143b-46: ba mdor bstan pa'i tshig rnams kyi las kyi phyag
T02D2512-3:144a-0: rgya sgrub pa la nges par @144a * //
T02D2512-3:144a-1: sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa de
T02D2512-3:144a-2: bzhin du 'dir yang shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:144a-3: don to // 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te las
T02D2512-3:144a-4: kyi phyag rgya thams cad ye ge tr'am brjod cing
T02D2512-3:144a-5: bcings nas las la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:144a-6: da ni las brgya grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:144a-7: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-3:144a-8: de ma grub na zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:144a-9: gsungs te de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin
T02D2512-3:144a-10: no // nam mkha'i snying po ma grub na ji
T02D2512-3:144a-11: lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi
T02D2512-3:144a-12: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:144a-13: mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag nas dbang bskur ba ni
T02D2512-3:144a-14: nam mkha'i snying po la 'byor ba thams cad dgug
T02D2512-3:144a-15: pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis gsol ba gdab pa
T02D2512-3:144a-16: ni sgrub pa po bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:144a-17: chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi tshogs ni rgyun
T02D2512-3:144a-18: te sngar bshad pa bzhin du tshig gi bsgo bas
T02D2512-3:144a-19: shes par bya'o // 'di'i bshad pa yang sngar bshad
T02D2512-3:144a-20: pa ste khyad par med pas slar yang ma bshad
T02D2512-3:144a-21: shes par bya'o // do // don yod ces bya ba la sogs pa bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:144a-22: ngag gi phyag rgya ni snying po'i bzlas pa ste /
T02D2512-3:144a-23: nges tshig bsgrub pa ni 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir yid kyis tshig bsgo ba ste /
T02D2512-3:144a-24: de nas mkha' ni nam mkha'i snying po las 'byor
T02D2512-3:144a-25: ba thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa yang dag
T02D2512-3:144a-26: par 'byung ba ste skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:144a-27: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab
T02D2512-3:144a-28: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya
T02D2512-3:144a-29: ba 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'i rgyud
T02D2512-3:144a-32: // / de ltar rigs lnga'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:144a-33: da ni phyi'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:144a-34: phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2512-3:144a-35: te de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no
T02D2512-3:144a-36: // rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin can gyi rigs lnga ni nang ste /
T02D2512-3:144a-37: de rnams kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu ni nang gi'o //
T02D2512-3:144a-38: de'i phyi rol pa ni ming po gsum la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'o //
T02D2512-3:144a-39: de'i phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2512-3:144a-40: de ston par byed pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-3:144a-41: phyag rgya chen po ni g-yon par kham phor dang /
T02D2512-3:144a-42: g-yas na mda' stod pa'o zhes bya ba la lag
T02D2512-3:144a-43: pa g-yon pas kham phor 'dzin cing lag pa g-yas
T02D2512-3:144b-1: 'di nyid gar gyi tshul gyis de rnams las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:144b-2: dam tshig ni 'jug pa la'o zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-3:144b-3: sogs pa la mthe'u chung mthe bong dag gis lu
T02D2512-3:144b-4: gu rgyud du bcings la sor mo lhag ma rnams
T02D2512-3:144b-5: kyis rtse gsum pa'i rnam pa byas te /
T02D2512-3:144b-6: 'di ni de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:144b-7: ji lta ba bzhin du bzung bas lha mo rnams
T02D2512-3:144b-8: kyi'o zhes bya ba la bri ba'i cho gas ji
T02D2512-3:144b-9: lta ba bzhin du dga' ma la sogs pa'i sku'i
T02D2512-3:144b-10: gsang ba bshad pa de bzhin du phyag rgya bcing
T02D2512-3:144b-12: lag pa g-yon pas gzhu bzung la /
T02D2512-3:144b-13: lag pa g-yas pas mda' stod pa ni dga' ma'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:144b-14: lag pa g-yon pas kha tv'am ga bzung la g-yas pas ral gri'i so ni srin mo'i'o //
T02D2512-3:144b-15: lag pa la gter gyi bum pas ni phag mo'i'o //
T02D2512-3:144b-16: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bsnyems pa byas nas lag
T02D2512-3:144b-17: pa g-yas pas chu gri 'dzin pa ni grub pa
T02D2512-3:144b-19: dbus ma dang mthe'u chung zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-3:144b-20: pa la rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas dbus ma
T02D2512-3:144b-21: dang srin lag gi sor mo bzhi la mdzub mo
T02D2512-3:144b-22: dang mthe'u chung rnams kyi rtse mo bzhi sbyar bar
T02D2512-3:144b-25: rdo rje bsdams pa phyir bcings nas mdzub mo dang
T02D2512-3:144b-26: dbus ma dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi sor
T02D2512-3:144b-27: mo rnams bsgreng bar byas la /
T02D2512-3:144b-28: g-yas pa'i dbus ma g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mo dang sbyar la /
T02D2512-3:144b-29: g-yon pa'i dbus ma'i rtse mo g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i
T02D2512-3:144b-30: rtse mo dang yang dag par sbyar zhing g-yas pa'i
T02D2512-3:144b-31: srin lag gi rtse mo g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi
T02D2512-3:144b-32: rtse mo dang yang dag par sbyar te /
T02D2512-3:144b-33: g-yon pa'i srin lag gi rtse mo g-yas pa'i mthe'u
T02D2512-3:144b-34: chung gi rtse mo dang yang dag par sbyar ba
T02D2512-3:144b-35: byas nas gzung bar bya ste 'di ni srin mo
T02D2512-3:144b-36: rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:144b-37: dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:144b-38: klu'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bshad par bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:144b-39: phyir gdengs ka can gyi dbang po rnams kyi'o zhes
T02D2512-3:144b-40: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:144b-41: de la phyag rgya chen po ni bri ba'i phyag rgyar bstan pa'o //
T02D2512-3:145a-0: lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gnyis phan tshun @145a * //
T02D2512-3:145a-1: mdud pa byas nas mthe bong dang sor mo'i gdengs
T02D2512-3:145a-2: ka bsgreng ba'i rang bzhin can gyi lto 'phye chen
T02D2512-3:145a-3: po'i lag pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-3:145a-4: klu thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i phyag rgya sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-3:145a-5: 'gugs pa'i sngags kyis de nyid gnyis su byas na lto 'phye'i lag pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2512-3:145a-6: lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa gnyis su byas nas
T02D2512-3:145a-7: lag pa gcig gi sor mo lnga'i gdengs ka bsgreng
T02D2512-3:145a-8: ba'i rang bzhin can gyis gdengs ka'i lag pa zhes
T02D2512-3:145a-9: bya ba klu rnams kyi dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag
T02D2512-3:145a-10: rgya'o // dbus ma srin lag ces bya ba la
T02D2512-3:145a-11: sogs pa la dbus ma dang srin lag gi sor
T02D2512-3:145a-12: mo bzhi pos rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings
T02D2512-3:145a-13: la mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par
T02D2512-3:145a-14: sbyar nas mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag gis dga'
T02D2512-3:145a-15: bar sbyor ba'i tshul du byas te 'dis ni dug
T02D2512-3:145a-17: lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis
T02D2512-3:145a-18: dug bkug la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo mthe
T02D2512-3:145a-19: bo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang yang dag par sbyar
T02D2512-3:145a-20: la gzung bar bya ste 'dis dug thams cad 'chi
T02D2512-3:145a-21: ba'o // 'di gnyis kyi rtse mos dug gzhom par
T02D2512-3:145a-22: byas te de ltar na dug thams cad 'jig pa'o
T02D2512-3:145a-23: ba'o // // 'di nyid kyis dug thams cad za ba dang /
T02D2512-3:145a-25: dug med par byed pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:145a-26: gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis
T02D2512-3:145a-27: gzung ba'i rdo rje khros nas myur du gzhig par
T02D2512-3:145a-28: bya'o zhes bya ba la rdo rje nyi ma me
T02D2512-3:145a-29: ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor byas la g-yas pa'i rdo
T02D2512-3:145a-30: rje khu tshur gyis khro bo'i rdo re blangs te
T02D2512-3:145a-31: / khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sdigs mdzub la brtson
T02D2512-3:145a-32: pas khro zhing ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i
T02D2512-3:145a-33: glu brjod cing myur du rkang pas mnye bar bya'o
T02D2512-3:145a-34: / // dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa
T02D2512-3:145a-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba
T02D2512-3:145a-36: zhes bya ba las phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i
T02D2512-3:145a-37: rgyud kyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-3:145a-39: // / de ltar phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:145a-40: da ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i rgyud
T02D2512-3:145a-41: bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:145a-43: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-3:145a-44: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:145a-45: thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa zhes bya
T02D2512-3:145b-0: ba la byang chub @145b chen po'i rang bzhin can
T02D2512-3:145b-1: gyis thams cad kyi mchog go //
T02D2512-3:145b-2: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gzhan dbang du ma gyur pa'i phyir dbang phyug go //
T02D2512-3:145b-3: dam pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:145b-4: thams cad kyi mchog kyang de nyid yin la dbang
T02D2512-3:145b-5: phyug kyang de nyid yin te dam pa yang de
T02D2512-3:145b-6: nyid yin pas na thams cad kyi mchog gi dbang
T02D2512-3:145b-7: phyug dam pa'o // bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi
T02D2512-3:145b-8: dbang phyug dam pa de'i phyag rgya 'di yin no
T02D2512-3:145b-9: zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:145b-10: de yang sku yi khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02D2512-3:145b-11: nam mkha' thams cad khyab par byed cing rigs can
T02D2512-3:145b-12: gyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs sna tshogs pa'i sku gang
T02D2512-3:145b-13: la mnga' ba de ni sna tshogs pa'i sku chen
T02D2512-3:145b-14: pos te bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rigs thams cad
T02D2512-3:145b-15: kyi lta sku'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i rdo je 'chang chen
T02D2512-3:145b-16: po'o // sna tshogs pa'i sku chen po de nyid
T02D2512-3:145b-17: yi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya bcing ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2512-3:145b-18: kyi skabs su bab pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:145b-19: de la phyag rgya chen po bcing ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2512-3:145b-20: ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ba'i cho gar bstan
T02D2512-3:145b-21: pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams
T02D2512-3:145b-23: rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni //
T02D2512-3:145b-24: zhes pa la rdo rje thal mo bcings nas ba
T02D2512-3:145b-25: dan gsum ni yongs su gzung ba zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:145b-26: la / rdo rje thal mo ma bkrol bar lag pa gnyis kyis ba dan gsum bya'o //
T02D2512-3:145b-28: rdo rje thal mo bcings nas srin lag gnyis nang
T02D2512-3:145b-29: du bcug la mthe bong gnyis so sor phye la
T02D2512-3:145b-30: mdzub mo gnyis kyi ngos la yang dag par sbyar
T02D2512-3:145b-31: bar gzung bar bya ste 'di ni khyab 'jug gi
T02D2512-3:145b-32: gzugs 'dzin pa'i rnam bar snad mdzad dang /
T02D2512-3:145b-33: rdo rje dpal gyi lha mo'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-3:145b-34: rgya rdo rje khyab 'jug ma zhes bya ba yin
T02D2512-3:145b-35: no // 'di la sbyor ba dang bcas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:145b-36: dor na thams cad gcod byed pa //
T02D2512-3:145b-37: zhes bya ba gsungs te 'di bcings nas bdud la
T02D2512-3:145b-38: sogs pa thams cad kyi steng du dor bar byas
T02D2512-3:145b-39: na bdud la sogs pa thams cad gcod par byed
T02D2512-3:145b-40: pa yin no // rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:145b-41: mthe'u chung mthe bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:145b-42: la lag pa g-yon pa'i 'og tu kha blta bar
T02D2512-3:145b-43: byas la de'i steng du kha blta ba bzhag nas
T02D2512-3:146a-1: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung dang g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang /
T02D2512-3:146a-2: g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung dag gis lu gu rgyud du bcings te /
T02D2512-3:146a-3: dbus ma gsum pa dag gi rtse mo gsum pa
T02D2512-3:146a-4: byas te 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes bya
T02D2512-3:146a-5: ba gtum pa'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pa dang
T02D2512-3:146a-6: rdo rje dkar mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:146a-7: rdo rje padma kha sbyar ni //
T02D2512-3:146a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2512-3:146a-9: rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang
T02D2512-3:146a-10: phyug gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje padmas te /
T02D2512-3:146a-11: de bcings nas gang dang gang gi yul du gnas
T02D2512-3:146a-12: pa de dang de'i spyod lam gyis tshangs pa'i gzugs
T02D2512-3:146a-13: 'dzin pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug dang
T02D2512-3:146a-14: padma'i sgrol ma bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2512-3:146a-15: 'di ni tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2512-3:146a-16: padma'i sgrol ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:146a-17: rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni //
T02D2512-3:146a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje thal mo
T02D2512-3:146a-19: bcings nas mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag
T02D2512-3:146a-20: par sbyar la de'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis rtse
T02D2512-3:146a-21: mo bkug pa'i rin po che gzung bar bya ste
T02D2512-3:146a-23: nam mkha'i snying po dang nam mkha'i rdo rje ma ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:146a-24: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D2512-3:146a-25: ni sngar bshad pa kho nas dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-3:146a-27: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:146a-28: da ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi tshogs
T02D2512-3:146a-29: kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud de nas zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-3:146a-31: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-3:146a-32: kye zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bod pa'o //
T02D2512-3:146a-33: thams cad kyi mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa ni
T02D2512-3:146a-34: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dpal rdo rje
T02D2512-3:146a-35: sems dpa' sna tshogs kyi sku ste /
T02D2512-3:146a-36: de'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te
T02D2512-3:146a-37: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2512-3:146a-38: la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dag nye bar dgod
T02D2512-3:146a-39: pa la'o // dang po ni thog ma nyid du'o //
T02D2512-3:146a-40: re zhig gi sgra ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
T02D2512-3:146a-41: dang po'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya ni dang po'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-3:146a-42: de rab tu grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-3:146a-43: po rnams kyi stong 'gyur du 'gyur ba yin no
T02D2512-3:146b-0: // ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig gi @146b
T02D2512-3:146b-1: phyag mtshan rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:146b-2: la dang po'i rdo rje dang rdo rje khyab 'jug
T02D2512-3:146b-3: ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rdo rje padma'i
T02D2512-3:146b-4: ming can dang rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig
T02D2512-3:146b-5: gi phyag rgya dang rdo rje myu gu'i ming can
T02D2512-3:146b-6: gyi ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dam tshig
T02D2512-3:146b-8: ji lta ba bzhin gyi dam tshig gi phyag mtshan
T02D2512-3:146b-9: de rnams kyi lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i
T02D2512-3:146b-10: bya bar gyur pa de dag gi rdo rje chen
T02D2512-3:146b-11: po rab tu sbyor ba ni rjes su chags pa
T02D2512-3:146b-12: la sogs pa bsgom pa ste des nges par sbyor
T02D2512-3:146b-14: de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs

T02D2512-3:156b-5: tshig gi phyag rgyas de nyid kyi snying po brjod

T02D2512-3:157a-29: brtan pa zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'o //

T02D2512-3:158b-39: kyi las kyi tshogs sgrub pa yin no //

T02D2512-3:159b-3: tu sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:159b-4: bstan to // snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa rnams bshad zin to //

T02D2512-3:159b-7: can rmad du byung ba ni ngo mtshar bar byed
T02D2512-3:159b-8: pa'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2512-3:159b-9: dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas //
T02D2512-3:159b-10: ma grub rnams kyang grub bar 'gyur //
T02D2512-3:159b-11: byed par gyur pa de rnams yin pas rgyu de'i
T02D2512-3:159b-12: phyir sngar bshad pa'i sgrub pas bsgrub pa gang grub

T02D2512-3:159b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D2512-3:159b-26: ba'i snying pos rab tu bsgrubs kyang grub par ma

T02D2512-3:159b-29: 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rang rig pa'i tshul gyi
T02D2512-3:159b-30: rang gi gsang ba'i btsun mo ste /
T02D2512-3:159b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dod chags rdo rje ma
T02D2512-3:159b-32: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi chags pa thams
T02D2512-3:159b-34: dga' bar byed pas na chags pa thams cad kyis rab tu dga' bar byed pa'o //
T02D2512-3:159b-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba gang yin pa des sgrub pa po grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:159b-36: de nyid chen po zhes bya ba ni 'jum pa'i
T02D2512-3:159b-37: phyag rgya'i rang bzhin can gyi de kho na nyid
T02D2512-3:159b-38: chen po 'di grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:159b-40: mchog gi de nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa' //
T02D2512-3:159b-41: skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin pas gsang ba'o //
T02D2512-3:159b-42: mchog tu bsod nams mi ldan pa'i //
T02D2512-3:159b-43: so so skye bo la brjod min //
T02D2512-3:159b-44: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:160a-1: gyis brlab pa ni rang la byin gyis brlab pa
T02D2512-3:160a-2: ste rang gi yid bde ba'i nus pa gang yin
T02D2512-3:160a-3: pa des rnal 'byor pa grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:160a-4: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na dga' ba'o //
T02D2512-3:160a-5: mchog tu gsang ba'i phyi ma las kyang /
T02D2512-3:160a-6: dam pa dpal rang gi dam tshig ces bya ba
T02D2512-3:160a-7: ni gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na
T02D2512-3:160a-8: bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:160a-9: de'i bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya'o //

T02D2512-3:160a-13: pa na la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams bstan par
T02D2512-3:160a-14: bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-3:160a-15: pa gsungs te / de nas de'i phyir zhes bya ba bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:160a-16: mchog dang po ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:160a-17: dpa'i mchog dang po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya
T02D2512-3:160a-18: ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rjes su bstan par bya'o zhes
T02D2512-3:160a-20: mchog tu mkhas shing phral rgya che ba dang bsam
T02D2512-3:160a-21: gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin
T02D2512-3:160a-22: to // shin tu mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D2512-3:160a-23: lhag ma ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-3:160a-24: de la chos kyi bzhin du thams cad 'gro ba'i phyir shin tu mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D2512-3:160a-25: mthar thug pa med pa dang /
T02D2512-3:160a-26: tshad med cing gzhal du med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:160a-27: bla ma las kyang bla mar gyur pas na bla na med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:160a-28: don yod cing thogs pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:160a-29: mchog dang po yin la snying po yang de nyid
T02D2512-3:160a-30: yin pas na mchog gi snying po ste snying po
T02D2512-3:160a-32: tsum pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i rang bzhin ni snying por brjod pa yin no //

T02D2512-3:160b-4: cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na thams cad kyi

T02D2512-3:160b-7: na thams cad kyi mchog go //

T02D2512-3:160b-10: kyi rgyal srid de de nyid kyi bdag po nyid

T02D2512-3:160b-12: dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs ni dngos
T02D2512-3:160b-13: grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs te stong chig
T02D2512-3:160b-14: brgya'i grangs kyis yongs su bcad pa dam thag tu
T02D2512-3:160b-15: 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i
T02D2512-3:160b-16: thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen
T02D2512-3:160b-17: po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa dang /

T02D2512-3:160b-21: de nyid yin pas na dam pa bla na med

T02D2512-3:160b-35: kyis tsum pa na dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa

T02D2512-3:161a-0: @161a * // de'i dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni de skyed par byed pa'i rgyu shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
T02D2512-3:161a-1: de'i ming can gyi phyag rgya'i dga' ba'i dam tshig gi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-3:161a-2: de nyid rgyud 'dir thams cad rnal 'byor zhes bya bar brjod pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:161a-3: de dag dang gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:161a-4: de ltar reg bya'i phyag rgya bstan nas da ni
T02D2512-3:161a-5: 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i lta ba'i phyag rgya bstan
T02D2512-3:161a-6: par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas
T02D2512-3:161a-7: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te sgeg
T02D2512-3:161a-8: pa'i nyams kyis rnam par 'phrul pa ni rnam par
T02D2512-3:161a-9: 'phrul pa'o // rnam par 'phrul pa de dang bcas
T02D2512-3:161a-10: pa'i 'dzum pas ni rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas
T02D2512-3:161a-11: 'phrul pa'o // pa'i 'dzum pa'o // de dang lhan
T02D2512-3:161a-12: cig tu g-yo ba'i mig zur gyis blta zhing lha'i
T02D2512-3:161a-13: phyag rgya gang la yod pa de ni rnam par
T02D2512-3:161a-14: 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing g-yo ba'i mig
T02D2512-3:161a-15: zur gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-3:161a-16: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:161a-17: 'dzum zhing cung zad phye ba'i mig gis lta ba ni k'i li k'i la'i ste /

T02D2512-3:161a-19: pa rnams btung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs

T02D2512-3:161a-23: phyir bsnyems pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-3:161a-25: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal mngon du bya ba ni 'dir bsnyems ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:161a-26: bsnyems pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bstod
T02D2512-3:161a-27: pa ni gyen du bstod nas dgod pa'i g-yo ba'i
T02D2512-3:161a-28: mig gis lta ba'i phyag rgya gang la yod pa
T02D2512-3:161a-29: de ni bsnyems pa dang bcas pas bstod cing bzhad
T02D2512-3:161a-31: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:161a-32: da ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i lta ba'i phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

T02D2512-3:161a-34: dang g-yo zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa'o zhes
T02D2512-3:161a-36: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba dang 'dzum pa
T02D2512-3:161a-37: dang g-yo ba ni sgeg pa'i lta ba dang 'dzum
T02D2512-3:161a-38: pa dang g-yo ba rnams so //
T02D2512-3:161a-39: de dang bcas pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i lta ba'i phyag
T02D2512-3:161a-40: rgya gang la yod pa de ni sgeg pa'i lta
T02D2512-3:161a-41: ba dang g-yo ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan
T02D2512-3:161b-0: pa'o // bcom @161b ldan 'das kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:161b-1: rnam par 'phrul pa dang sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D2512-3:161b-2: 'dzum pa'i zhal zhes bya ba la sgeg pa'i rnam
T02D2512-3:161b-3: par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i mdzes pa nyid ni
T02D2512-3:161b-5: rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgeg pa dang lhan cig tu
T02D2512-3:161b-6: zhal 'jum pa'i lta ba'i phyag rgya gang la yod
T02D2512-3:161b-7: pa de la de skad ces bya'o //

T02D2512-3:161b-10: 'di zhes bya ba la rdo rje 'dzum pa'i phyag
T02D2512-3:161b-11: rgya 'dis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi
T02D2512-3:161b-12: slob dpon de sgrub pa pos mchod pa'i glu ste
T02D2512-3:161b-13: / yi ge h'um gi glus thams cad kyi mchog
T02D2512-3:161b-14: gi dngos grub chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos
T02D2512-3:161b-15: grub gang yin pa des dbang phyug chen po ni
T02D2512-3:161b-16: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-3:161b-17: de'i bdag po ni gtso bo grub par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-3:161b-18: sgrub pa po rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-3:161b-19: 'dis kyang bdag nyid la rgyas btab pa tsam gyis
T02D2512-3:161b-20: ma grub na yang yid kyis 'dod pa'i las thams
T02D2512-3:161b-21: cad kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa yin no //

T02D2512-3:161b-23: sarba ku ru ya tha su kham zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:161b-24: brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la rang bzhin gyis

T02D2512-3:176a-3: pas kyang grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rab
