T02D2512-3:176a-5: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum
T02D2512-3:176a-6: zhes bya ba gsungs te 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
T02D2512-3:176a-7: pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum ni nga
T02D2512-3:176a-8: yin no zhes bdag nyid ston par mdzad pa yin
T02D2512-3:176a-9: no // ci'i phyir khyed dus gsum yin zhen mtha'
T02D2512-3:176a-10: yas phyir zhes bya ba la 'das pa dang ma
T02D2512-3:176a-11: 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams kyi
T02D2512-3:176a-12: de bzhin nyid ni mtha' yas pa nyid do //
T02D2512-3:176a-13: gang gi phyir de'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D2512-3:176a-14: po bdag yin pa ste mtha' yas pa'i rgyu de
T02D2512-3:176a-15: nyid kyi phyir da ni dus gsum yin no //
T02D2512-3:176a-16: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung
T02D2512-3:176a-17: ba'i chos nyid kyis bdag dus gsum gyi dngos po
T02D2512-3:176a-18: yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-3:176a-19: nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir //
T02D2512-3:176a-20: zhes bya ba la 'dod pa dang /
T02D2512-3:176a-21: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gdul
T02D2512-3:176a-22: bya'i sems can gdul ba'i rgyus 'dod pa dang gzugs
T02D2512-3:176a-23: dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa'i rang bzhin du bdag
T02D2512-3:176a-24: nyid kyi dngos po rdzogs pa'i phyir bdag srid gsum
T02D2512-3:176a-25: yin no // ming po gsum gyi gzugs kyis 'dul
T02D2512-3:176a-26: ba'i sems can gyi don du ming po gsum gyi
T02D2512-3:176a-27: gzugs su bdag nyid kyi dngos po rdzogs par mdzad
T02D2512-3:176a-29: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyis sems can
T02D2512-3:176a-30: gdul ba'i phyir dkon mchog gsum gyi gzugs rdzogs par
T02D2512-3:176a-31: mdzad pas na dkon mchog gsum mo //
T02D2512-3:176a-32: sa 'og sa stengs sa bla'i rang bzhin du bdag
T02D2512-3:176a-33: nyid kyi dngos po ston ba'i phyir de'i chos nyid
T02D2512-3:176a-35: thams cad yin pa'i rgyu de nyid kyis 'jig rten gsum pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:176a-36: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi
T02D2512-3:176a-37: rang bzhin bdag nyid kyi dngos po ston pa'i phyir
T02D2512-3:176a-38: / de'i chos nyid kyis khams gsum pa yang pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:176a-39: de ltar dus gsum la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam
T02D2512-3:176a-40: pa gsum du bdag nyid bstan nas da ni dngos
T02D2512-3:176a-41: grub kho na'i don du thams cad nyid shes pa
T02D2512-3:176a-42: bstan pa'i phyir / de la ji ltar bcom ldan
T02D2512-3:176a-43: 'das thams cad ji ltar yin zhes bya ba gsungs
T02D2512-3:176a-44: bstan pa'i phyir / te / ri bo la sogs
T02D2512-3:176a-45: pa sems med pa'i dngos po ni mi rgyu ba
T02D2512-3:176b-0: @176b ste de'i rang bzhin ni nga yin no //
T02D2512-3:176b-2: bsod nams kun mtho che ba'i phyir //
T02D2512-3:176b-4: rgyu ba sems kyi 'dus byas phyir //
T02D2512-3:176b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:176b-6: sems dang sems la sogs pa'i shes pa sems kyi
T02D2512-3:176b-7: 'dus byas pa zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa de
T02D2512-3:176b-8: dag thams cad rnal 'byor bas bsgom par bya ba
T02D2512-3:176b-10: rang gi sems kyi las kyi bya ba de kho
T02D2512-3:176b-11: na nyid do zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-3:176b-12: rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:176b-14: dang po'i glu'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D2512-3:176b-15: nye ba'i snying po de kho na nyid shes pa
T02D2512-3:176b-16: rnams kyis grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de'i
T02D2512-3:176b-17: phyir / gsum po de dag bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:176b-18: phyir de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2512-3:176b-19: phyir / te / srid pa shin tu grub pa
T02D2512-3:176b-20: zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las
T02D2512-3:176b-22: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus kun du bzang po la
T02D2512-3:176b-23: sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
T02D2512-3:176b-24: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rdzogs pa ni dbang
T02D2512-3:176b-25: phyug chen po'i mchog gi dngos grub bo //
T02D2512-3:176b-26: srid pa shin tu grub pa dang dbang phyug chen
T02D2512-3:176b-27: po'i mchog de dag grub pa'i phyir mkhas pa ste
T02D2512-3:176b-28: / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can gyi
T02D2512-3:176b-29: don mdzad pas na bskal pa bzang po'i sngon rol
T02D2512-3:176b-30: du de rnams nyid la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2512-3:176b-31: 'chang chen pos gsungs pa ni gsungs par gyur pa'o
T02D2512-3:176b-32: / // de ltar dang po'i glu 'byung ba bstan
T02D2512-3:176b-33: nas da ni dang po'i glu'i rang bzhin bstan par
T02D2512-3:176b-34: / // bya ba'i phyir / de nas de gang yin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:176b-36: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:176b-37: zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba
T02D2512-3:176b-38: ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rab tu dga'
T02D2512-3:176b-39: ba'o // shin tu rtag pas na mi 'gyur ba mchog go //
T02D2512-3:176b-40: skye bo kun gyis mngon sum ma yin pas na
T02D2512-3:176b-41: gsang ba ste gsang ba de nyid kyi phyir snying
T02D2512-3:176b-42: po ste nges pa'i shes pas gsungs pa ni yi
T02D2512-3:176b-43: ge h'um gi rang bzhin can gsungs par gyur pa
T02D2512-3:176b-44: ste de nyid mi 'gyur mchog ste yi ge h'um
T02D2512-3:176b-46: de ltar dang po'i glu'i rang bzhin bstan nas da
T02D2512-3:176b-47: ni nye ba'i snying po de kho na nyid shes
T02D2512-3:176b-48: pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:176b-49: de nas nye ba'i snying po'i de kho na nyid shes pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:176b-50: de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang //
T02D2512-3:177a-2: zhes bya ba la nges par 'bigs pa'i shes rab ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D2512-3:177a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can
T02D2512-3:177a-4: gang yin pa de ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:177a-5: gzugs kyis bkab pa ni gsang ba'o //
T02D2512-3:177a-6: btsun mo'i 'khor dang shin tu rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pas de longs spyod pa ni gsang ba'o //
T02D2512-3:177a-7: gsum po 'di dag ni snying po zhes brjod pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:177a-8: snying po 'di rjes su grub pa ni bsgom pa ste /
T02D2512-3:177a-9: de grub pa ni snying po rjes su sgrub pa'i
T02D2512-3:177a-10: tshul du rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni nye
T02D2512-3:177a-11: ba'i snying po ste nye ba'i snying po'i dngos po
T02D2512-3:177a-12: ni nye ba'i snying po nyid du bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:177a-13: rdo rje 'chang gis rab tu brjod cing gsungs pa
T02D2512-3:177a-14: yin no // da ni bde ba chen po'i rdo
T02D2512-3:177a-15: rje don yod pa shes pas grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2512-3:177a-16: zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir de la
T02D2512-3:177a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:177a-18: dngos grub kun gyi mi 'gyur ba de bde ba
T02D2512-3:177a-19: chen po zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni bshad
T02D2512-3:177a-20: zin to // dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D2512-3:177a-21: bde ba de nyid rdo rje ni rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:177a-22: dpa' bsgrub pa ste rdzogs pa'i phyir 'bras bu med
T02D2512-3:177a-23: pa ma yin pa'i rgya yin pas don yod pa'o
T02D2512-3:177a-24: zin to // // de nyid mi 'da' bas na 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go //
T02D2512-3:177a-25: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2512-3:177a-26: ye shes kyi rang bzhin can gyi thar pa'i ngo
T02D2512-3:177a-27: bo gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-3:177a-28: rje sems dpa'i sku'i gsang pa'i rang bzhin bskyed pa'i
T02D2512-3:177a-29: rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:177a-30: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bstan par bya
T02D2512-3:177a-31: ba'i phyir de la ji ltar zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-3:177a-33: ji ltar gnas zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' thams cad dang ri rab la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:177a-34: ji ltar 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni zur bzhi
T02D2512-3:177a-35: pa dang sgo bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-3:177a-36: pa'o // ji ltar dgod pa zhes bya ba ni spras pa la sogs pa'i khyad par ro //
T02D2512-3:177a-37: ji ltar 'gro ba zhes pa ni rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:177a-38: dpa' dang 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:177a-39: rang bzhin can gyi 'khor lo dgod par gyur pa
T02D2512-3:177a-41: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i so sor nges
T02D2512-3:177a-42: pa'i gnas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:177a-43: gnas brtag par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bzhin
T02D2512-3:177a-44: du bri ba'i dbang du byas pa ste 'dir yang
T02D2512-3:177b-0: de bzhin gshegs @177b pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor sprul
T02D2512-3:177b-2: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang mthong ba'i 'bras bu
T02D2512-3:177b-3: bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:177b-4: la sogs pa gsungs te de yang go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:177b-5: thig gdab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-3:177b-6: dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba ni thig gdab bar bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:177b-7: shes rab can zhes bya ba ni gzugs can dang
T02D2512-3:177b-8: gzugs can ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi de kho
T02D2512-3:177b-10: reg pa la sogs pa'i bzo la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2512-3:177b-11: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni stong pa nyid de la dmigs pa ni mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D2512-3:177b-12: shar dang nub dang byang dang lho //
T02D2512-3:177b-13: zhes bya ba la phyogs zhes bya ba re re dang sbyar ro //
T02D2512-3:177b-14: tshangs thig gnyis pa dang mtshams kyi thig gnyis pa
T02D2512-3:177b-15: ni thig bzhi ste ka ba brgyad kyi tshul gyis
T02D2512-3:177b-16: dkyil 'khor brgyad de dkyil 'khor brtag pa'i cho ga'o
T02D2512-3:177b-17: // dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2512-3:177b-18: dkyil 'khor gang dang gang gi bdag po gang dang
T02D2512-3:177b-19: gang yin pa de dang der de'i rnal 'byor dang
T02D2512-3:177b-20: ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la rab tu
T02D2512-3:177b-21: goms par byas nas dkyil 'khor de dag der bri
T02D2512-3:177b-22: // bar bya ste / de ltar na gal te
T02D2512-3:177b-23: dkyil 'khor de bag med pas ma tshang ba'am lhag
T02D2512-3:177b-24: par 'gyur na yang dkyil 'khor brtag pa grub pa
T02D2512-3:177b-26: da ni gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid shes pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:177b-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:177b-28: thog ma dang tha ma med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:177b-29: thog ma med pa mchog nyid ni //
T02D2512-3:177b-30: zhes bya ba la de ltar byung ba'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:177b-31: gyis rtag tu dam tshig pa yin pas na thog
T02D2512-3:177b-33: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02D2512-3:177b-34: thog ma med pa mchog nyid kho na'o //
T02D2512-3:177b-35: dpal mchog dang po'o zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-3:177b-36: zhes bya ba la brjod pa ni bstan pa yin no /
T02D2512-3:177b-37: rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni dkyil 'khor thams cad de de'i bdag po ni gtso bo'o //
T02D2512-3:177b-39: dbang phyug mchog ces bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'o //
T02D2512-3:177b-40: de'i rang bzhin bstan par bya ba'i phyir kun mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-3:177b-41: kun mchog 'dod pa chen po zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-3:177b-42: byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi thugs rtogs pas
T02D2512-3:177b-43: te de las byung ba'i yid bde ba ni kun
T02D2512-3:177b-44: mchog 'dod pa chen po'i yid 'ong bde ba'o //
T02D2512-3:178a-1: thams cad du khyab pa'i 'dzum pa ni 'dzum pa chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:178a-2: de ltar gyur pa'i 'dzum pa nges bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:178a-3: srid pa mchog tu rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa yin
T02D2512-3:178a-4: no // mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje sems
T02D2512-3:178a-5: dpa'i sku'i gsang ba rdzogs pa ni mchog tu mi
T02D2512-3:178a-6: 'gyur ba'i dngos grub ste de'i dngos bo ni de
T02D2512-3:178a-7: no // nyid do // de'i phyir chos kyang yin
T02D2512-3:178a-8: la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na chos
T02D2512-3:178a-9: thams cad de kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang
T02D2512-3:178a-11: byang chub kyi sems dang rang bzhin gyi sku dang
T02D2512-3:178a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2512-3:178a-14: de dag gi rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin nyid rtog pa ste rgyu de'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:178a-15: rdo rje 'chang nga zla ba'i 'od yin no //
T02D2512-3:178a-16: chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rgyu 'ba' zhig
T02D2512-3:178a-17: gis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i
T02D2512-3:178a-18: 'od lta bu yin pa gcig pur ma zad kyi
T02D2512-3:178a-19: gsang ba'i de nyid nyid phyir dkar //
T02D2512-3:178a-20: zhes bya ba la lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus
T02D2512-3:178a-21: na bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni gsang ba'i
T02D2512-3:178a-23: de nyid 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug
T02D2512-3:178a-24: la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i rgyu 'dis
T02D2512-3:178a-25: kyang dkar po'o // 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-3:178a-26: gang gi phyir bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs
T02D2512-3:178a-27: pa thams cad dang bral ba'i kun gzhi rnam par
T02D2512-3:178a-28: dag pa la sogs pa'i chos thams cad las byung
T02D2512-3:178a-29: ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dod
T02D2512-3:178a-30: chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug mi mnga' ba
T02D2512-3:178a-31: de'i phyir sku mdog dkar po ste rang gi rang
T02D2512-3:178a-32: bzhin ston par mdzad cing bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:178a-33: gzugs thams cad ston pas sems can gyi don mdzad
T02D2512-3:178a-34: pa'i phyir 'dod chags chen po'i nyon mongs pa'i rang
T02D2512-3:178a-35: bzhin ston par mdzad pas na bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2512-3:178a-36: 'khor lo dmar zhing sna tshogs 'bar ba yin no
T02D2512-3:178a-37: // rtag pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rin chen
T02D2512-3:178a-38: 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod
T02D2512-3:178a-39: grub pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chu'i bum pas
T02D2512-3:178a-40: dbang bskur bas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bag chags
T02D2512-3:178a-41: dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khrud par
T02D2512-3:178a-42: 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i yon tan 'di
T02D2512-3:178a-44: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba dang
T02D2512-3:178b-0: ldan pa'i bcom ldan @178b 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:178b-1: yin no // shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:178b-2: gyi zhabs g-yas pas nye bar mtshon pa'i skus bdud
T02D2512-3:178b-3: bzhi'i rang bzhin can g-yon pa'i sku las mtho ba
T02D2512-3:178b-4: dang brla dang byin pa dang /
T02D2512-3:178b-5: zhabs kyi nye bar mtshon pa'i 'khor ba'i yan lag
T02D2512-3:178b-6: yang dag par gnon cing 'dzin pa ste 'dzin pa
T02D2512-3:178b-7: des rgyal ba la ni phyi rol pa las rgyal
T02D2512-3:178b-8: ba ste mi snang bar mdzad pa yin no zhes
T02D2512-3:178b-9: bya ba bstan pa'i phyir sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
T02D2512-3:178b-10: dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-3:178b-11: yin no // rgyu des rdo rje sems dpa' ni
T02D2512-3:178b-12: thams cad kyi mchog ste de'i rang bzhin gyi bsgom
T02D2512-3:178b-13: pa so sor rtogs par mdzad pas te /
T02D2512-3:178b-14: de ston par mdzad pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'dod chags rdo rje ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:178b-15: thams cad kyi mchog so sor rtogs pas yul du
T02D2512-3:178b-16: byas pa'i don mngon du bya ba ni dngos grub
T02D2512-3:178b-17: thams cad kyi bde ba dam pa ste /
T02D2512-3:178b-18: de ston par byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma k'i li k'i la yin no //
T02D2512-3:178b-19: dngos grub thams cad kyi bde ba dam pa ni
T02D2512-3:178b-20: thams cad kyi mchog ste de bdud bzhi las rgyal
T02D2512-3:178b-21: ba ni rnam par rgyal ba ste de mthong ba
T02D2512-3:178b-22: ni de las byung ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
T02D2512-3:178b-23: ste / de ston par byed pas kun mchog rnam
T02D2512-3:178b-24: par rgyal ba'i mtho ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma
T02D2512-3:178b-25: rdo rje dran ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:178b-26: sangs rgyas sprul pa dang sems can gyi don sprul
T02D2512-3:178b-27: pa'i skus mdzad pas na dbang phyug thams cad de
T02D2512-3:178b-28: des mchod pa chen po ni thams cad du khyab
T02D2512-3:178b-29: pa'i so sor rtog pa'i mchod pa ni bcom ldan
T02D2512-3:178b-30: 'das ma rdo rje 'dod ma'i dbang phyug ma yin
T02D2512-3:178b-31: no // 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2512-3:178b-32: dngos grub thams cad ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i
T02D2512-3:178b-33: no // gzugs kyis so // 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D2512-3:178b-34: rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
T02D2512-3:178b-35: ni k'i li k'i la'i gzugs kyis so //
T02D2512-3:178b-36: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dga' ba
T02D2512-3:178b-37: thams cad ni rdo rje dran ma'i gzugs kyis so
T02D2512-3:178b-38: // 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bdag
T02D2512-3:178b-39: po thams cad ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug
T02D2512-3:178b-40: ma'i gzugs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste rdo rje
T02D2512-3:178b-41: sems dpa'i mchog gi sku'i yan lag ni de dag
T02D2512-3:178b-42: gi sku yin no zhes bya pa'i don to //
T02D2512-3:178b-43: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba lnga 'di kho na nyid bstan nas /
T02D2512-3:178b-44: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang de rnams kyi
T02D2512-3:178b-45: rigs bstan par bya ba'i phyir de la ji ltar
T02D2512-3:179a-1: sogs pa gsungs te rtag pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2512-3:179a-2: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02D2512-3:179a-3: don yod grub pa rnams ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:179a-4: lnga po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba brjod pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:179a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir ro zhes
T02D2512-3:179a-7: bya ba la don dam par 'di rnams de bzhin
T02D2512-3:179a-8: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa
T02D2512-3:179a-9: de'i phyir 'di rnams kho na de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2512-3:179a-10: thams cad du brjod pa yin gyi gzhan dag ni
T02D2512-3:179a-11: ma yin no // mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje
T02D2512-3:179a-12: sems dpa'o zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2512-3:179a-13: mi bskyod pa nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:179a-15: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:179a-16: kho na rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdo
T02D2512-3:179a-18: chos dang rdo rje las kyi gzugs su bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:179a-19: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de
T02D2512-3:179a-20: kho na nyid bstan nas da ni rdo rje nyi
T02D2512-3:179a-21: ma me ltar 'bar ba dang de'i rigs kyi de
T02D2512-3:179a-22: kho na nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas
T02D2512-3:179a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te shin tu
T02D2512-3:179a-24: gdug pa drag po ni tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'jigs
T02D2512-3:179a-25: byed la sogs pa ste de rnams 'dul ba la
T02D2512-3:179a-26: zhi ba nyid dgos pa ma yin te /
T02D2512-3:179a-27: de lta bas na de dag gdul ba'i phyir shes
T02D2512-3:179a-28: rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo ni shes rab dang
T02D2512-3:179a-30: 'jig pa'i dus kyi nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od bzhin
T02D2512-3:179a-31: du gdug pa thams cad kyi bud shing sreg par
T02D2512-3:179a-32: nus pas na nyi ma'i 'od lta bu'o //
T02D2512-3:179a-33: de gang yin zhe na rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ste rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-3:179a-34: rang nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid kyis byung
T02D2512-3:179a-35: ba yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag
T02D2512-3:179a-36: ma'o // gdug pa dang drag po'i sems can gdul
T02D2512-3:179a-37: ba'i phyir sgeg pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo
T02D2512-3:179a-38: rje sems dpa' nyid rdo rje nyi ma me ltar
T02D2512-3:179a-39: 'bar bar gyur pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin
T02D2512-3:179a-40: no zhes bya ba'i don to//
T02D2512-3:179a-41: rdo rje mtshon cha 'dzin ma la sogs pa nas
T02D2512-3:179a-42: rdo rje dril bu ma la sogs pa mthar thug
T02D2512-3:179a-43: pa'i bar gyi rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ji lta
T02D2512-3:179a-44: ba bzhin du bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-3:179a-45: cad kyi bstan pa grub pa'i don du de'i thabs
T02D2512-3:179a-46: kyi khor ba'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2512-3:179a-47: nyi ma me ltar 'bar bas rang gi rdo rje
T02D2512-3:179b-0: @179b las sprul par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:179b-1: de ltar rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag po dang rigs
T02D2512-3:179b-2: kyi de kho na nyid bstan nas da ni padma'i
T02D2512-3:179b-3: rigs kyi bdag po dang rigs kyi de kho na
T02D2512-3:179b-4: nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya
T02D2512-3:179b-5: ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2512-3:179b-6: padma dmar po bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i dri ma
T02D2512-3:179b-7: thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i rang bzhin gyis dag
T02D2512-3:179b-8: pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang thugs rje chen po ni
T02D2512-3:179b-9: padmar r'a ga'o // nges thams cad dag pa ni padma'i rigs rtogs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:179b-10: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na bla na med pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:179b-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang nyid bdag / ces bya
T02D2512-3:179b-12: ba ni thams cad dag pa'i rang bzhin can 'jig
T02D2512-3:179b-13: rten dbang phyug gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya
T02D2512-3:179b-14: ba'o // rdo rje chos ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D2512-3:179b-15: de rab tu sgrub pa ni rtog pa'o //
T02D2512-3:179b-16: des sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa ni log par lta ba spong pa ste /
T02D2512-3:179b-17: de'i don du padma chen po'i rigs ni skyon thams cad dang bral bas na dag pa'o //
T02D2512-3:179b-18: de nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes bsags pa
T02D2512-3:179b-19: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rdzogs par
T02D2512-3:179b-21: de ltar padma'i rigs kyi bdag po dang /
T02D2512-3:179b-22: de'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid bstan nas da
T02D2512-3:179b-23: ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bdag po dang de'i rigs
T02D2512-3:179b-24: kyi de kho na nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-3:179b-25: / de la ji ltar nam mkha'i snying po yin
T02D2512-3:179b-26: zhes bya ba gsungs te nam mkha'i yin la thams
T02D2512-3:179b-27: cad kyang de nyid yin pas na nam mkha' thams
T02D2512-3:179b-28: cad de nor bu'i rigs de'i'o //
T02D2512-3:179b-29: thams cad nam mkha' bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2512-3:179b-30: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D2512-3:179b-31: de yang sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyis mtho
T02D2512-3:179b-32: ba che ba yin pas na sems can bsod nams
T02D2512-3:179b-33: mtho ba che ba ste nam mkha' thams cad khyab
T02D2512-3:179b-34: cing thams cad ster ba'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i
T02D2512-3:179b-35: snying po'i sku'o // sems can bsod nams mtho ba
T02D2512-3:179b-36: che ba'i sku de nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid nam
T02D2512-3:179b-38: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dbang
T02D2512-3:179b-39: bskur ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes
T02D2512-3:179b-40: bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
T02D2512-3:179b-41: so // dbang bskur dang ni gter dang ni //
T02D2512-3:179b-42: rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchod pa che //
T02D2512-3:179b-43: zhes bya ba la sems can thams cad kyi bsam
T02D2512-3:179b-44: pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir
T02D2512-3:180a-1: ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos bsags par mdzad nas bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:180a-2: de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na
T02D2512-3:180a-3: nyid chen po bstan nas da ni dbang bskur ba
T02D2512-3:180a-4: shes pas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bstan
T02D2512-3:180a-6: de nas rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes
T02D2512-3:180a-7: pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te sangs rgyas ni de
T02D2512-3:180a-8: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de de rnams la rdo
T02D2512-3:180a-9: rje rtse lnga pa phyed pa'i rtse mo can gyi
T02D2512-3:180a-10: yid bzhin gyi nor bur ni po che cod pan
T02D2512-3:180a-11: de rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba
T02D2512-3:180a-12: de'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bya'o //
T02D2512-3:180a-13: khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phreng ba dang
T02D2512-3:180a-14: ldan pa'i cod pan gyis rdo rje chen po'i rigs
T02D2512-3:180a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dang ldan pa'i cod pan gyis padma'i rigs la'o //
T02D2512-3:180a-17: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang ldan pas nor bu
T02D2512-3:180a-18: chen po'i rigs kyis bdag dang gzhan la dbang bskur
T02D2512-3:180a-19: bar bya'o // dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag mtshan
T02D2512-3:180a-20: gyi de kho na nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-3:180a-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2512-3:180a-22: bar bya'o // / thams cad mchog gi dngos grub che //
T02D2512-3:180a-23: dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-3:180a-24: de'i don du mtshon cha chen po rdo rje rtse lnga pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2512-3:180a-25: de nyid kyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:180a-26: gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che //
T02D2512-3:180a-27: zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang /
T02D2512-3:180a-30: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma can du shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:180a-31: de'i rang bzhin can ni gsang ba lnga ste de
T02D2512-3:180a-32: rnams kyi de kho na nyid chen po ni gnyis
T02D2512-3:180a-33: su med pa'i ye shes so ;
T02D2512-3:180a-34: / de ston par byed pa'i dang po rtse lnga
T02D2512-3:180a-35: pa ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa zhes brjod pa
T02D2512-3:180a-36: yin no // de ltar mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan
T02D2512-3:180a-37: gyi de kho na nyid bstan nas da ni rigs
T02D2512-3:180a-38: thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bstan par bya
T02D2512-3:180a-39: ba'i phyir de nas rigs thams cad ces bya ba
T02D2512-3:180a-41: sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D2512-3:180a-42: ces bya ba la gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D2512-3:180a-43: rnams rdo rje rtse lnga pa de ni sangs rgyas
T02D2512-3:180a-44: thams cad kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:180a-45: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang
T02D2512-3:180a-46: ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang rnam
T02D2512-3:180b-0: par snang mdzad kyi ye @180b shes rnams ni sangs
T02D2512-3:180b-1: rgyas thams cad de de rnams kyi dngos po ni
T02D2512-3:180b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad nyid do //
T02D2512-3:180b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes ston par byed
T02D2512-3:180b-4: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2512-3:180b-5: ni sangs rgyas thams cad du brjod pa yin no
T02D2512-3:180b-6: // sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can //
T02D2512-3:180b-7: zhes bya ba la rigs kyi bdag po dang bcas
T02D2512-3:180b-8: pa'i rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ni rdo rje can
T02D2512-3:180b-9: te de rnams kyi yang rigs kyi phyag mtshan 'bar
T02D2512-3:180b-10: ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gang yin pa de
T02D2512-3:180b-11: sna tshogs bya ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o
T02D2512-3:180b-12: // rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos po ni
T02D2512-3:180b-13: sna tshogs te de'i bya ba ni gdug pa dang
T02D2512-3:180b-14: drag po'i sems can 'dul ba dang zhi ba'i sems
T02D2512-3:180b-16: 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos //
T02D2512-3:180b-17: zhes bya ba la padma'i rigs kyi phyag mtshan ni
T02D2512-3:180b-18: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston par
T02D2512-3:180b-19: byed pa dang padma'i rigs ston par byed pa shes
T02D2512-3:180b-20: par bya'o // nor bu chen po'i phyag mtshan ni
T02D2512-3:180b-21: nor bu ste de la rin po che'i mchod pa
T02D2512-3:180b-22: ni mchod pa chen po byas nas rab tu dga'
T02D2512-3:180b-23: ba ste yid bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-3:180b-24: da ni thams cad dgug par bya ba bstan par
T02D2512-3:180b-25: bya ba'i phyir rtog pa kun zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-3:180b-27: rang gi lha'i rtog pa las dgug pa'i phyag rgyar
T02D2512-3:180b-28: gang bstan pa de ni rtog pa kun gyi gsang
T02D2512-3:180b-29: ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu ste dril bu dang bcas
T02D2512-3:180b-30: pa de dang 'gug pa'i sngags kyis rang gi lha
T02D2512-3:180b-31: gcig pu'am 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas de'i
T02D2512-3:180b-32: rjes la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i rjes
T02D2512-3:180b-33: su bsgrub par bya ste brla g-yas pa dang g-yon
T02D2512-3:180b-34: pa dag gis dril bu dkrol zhing bya ba yin
T02D2512-3:180b-35: no // da ni mchod pa thams cad kyi de
T02D2512-3:180b-36: kho na nyid shes par bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-3:180b-37: no // / de la ji ltar zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:180b-38: la sogs pa gsungs te rtog pa yang yin la
T02D2512-3:180b-39: kun yang de nyid yin pas na rtog pa kun
T02D2512-3:180b-40: te rigs lnga'i lha'i rtog pa rnams so //
T02D2512-3:180b-41: de rnams kyi gsang ba chen po'i mchod pa ni
T02D2512-3:180b-42: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:180b-43: bzhi'o // des mchod pa ni mchod pa chen po
T02D2512-3:180b-44: byas nas rab tu dga' ba ste yid bde ba
T02D2512-3:180b-45: skyes nas mchod par byas ni bsgrub par bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:180b-46: lha'i bu'i gzugs mdun du mchod par bya ste /
T02D2512-3:180b-47: slar yang glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:181a-1: rnal 'byor byas la gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bdag
T02D2512-3:181a-2: nyid yang dag par mchod de cho ga thams cad
T02D2512-3:181a-4: bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya ba'i lha'i gzugs dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du'am /
T02D2512-3:181a-5: dpa' bo gcig pu ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag
T02D2512-3:181a-6: nas rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa
T02D2512-3:181a-7: rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la slar yang ji
T02D2512-3:181a-8: lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i glu dang rol mo'i
T02D2512-3:181a-9: rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod
T02D2512-3:181a-10: par bya'o // de la mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu
T02D2512-3:181a-11: gnyis kyi snying po rnams dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-3:181a-12: dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa nyid rigs dang rigs las
T02D2512-3:181a-13: par bya'o // gzung bar bya'o // glu yang rang gi rigs las gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:181a-14: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi'i rang bzhin rang gi rigs
T02D2512-3:181a-15: kyi khu tshur gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o
T02D2512-3:181a-16: // rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs las gsungs pa'i rab
T02D2512-3:181a-17: tu dga' ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa
T02D2512-3:181a-18: brgyad po kho na rdo rje'i rigs la khro ba
T02D2512-3:181a-19: dang bcas pa shes bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:181a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la mnyam pa'i thal mos zhi pa rnams so //
T02D2512-3:181a-21: padma'i rigs la padma'i thal mos so //
T02D2512-3:181a-22: nor bu'i rigs la nor bu'i khu tshur gyis mchod
T02D2512-3:181a-23: pa rnam pa brgyad kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya
T02D2512-3:181a-24: ba yin no // de ltar mchod pa'i de kho
T02D2512-3:181a-25: na nyid bstan nas da ni dngos grub thams cad
T02D2512-3:181a-26: kyi byin gyis brlab pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-3:181a-27: ba yin no // / de la ji ltar zhes
T02D2512-3:181a-28: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te rtog pa yang
T02D2512-3:181a-29: yin la kun yang yin pas na rtog pa kun
T02D2512-3:181a-30: ba yin no // / te / de rnams kyi
T02D2512-3:181a-31: gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag
T02D2512-3:181a-32: rgya chen po rnams te de dag gis ji lta
T02D2512-3:181a-33: ba bzhin du bshad pa'i tshul gyis legs shing mdzes
T02D2512-3:181a-35: de'i rjes la dam tshig chen po'i de kho na
T02D2512-3:181a-36: nyid kyi bdag nyid rab tu bsgrubs la snying po
T02D2512-3:181a-37: ste rang gi lha'i bzlas pa bya ba'i sngags kyis
T02D2512-3:181a-38: bzla ba ni bdag nyid la mngon par bsngags par
T02D2512-3:181a-39: bya'o // dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid
T02D2512-3:181a-40: kyi bdag nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa de
T02D2512-3:181a-42: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid
T02D2512-3:181a-43: gsungs pa yin te de yang bshad zin pas slar
T02D2512-3:181a-45: 'dis ni rigs thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ba rnams
T02D2512-3:181a-46: kyi dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi
T02D2512-3:181b-0: don @181b bsgoms pas bdag la byin gyis brlab par
T02D2512-3:181b-1: bya ba yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-3:181b-2: da ni rang gi lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi
T02D2512-3:181b-3: sgrub pa chen po'i rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-3:181b-4: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2512-3:181b-5: / rtog pa kun ni rdo rje sems dpa' la
T02D2512-3:181b-6: sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtog
T02D2512-3:181b-7: pa ste nga rnams la brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i
T02D2512-3:181b-8: dngos po bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de
T02D2512-3:181b-9: dag thams cad rang gi rnal 'byor byas te rang
T02D2512-3:181b-10: gi lha'i bzla ba'i snying pos lha'i gzugs rnam par
T02D2512-3:181b-11: bsams la rang gi lha'i gzugs nyid ji srid bsgrub
T02D2512-3:181b-12: par bya ste de srid kyi mig sman la sogs
T02D2512-3:181b-14: da ni thams cad rjes su sgrub pa bstan par
T02D2512-3:181b-15: bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-3:181b-16: pa gsungs te / rdo rje dang dril bu ni
T02D2512-3:181b-17: 'dir rang gi rigs kyi phyag mtshan te gnyis po
T02D2512-3:181b-18: de 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje dang dril

T02D2512-3:181b-20: dang dril bu 'dzin par gyur pas bdag nyid rang
T02D2512-3:181b-21: gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par byas la brtan
T02D2512-3:181b-22: pa dang g-yo ba'i rang bzhin can gyi 'gro ba
T02D2512-3:181b-23: thams cad gdong nas ma skye sa pa'i phyir nam
T02D2512-3:181b-24: mkha'i mtshan nyid can du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:181b-25: rdo rje dril bus rab sad pas //
T02D2512-3:181b-26: zhes bya ba ni sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes
T02D2512-3:181b-27: rab kyi ye shes rnams kyis de mngon du byed
T02D2512-3:181b-28: ba ni rab tu sad pa ste /
T02D2512-3:181b-29: rab tu sad pa de dag gis dpal mchog dang
T02D2512-3:181b-30: po la sogs 'grub ces bya ba ni ji lta
T02D2512-3:181b-31: ba bzhin du bshad pa'i rtog pa thams cad rjes
T02D2512-3:181b-32: su sgrub pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das grub
T02D2512-3:181b-33: par 'gyur ro // da ni 'bad pa med pa
T02D2512-3:181b-34: shes pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de la zhes
T02D2512-3:181b-35: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D2512-3:181b-37: mchod pa chen po dang bdag la byin gyis brlab
T02D2512-3:181b-38: pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa rnams kyis rdzogs par
T02D2512-3:181b-39: bya'o // de ji ltar zhe na ci 'dod ces bya ba ste /
T02D2512-3:181b-40: ji ltar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D2512-3:181b-41: ci 'dod pa ni ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'o //

T02D2512-3:181b-43: ci 'dod pa'i las ni mchod rten gyi las dang

T02D2512-3:182a-2: de gang la yod pa de ni ci 'dod pa'i spyod pa'i las dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2512-3:182a-3: bya ba'i rgyud la bkag pa'i rnal 'byor dang rjes
T02D2512-3:182a-4: su mthun pa'i thug pa nag po la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:182a-5: za bas na thams cad za ba'o //

T02D2512-3:182a-9: zhes bya ba 'dis 'dug pa'i nges pa med pa ston pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:182a-10: rab tu dgod dam rab tu smra //
T02D2512-3:182a-11: zhes bya ba 'dis 'dug pa'i nges pa med par bstan pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:182a-12: gang der ji lta ba de bzhin du zhes bya
T02D2512-3:182a-13: ba 'dis gnas kyi nges pa med pa nyid bstan
T02D2512-3:182a-14: pa yin no // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang
T02D2512-3:182a-15: ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi rang bzhin gyis
T02D2512-3:182a-16: dngos po gang dang gang mig la sogs pa'i dbang
T02D2512-3:182a-17: po'i spyod yul du gyur pas na dbang po'i lam
T02D2512-3:182a-18: du gyur pa ste dngos po da dang de'i rang

T02D2512-3:182a-21: pa yin no // bzhin te / tu bya'o //

T02D2512-3:182a-23: dang dri ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i

T02D2512-3:182a-25: pa'i ro dang reg bya ni rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:182a-26: la sogs pa'i reg bya dang chos ni rdo rje
T02D2512-3:182a-27: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i chos dang gcig tu bya'o
T02D2512-3:182a-28: pa yin no // bzhin te / tu bya'o //
T02D2512-3:182a-29: // de ltar na dngos po de rang bzhin dang
T02D2512-3:182a-30: gcig tu bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:182a-31: rnal 'byor gang gis gcig tu bya zhe na /
T02D2512-3:182a-32: mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis te byed par 'gyur ba des so //
T02D2512-3:182a-33: rang gi lhag pa'i lha ni rang gi yid kyi lha ste /
T02D2512-3:182a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can
T02D2512-3:182a-35: gyi yid nga nyid kun du bsgom ste bsam par
T02D2512-3:182a-37: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rang
T02D2512-3:182a-38: bzhin can gyi de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor
T02D2512-3:182a-39: 'dis thams cad kyi lha'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa ste
T02D2512-3:182a-40: rdzogs par byas na thams cad nyid rab tu 'grub
T02D2512-3:182a-41: par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2512-3:182a-42: de gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D2512-3:182a-43: sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad la //
T02D2512-3:182a-44: zhes bya ba la rang gis lha'i rang bzhin du
T02D2512-3:182a-45: gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rtag tu brtan zhing
T02D2512-3:182a-47: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:182a-48: de ltar zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag tu
T02D2512-3:182b-0: bshad pa'i tshul gyis dpal @182b mchog dang po'i rgyud
T02D2512-3:182b-1: kyi cho ga ni bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-3:182b-2: sgrub pa'i rnam pa can byin brlabs //
T02D2512-3:182b-3: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2512-3:182b-4: byin gyis brlab pa de nyid kyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:182b-5: ma nyams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2512-3:182b-6: te gang gis kyang ma nyams pas na ma nyams
T02D2512-3:182b-7: pa'o // mchog kyang yin la bla ma yang de nyid yin pas mchog gi bla ma'o //
T02D2512-3:182b-8: gsal ba ni gsal ba nyid do //
T02D2512-3:182b-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i
T02D2512-3:182b-10: dngos grub ni mchog tu gsang ba'i dngos grub ste
T02D2512-3:182b-11: / de'i cho ga ni sngar bshad pa ste des lha'i bde ba rab tu ster ba'o //
T02D2512-3:182b-12: ci'i don du byin gyis brlab ce na myur du grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-3:182b-13: myur du dngos grub thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:182b-14: sus byin gyis brlab ce na de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-3:182b-15: de dag ji lta bu zhe na stong pa nyid
T02D2512-3:182b-16: bcu drug ni rdo rje mchog ste des 'dzin par
T02D2512-3:182b-17: mdzad pas na rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa'i rdo rje
T02D2512-3:182b-18: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs kyi lha rnams te
T02D2512-3:182b-20: byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams

T02D2512-3:182b-26: pa la thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos
T02D2512-3:182b-27: kyi dbyings bde ba ni mchog tu bde ba'o //
T02D2512-3:182b-28: des dam pa ste mchog tu bde ba dam pa'o //
T02D2512-3:182b-29: gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po'i rang
T02D2512-3:182b-30: bzhin can gyi dang po'i rdo rje ni mchog gi

T02D2512-3:182b-32: gi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
T02D2512-3:182b-33: pa yin no // de yang chen po ste thams
T02D2512-3:182b-34: cad khyab pa dang dga' ba chen po zhes bya
T02D2512-3:182b-35: pa yin no // ba'o // dpal mchog dam po'i
T02D2512-3:182b-36: rgya cher bshad pa las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho
T02D2512-3:182b-39: // / da ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i cho gas slob dpon las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2512-3:182b-40: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas
T02D2512-3:182b-41: pa rjes su spyad nas rigs thams cad kyi dkyil
T02D2512-3:182b-42: 'khor rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol
T02D2512-3:182b-43: nas rang gi lus la sprul pa nye par bsdu
T02D2512-3:182b-44: ba dang bdag nyid srung ba bya ste /
T02D2512-3:183a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid la legs par mdzad pa dag gis @183a * //
T02D2512-3:183a-2: slob dpon ldang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di
T02D2512-3:183a-3: zur gyi tshig gis rab tu bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2512-3:183a-4: phyir // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2512-3:183a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de nas
T02D2512-3:183a-6: kyi sgra ni de ma thag tu brjod pa ste
T02D2512-3:183a-7: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas
T02D2512-3:183a-8: pa'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya'o //

T02D2512-3:183a-12: phyogs bcur sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyis 'gro bas na kun du 'gro ba'o //

T02D2512-3:183a-14: gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam
T02D2512-3:183a-15: pa'i sangs rgyas kun te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2512-3:183a-16: kyis yang dag bar bstod pa'o //

T02D2512-3:183a-18: rtog pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni mthar thug pa de'i don du yang gsung ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:183a-19: ci gsung ba yin zhe na dang po zhes bya

T02D2512-3:183a-21: bshad zin to // dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud kyi
T02D2512-3:183a-22: rnam pa can gyi bdag gi nges pa'i shes pa
T02D2512-3:183a-24: mchog kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas mchog chen po'o //
T02D2512-3:183a-25: bde ba chen po'i mchog gi rjes su chags pa

T02D2512-3:183a-27: gzugs bstan pas sems can gyi khams thams cad la

T02D2512-3:183a-34: rtag tu ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
T02D2512-3:183a-35: gang gi phyir 'di dus thams cad du sems can
T02D2512-3:183a-36: gyi khams thams cad la thams cad kyi mchog gi
T02D2512-3:183a-37: dbang phyug nyid stsol bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:183a-38: thams cad kyi mchog kyang de yin la 'byor pa
T02D2512-3:183a-39: yang de yin pas thams cad kyi 'byor pa ste
T02D2512-3:183a-40: rigs lnga'i phun sum tshogs pa'o //

T02D2512-3:183b-1: de'i dngos po ni thams cad kyi mchog gi dbang

T02D2512-3:183b-10: thob pa med pa nyid kyi phyir mthar thug pa med pa ste yongs su rdzogs pa med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:183b-11: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung bar bya ba ste mthar thug pa med pa kho na'o //

T02D2512-3:183b-21: 'di las ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02D2512-3:183b-22: mchog gi dngos grub 'phel bar ster //

T02D2512-3:183b-24: gi dngos grub ste de nyid gong nas gong du

T02D2512-3:183b-27: ster ba ste de lta bu gang yin pa de
T02D2512-3:183b-28: gang gis kyang yongs su rdzogs par nus pa ma
T02D2512-3:183b-29: yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o
T02D2512-3:183b-30: // thog ma mthar thug med pa'o //

T02D2512-3:183b-33: gang ma thog ma dang mthar thug pa gnyis med pa ste thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:183b-35: d'i thog ma dang tha ma med ba yin te

T02D2512-3:184a-20: pa'o // su chags pa'o // sdom pa'i tshul khrims

T02D2512-3:184a-28: 'di yongs su rdzogs pa ste mdor bsdus pa yongs
T02D2512-3:184a-29: su mthar thug par byas pa'o //

T02D2512-3:184a-36: go cha bcing pa dang mnyes pa bya ba byas nas /

T02D2512-3:184a-41: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2512-3:184a-43: rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyis bdag nyid srung ba
T02D2512-3:184a-44: byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pas
T02D2512-3:184a-45: / bya mchog sangs rgyas sras rnams legs so zhes
T02D2512-3:184a-46: bya ba nas brtsams te ji srid bde ba thams
T02D2512-3:184a-47: cad ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bstan
T02D2512-3:184b-0: pa'i @184b legs par mdzad pa rnams kyis bdag nyid
T02D2512-3:184b-1: dga' bar gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:184b-2: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rdul tshon nye bar bsdus par byas la langs te /
T02D2512-3:184b-3: ji ltar dge ba'i phyogs dang mthun par rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:184b-4: de nas phur bu gdon pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-3:184b-5: aom badzrod k'i li k'i la ya sarba ki la
T02D2512-3:184b-6: ya sarba ki lan bhu ddha satte na badzra aadzny'a
T02D2512-3:184b-7: yam h'um phat // phur bu thams cad gdon pa'i sngags so //
T02D2512-3:184b-8: de nas 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te las
T02D2512-3:184b-9: pa gnyis kyis kha sbyor gyi thal mo byas la
T02D2512-3:184b-10: srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste /
T02D2512-3:184b-11: dbus ma gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par sbyar
T02D2512-3:184b-12: ba byas la de'i tshigs gsum pa'i drung du mdzub
T02D2512-3:184b-13: mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam pa can nas gang tsam
T02D2512-3:184b-14: gyi bar yod par gzung zhing /
T02D2512-3:184b-15: mthe'u chung gnyi dang mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo
T02D2512-3:184b-16: byas te 'di ni rdo rje phur bu'i sngags dang
T02D2512-3:184b-17: phyag rgya'o // 'di ni dbus ma'i rtse mos phur bu bzung ste /
T02D2512-3:184b-18: mngon sum du 'am yid kyis gdon par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:184b-19: de nas phur bu de nyid yid kyis rdo rje
T02D2512-3:184b-20: rtse lnga pa'i dbus su'am dgra ba'i lus la gzhug
T02D2512-3:184b-21: par bya'o // de nas zhi ba'i rig pas ba'i
T02D2512-3:184b-22: 'o ma la yongs su bzlas te phur bu'i bu
T02D2512-3:184b-23: gu de yongs su dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:184b-24: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dam tshig //
T02D2512-3:184b-25: phyag rgya'i don ni rab ston byed //
T02D2512-3:184b-26: rgyud 'di'i bshad pa byas pa yi //
T02D2512-3:184b-27: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02D2512-3:184b-28: des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02D2512-3:184b-29: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin kun dga'i //
T02D2512-3:184b-30: snying po bsam mi khyab dge 'byung //
T02D2512-3:184b-31: khyab bdag rdo rje rin chen gyur //
T02D2512-3:184b-32: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab
T02D2512-3:184b-33: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya
T02D2512-3:184b-34: ba las dum bu gnyis pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so
T02D2512-3:184b-36: / // / de ltar nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi
T02D2512-3:184b-37: gnyen po nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
T02D2512-3:184b-38: shes kyi rang bzhin chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid
T02D2512-3:184b-39: la mngon par zhen pa stong pa'i dngos pos sbyin
T02D2512-3:184b-40: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang dam tshig gi
T02D2512-3:184b-41: phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid can gyi dbal mchog dang po
T02D2512-3:184b-42: rdo rje 'chang chen po de'i rang bzhin gdul bya
T02D2512-3:184b-43: rnams kyis mngon du byed pa'i phyir dum bu gnyis
T02D2512-3:184b-44: pa bstan nas da ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i
T02D2512-3:184b-45: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yid kyi rnam par
T02D2512-3:185a-0: shes @185a * // pa'i gnyen por gyur pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-3:185a-1: chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang
T02D2512-3:185a-2: chen po de'i rang bzhin gdul bya rnams kyis rtogs
T02D2512-3:185a-4: de nas dang po'i gnas dgyes pa //
T02D2512-3:185a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dum bu gsum pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2512-3:185a-6: de ltar na 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2512-3:185a-7: phyin pa'i rang bzhin can du bstan nas slar yang
T02D2512-3:185a-8: bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes brtson 'grus
T02D2512-3:185a-9: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang las kyi phyag
T02D2512-3:185a-10: rgya'i rang bzhin can mig dang rna ba dang sna
T02D2512-3:185a-11: dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnams
T02D2512-3:185a-12: rnam par dag pa'i rgyur gyur pa rdo rje 'chang
T02D2512-3:185a-13: chen po'i rang bzhin gdul bya rnams mngon du byed
T02D2512-3:185a-14: pa'i phyir / de nas dang po'i gnas dgyes nas //
T02D2512-3:185a-15: thams cad nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:185a-16: nga nyid kyis dum bu bzhi pa bstan par gsungs
T02D2512-3:185a-18: dum bu bzhi po de rnams kyi rim pa ji
T02D2512-3:185a-19: lta ba bzhin du stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma
T02D2512-3:185a-20: med pa dang smon pa med pa dang rang bzhin
T02D2512-3:185a-21: gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams
T02D2512-3:185a-22: te me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid dang
T02D2512-3:185a-23: so sor rtog pa dang bya ba nan tan gyi
T02D2512-3:185a-24: ye shes sgrub par byed pa bstan pa yin te
T02D2512-3:185a-25: / de'i phyir gnyis su zlos pa'i nyes par dogs par mi bya'o //
T02D2512-3:185a-26: gal te gnyis su zlos pa yod kyang sgra gcig
T02D2512-3:185a-27: gis don du ma so sor ston par byed pa
T02D2512-3:185a-28: yin no zhes bya ba'i phyir sgra de nyid kyi
T02D2512-3:185a-29: dgongs pa'i dbang gis don gzhan bstan par bya ba
T02D2512-3:185a-30: yin te skyon yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:185a-31: dum bu gnyis po 'di las gzhan yang khyad par
T02D2512-3:185a-32: ci yod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de la
T02D2512-3:185a-33: dum bu gsum par dum bu gnyis pa'i rtog pa
T02D2512-3:185a-34: thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma rtsa ba'i rgyud kho
T02D2512-3:185a-35: na rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po yin
T02D2512-3:185a-36: te 'di'i khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-3:185a-38: dga' ma dang spyan ma dang dpal chen mo rnams
T02D2512-3:185a-39: kyi sgras dbyangs rdo rje ma dang rdo rje sprin
T02D2512-3:185a-40: ma dang rdo rje ston ma dang rdo rje dgun
T02D2512-3:185a-41: ma rnams brjod pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:185a-42: de rnams kyi yang rim pa bzhin du 'dir ni snying po 'di rnams yin te /
T02D2512-3:185a-43: aom ma du badzra ghum ghum /
T02D2512-3:185a-44: aom badzra me gha gu lu gu lu /
T02D2512-3:185a-46: aom badzre shri ri h'um h'um zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-3:185a-47: dum bu gnyis pa la ni he badzra te /
T02D2512-3:185a-48: ma h'a ta re badzre ho //
T02D2512-3:185b-0: aom badzra lo tsa @185b ni ma shr'i badzra hi
T02D2512-3:185b-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni he
T02D2512-3:185b-2: ma h'a su kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-3:185b-3: ni dum bu gnyis par sbyan 'dren pa'i sngags so
T02D2512-3:185b-4: // h'um ma h'a su kha zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-3:185b-5: sogs pa ni gsum par spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so
T02D2512-3:185b-6: // // aom ma h'a su kha zhes bya ba
T02D2512-3:185b-7: la sogs pa ni gnyis par bum pa'i sngags so
T02D2512-3:185b-8: // // // h'um ma h'a su kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsum par ro //
T02D2512-3:185b-9: gnyis pa sna tshogs pa'i gos kyis rab tu g-yogs
T02D2512-3:185b-10: pa'i gsum pa shin tu dmar pa'i gos kyis g-yogs
T02D2512-3:185b-11: pa'o // slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:185b-12: gsum par dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kha
T02D2512-3:185b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje srung
T02D2512-3:185b-14: ba'i sngags so // gsum par yi ge h'um la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-3:185b-15: gsum pa ni 'dir dum bu bzhi pa ste khyad par gyi gnod pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2512-3:185b-16: thams cad du ni dum bu gnyis pa las gsungs
T02D2512-3:185b-17: pa'i rgyas par bstan pa dbang du byed pa nyid
T02D2512-3:185b-19: dum bu gnyis po 'dir yang khyad par ni so
T02D2512-3:185b-20: so dang bstun pa bstan pas skabs kha cig tu
T02D2512-3:185b-21: tshig gzhan gyis dngos po de nyid bstan par bya
T02D2512-3:185b-22: ba yin te zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:185b-23: dum bu gsum pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-3:185b-25: // / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po yang
T02D2512-3:185b-26: dum bu gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang
T02D2512-3:185b-27: 'dra ba ste slar yang bshad par mi bya'o //
T02D2512-3:185b-28: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-3:185b-29: yang dum bu gnyis ba las gsungs pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2512-3:185b-30: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra ba ste
T02D2512-3:185b-31: / 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te thig skud
T02D2512-3:185b-32: gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil gyi thig skud bdun
T02D2512-3:185b-33: pa'i bar mtshams bskor bar bya ste /
T02D2512-3:185b-34: de'i rjes la slar yang thig skud bdun pa'i mtshams
T02D2512-3:185b-35: kyi phyi rol du me'i phyogs kyi char 'khor gyi
T02D2512-3:185b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mid po gsum po'i dkyil
T02D2512-3:185b-37: 'khor ro// bden bral du srid mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-3:185b-39: dbang ldan gyi phyogs kyi char sdug bsngal gdon pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-3:185b-40: slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du
T02D2512-3:185b-41: phyogs dang mtshams rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad
T02D2512-3:186a-1: yang de bzhin gshegs par re re logs g-yas pa
T02D2512-3:186a-2: dang g-yon pa na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2512-3:186a-3: gnyis gnyis kyis yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-3:186a-4: // de la shar gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'o //
T02D2512-3:186a-5: nub kyi phyogs su 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D2512-3:186a-7: byang chub rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-3:186a-8: me'i phyogs su ye shes ta la la'o //
T02D2512-3:186a-10: rlung du gser 'od brtsegs par snang ba'o //
T02D2512-3:186a-11: dbang ldan gyi phyogs char de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:186a-12: thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan
T02D2512-3:186a-13: zhing padma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri'i gdan
T02D2512-3:186a-14: la bzhugs nas chos ston pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:186a-15: de la bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i g-yas logs
T02D2512-3:186a-16: su 'jig rten dbang phyug g-yon par rdo rje 'chang
T02D2512-3:186a-17: ba'o // mi bskyod pa'i g-yas logs su sbos kyi glang po g-yon par rdo rje snying po /
T02D2512-3:186a-18: 'od dpag tu med pa'i g-yas logs su sgrib pa
T02D2512-3:186a-19: thams cad rnam par sel ba g-yon du mthu chen
T02D2512-3:186a-20: thob pa'o // ye shes ta la la'i g-yas phyogs
T02D2512-3:186a-21: su 'jam dpal g-yon du gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal
T02D2512-3:186a-22: thob pa'o // po'o // bden par gsungs pa'i g-yas
T02D2512-3:186a-23: logs su byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal g-yon
T02D2512-3:186a-24: du rin chen dra ba can no //
T02D2512-3:186a-25: gser 'od brtsegs par snang ba'i g-yas logs su dri
T02D2512-3:186a-26: ma med pa'i gzi brjid g-yon du rgyal ba'i blo
T02D2512-3:186a-27: gros so // 'jigs dbyangs 'brug sgra'i g-yas logs su nam mkha'i snying po g-yon du sa'i snying po'o //
T02D2512-3:186a-28: rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms par mdzad pa'i
T02D2512-3:186a-29: g-yas logs su blo gros mi zad pa g-yon du
T02D2512-3:186a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' de
T02D2512-3:186a-32: rnams kyi phyag rgya dang sngags la sogs pa ni
T02D2512-3:186a-33: 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po mdzad
T02D2512-3:186a-34: ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las shes par bya'o
T02D2512-3:186a-36: rdo rje mtshon cha 'dzin ma la sogs pa nas
T02D2512-3:186a-37: rdo rje dril bu la mthar thug gi bar gyi
T02D2512-3:186a-38: lha mo bcu drug ni g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas
T02D2512-3:186b-0: bzhugs shing / dbu skra 'khrugs shing gyen @186b du brdzes shing g-yo ba'o //
T02D2512-3:186b-1: dum bu gsum par rdo rje nyi ma me ltar
T02D2512-3:186b-2: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i bshad pa rdzogs so
T02D2512-3:186b-4: / // / padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni sngar
T02D2512-3:186b-5: bshad pa dang mtshungs pa yin pas slar yang bshad
T02D2512-3:186b-6: par mi bya'o // rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil
T02D2512-3:186b-7: 'khor chen po yang sngar bshad pa dang mtshungs pa
T02D2512-3:186b-8: yin pa las khyad par ni 'di yin te gang
T02D2512-3:186b-9: zhig yid du 'ong ba'i snying po'i khyad par ro
T02D2512-3:186b-10: par mi bya'o // // de la gnyis par badzra
T02D2512-3:186b-11: aa bhi shi ka dzva ma h'a badzre ni dda
T02D2512-3:186b-12: par mi bya'o // // ne h'um / ma ni
T02D2512-3:186b-13: dha dz'a gra ke yu re bam ma h'a badzra
T02D2512-3:186b-14: par mi bya'o // // ne h'um / ma he
T02D2512-3:186b-15: ho / zhes bya ba ni dum bu gnyis pa
T02D2512-3:186b-16: yid du 'ong ba'i snying po rnams so //
T02D2512-3:186b-17: gsum pa la aom ra ti badzri ni madda aom tsinta ta ma ni ho //
T02D2512-3:186b-18: aom badzra ma h'a ma he ham zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-3:186b-19: 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi po ni snga ma bzhin kho na'o //
T02D2512-3:186b-20: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dum bu gnyis pa las gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:186b-21: 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te gang zhig mdor
T02D2512-3:186b-22: bstan pa ni sngar bshad pa 'di kho na 'dir
T02D2512-3:186b-24: gang gi phyir de rgyas par bshad pa'i cho ga
T02D2512-3:186b-25: de nyid 'dir dbang du byas la nyid kyi rjes
T02D2512-3:186b-26: su 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:186b-27: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang
T02D2512-3:186b-28: dum bu gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil
T02D2512-3:186b-30: 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te 'dod chags rdo rje ma ni dmar ba dang dkar pa'o //
T02D2512-3:186b-31: ki li ki li ni dkar po dang ser po'o //
T02D2512-3:186b-32: rdo rje dran ma ni sngo ba dang dkar po'o //
T02D2512-3:186b-33: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma ni ljang ba dang dkar ba'o //
T02D2512-3:186b-34: aom ma du badzri ghum ghum zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-3:186b-35: sogs pa ni dus kyi mchod pa rnams kyi snying
T02D2512-3:186b-36: po bzhi'o // dus mnyam du rdo rje dang bcas
T02D2512-3:186b-37: pa'i dril bu dang wang la sogs pa'i rol mo
T02D2512-3:186b-38: la 'khrug pa'i dbyangs kyis rdo re gar gyi mchod
T02D2512-3:186b-39: po bzhi'o // pa byas la / gsang ba'i lcags kyu dri bu dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2512-3:186b-40: aom a'a: h'um gi glu'i bzlas pa zur bzhi'i tshul
T02D2512-3:186b-41: gyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang
T02D2512-3:186b-42: bar bya'o // dum bu gsum pa dpal rdo rje
T02D2512-3:186b-43: sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs
T02D2512-3:186b-45: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni
T02D2512-3:186b-46: dum bu gnyis pa las gsungs pa de kho na
T02D2512-3:187a-1: 'di yin te mchod pa thams cad kyis yongs su
T02D2512-3:187a-2: gang pa'i snod nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag tu bri
T02D2512-3:187a-3: bar bya'o // rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar
T02D2512-3:187a-4: ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dum bu gnyis pa
T02D2512-3:187a-5: las gsungs pa'i dang po'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D2512-3:187a-6: bar bya'o // bri bar bya'o // 'dir khyad par
T02D2512-3:187a-7: ni 'di yin te rdo rje mtshon cha dang rtse
T02D2512-3:187a-8: gsum pa chen po dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa
T02D2512-3:187a-9: 'dzin ma rnams dang lhan cig tu gdan gcig la
T02D2512-3:187a-10: bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:187a-11: mtshams bzhir ni mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:187a-12: hri aa ra lli h'um zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po'o //
T02D2512-3:187a-15: grihn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D2512-3:187a-16: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na badzra h'um
T02D2512-3:187a-17: phat ces bya bas rdo rje 'bar ba lcags kyu
T02D2512-3:187a-18: chen po dang gar gyi tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-3:187a-19: 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-3:187a-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang 'phags
T02D2512-3:187a-21: pa nam mkha'i snying po dag gi gsang ba'i dkyil
T02D2512-3:187a-22: 'khor yang snga ma bzhin kho na'o //
T02D2512-3:187a-23: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa dang rnal 'byor sgrub pa sngar bshad pa gzung bar bya'o //

T02D2512-3:190a-17: pa bzhi dang dam tshig ni rdo rje sems dpa'

T02D2512-3:190a-23: dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-3:190a-24: dngos grub kyi rgyu ste nye ba'i snying po'i phyag
T02D2512-3:190a-25: rgya 'di nyid snying po dang phyag rgya dang rnal

T02D2512-3:190a-28: snying po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'di nyid
T02D2512-3:190a-29: sgrub pa po'i rgyud la rdzogs par byed pa yin
T02D2512-3:190a-30: no // 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-3:190a-32: nges pa'i shes pa skyed par byed pa'i bcom ldan
T02D2512-3:190a-33: 'das ma'i snying po ste de las byung ba'i shes
T02D2512-3:190a-34: pa la sogs pa ni nye bar brtags nas nye
T02D2512-3:190a-35: ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-3:190a-36: de nas de nyid lung bstan pa ;

T02D2512-3:190a-41: 'da' bar mi mdzad pas na dam tshig yin la

T02D2512-3:190a-46: chos kyang de yin la 'dod pa yang de yin pas na chos 'dod pa'o //

T02D2512-3:190b-0: @190b gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2512-3:190b-1: kyi yun ring po nas don du gnyer ba'i sems
T02D2512-3:190b-2: can thams cad kyi don mdzad par mngon par zhen
T02D2512-3:190b-3: pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-3:190b-4: 'di'i rjes su sgrub pa ni rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi'o //

T02D2512-3:190b-6: ci'i phyir chos 'dod pa'i yid la brnag pa rjes
T02D2512-3:190b-7: su sgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su chags par brjod
T02D2512-3:190b-8: kyi chos 'dod pa kho na ci'i phyir ma yin
T02D2512-3:190b-9: zhe na / byang chub sems ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2512-3:190b-10: 'dod chags chen po de yi lha //
T02D2512-3:190b-11: zhes bya ba la gang gi phyir 'dod pa ni
T02D2512-3:190b-12: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan
T02D2512-3:190b-13: 'das bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-3:190b-14: rje sems dpar brjod pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:190b-15: de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-3:190b-16: chen po gang yin pa de ni lha yin no
T02D2512-3:190b-17: // 'dis ni nges par 'byin pa'i shes rab kyi
T02D2512-3:190b-18: rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das rjes su brjod la
T02D2512-3:190b-19: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can
T02D2512-3:190b-20: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya nye

T02D2512-3:190b-22: // no // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya 'di
T02D2512-3:190b-23: las ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na
T02D2512-3:190b-24: // no // / 'di ni thams cad rjes su sgrub //

T02D2512-3:190b-26: nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya ni bsgrub par bya
T02D2512-3:190b-27: ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa ste de'i phyir
T02D2512-3:190b-28: rjes su sgrub par byed pa 'di yin no //
T02D2512-3:190b-29: de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi ston par
T02D2512-3:190b-30: byed pa'i rgyud bstan nas da ni phyi'i sbyor ba'i
T02D2512-3:190b-31: rgyud bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-3:190b-32: de nas rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-3:190b-33: pa gsungs te de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su
T02D2512-3:190b-34: babs pa ste / sgom pa'i sbyor ba'i rgyud gsungs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-3:190b-35: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje ni bi li ka'o //
T02D2512-3:190b-36: rdo rje nor bu ni chu srin sen mo'o //
T02D2512-3:190b-38: gur gum dang tsandan ni go sla ba ste cha
T02D2512-3:190b-39: mnyam pa'i rdzas de rnams kyis rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2512-3:190b-40: pa byas te lag pas bzung nas yi ge h'um
T02D2512-3:190b-41: gis stong phrag brgyar mngon par bsngags la /
T02D2512-3:190b-42: de dang de'i tshul gyis dpal rdo rje sems dpar
T02D2512-3:190b-43: gsungs pa'i las brgya po rnams des bsgrub par byas
T02D2512-3:190b-44: na bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //

T02D2512-3:191a-1: kyis sman byas la snga ma bzhin du stong phrag

T02D2512-3:191a-3: byas te / 'di yang tshul de dang des las

T02D2512-3:191a-5: byas te / par 'gyur ro // tsandan dkar po dang /

T02D2512-3:191a-14: pa tsam gyis 'grub bar byed pa yin no //
T02D2512-3:191a-16: tu rushka dang tsandan dkar po dang //
T02D2512-3:191a-18: bu ram cha mnyam pa dang ldan pa rnams la

T02D2512-3:191a-22: bsgrub par bya'o // rdo dreg dang sardza sa dang
T02D2512-3:191a-23: til rnams cha mnyam pa la gu gul bcug ste
T02D2512-3:191a-24: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sngags stong
T02D2512-3:191a-25: phrag brgya yongs su bzlas pa byas nas mar me
T02D2512-3:191a-27: mar me 'dis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu gsungs pa'i las brgya bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-3:191a-31: ga bur cha mnyam rnams kyis spos kyi sbyor ba
T02D2512-3:191a-32: byas la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po

T02D2512-3:191a-36: gsungs pa'i las brgya bsgrub par bya ba yin no

T02D2512-3:191a-39: // / dum bu bzhi pa la yang rdo rje sems

T02D2512-3:191a-42: po dang thams cad 'dra ba yin no //

T02D2512-3:191b-5: ba'i bar mtshams kyi phyi rol gyi mtshams rnams su

T02D2512-3:191b-23: pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dpal mchog dang

T02D2512-3:191b-33: dum bu gnyis pa gsungs pa yin //
T02D2512-3:191b-34: shes rab pha rol phyin chos kyi //
T02D2512-3:191b-35: phyag rgya kun 'gro rtag pa ste //
T02D2512-3:191b-36: ltas ngan thams cad 'jig byed pa'i //
T02D2512-3:191b-37: dum bu gsum pa gsungs pa yin //

T02D2512-3:191b-39: phyag rgya kun yang yang dag gnas //
T02D2512-3:191b-40: blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis //
T02D2512-3:191b-41: bsam mi khyab pa bzhi par gsungs //
T02D2512-3:191b-42: lha yi dbang po'i gnas dang mtshungs //

T02D2512-3:191b-44: sngags zhes rin chen tshogs pa'i sa //
T02D2512-3:191b-45: sna tshogs brtsegs pa nyams dga'i ri //
T02D2512-3:192a-2: shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba //
T02D2512-3:192a-3: bshad pa bdag gis byas pa las //
T02D2512-3:192a-4: dge ba bsags pa gang yin des //
T02D2512-3:192a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi kun dga' che //
T02D2512-3:192a-6: snying po khyab bdag bsam mi khyab //
T02D2512-3:192a-7: de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02D2512-3:192a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal gyur cig //
T02D2512-3:192a-9: lus can kun gyis rgyal ba yi //

T02D2512-3:192a-11: 'di yi tshad du bshad pa ni //
T02D2512-3:192a-12: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin //
T02D2512-3:192a-13: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab
T02D2512-3:192a-14: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya

T02D2512-3:192a-19: dam sa'i snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub
T02D2512-3:192a-20: pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po
T02D2512-3:192a-21: chen po mantra ka la sha dang /

T02D2512-3:192a-23: dpal lha btsan po byang chub sems dpa'i gdung rgyud
T02D2512-3:192a-24: lha bla ma dge slong zhi ba 'od kyi zhal
T02D2512-3:192a-25: snga nas bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o //
T02D2512-3:192a-26: sngon gyi smon lam thugs rje'i dbang gis ni //
T02D2512-3:192a-27: lha rigs byang chub sems dpa'i sprul ba ni //
T02D2512-3:192a-28: sa stengs rgyal ba'i rgyal por sku 'khrungs pa //
T02D2512-3:192a-29: bla ma byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes 'od //
T02D2512-3:192a-30: mnga' ris stod 'di gdul ba'i don du byung //
T02D2512-3:192a-31: gsang sngags spyod pa'i chos lugs kun nyams dang //
T02D2512-3:192a-32: dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg cho ga nub gyur pas //
T02D2512-3:192a-33: dkyil 'khor cho ga padma stong ldan te //
T02D2512-3:192a-34: de bzhin sbyin sreg shag ti shug tis byed //
T02D2512-3:192a-35: gzhan yang gsang sngags sbas don nub gyur cing //

T02D2512-3:192a-37: 'di rnams don nges btsal phyir bkas gnyer te //

T02D2512-3:192a-39: shraddha ka ra zhes bya spyan drangs nas //

T02D2512-3:192a-41: bsgyur cing bshad nas sngags log gzhung bsal zhing //

T02D2512-3:192a-44: sgom sgrub la sogs bye brag sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D2512-3:192a-45: skyon med gzhung lugs kun la 'gro kun sbyar //

T02D2512-3:192b-0: deng sang bar du sngags kyi gzhung @192b dar ba //

T02D2512-3:192b-4: rnal 'byor rgyud don tshul bzhin bshad mod kyis //
T02D2512-3:192b-5: de yi gang mas ngag nub par gyur pa nas //
T02D2512-3:192b-6: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi ji bzhin don ma rtogs //
T02D2512-3:192b-7: yang dag don la nor pa'i dri mas bslad //

T02D2512-3:192b-13: rje'u rigs mchog gi nang du sku la brungs pa //
T02D2512-3:192b-14: thos pa mang zhing mkhyen par ldan pa yi //
T02D2512-3:192b-15: mkhas pa mchog gyur sngags kyi bum pa la //
T02D2512-3:192b-16: gsol ba btab nas bdag gis bsgyur ba las //
T02D2512-3:192b-17: sgra don tha snyad la mkhas byung gyur na //
T02D2512-3:192b-18: tshig don brtags nas rigs pas bcos par gyis //
T02D2512-3:192b-19: sgra yi bstan bcos mtha' dag ma bslabs shing//

T02D2512-3:192b-22: nga rgyal 'ba' zhig tsam gyis bcos mi bya //

T02D2512-3:192b-24: 'khor ba'i khongs chud 'gro ba rigs lnga po //
